story:
Overview

“Under that Rain” is an old school adventure psychological horror game in pixel art .In a rain that never stops, a man faces an endless nightmare. 

Story

It was nightfall and  Andrè Lacroix, a social worker from Paris, opened the last folder of the day. Outside, it was starting to rain. He read the name on the top of the dossier “Adrien Luis Lazarius”, an orphan given in custody to his aunt who lives in a manor house outside the town. Suspected child abuse, reported the file.

Something snapped deep down in Andrè,he lost his self-control. He jumped up and quickly left the room. He didn’t care about the rain that had started to fall, he had to know. In an instant that file had become his only obsession.

Upon reaching the house he understoodthathe was right to be worried. The child was missing and the people at the manor house were acting as if they had something to hide.

So began Andrè’s  journey into the horrible facts surrounding that house. He will be overwhelmed by a strange kind of nostalgia mixed with a horrible form of oppression. This will lead our hero to find answers. Soon he will learn that nothing is as it seems and that sometimes the worst atrocities could be made even worse.

An old Manor house in theParisian country-side in endless rain, where feelings like love, hate, fear and vengeance will bring to life unimaginable and repulsive horrors.

Our proposal 

We are an Italian team with different skills , 2D artist ,programmer, writer and musician .

Our purpose is to create an adventure game,  connecting the best of modern storytelling techniques such as the Quick Time Events to the well-know feature of old style point-and-click adventure games such as big enigmas and good story duration.We will develop an amazing adventure game with an intricate plot, that will directly affect the player’s very soul, something very special!

At his arrival to the manor, Andrè, the main character, will show his pure spirit, his good will, the qualities of a man always ready to help anyone in distress (especially children). He will be the key player and witness to events that will force him to make difficult and cruel choices, changing him within , ripping apart his soul. 

Can he remain the same person? How will these choices affect him? 

We will integrate some special events into this adventure, which will require not only your best deductive skills but also your speed. Do you think you are fast enough ?

In “Under that Rain” we are not proposing just an adventure, but an amazing and profound story that wants to investigate the human soul, looking into that dark corner of each and every one of us that we intentionally ignore .

 who are we? Are we the hero or (just another) the coward?

 Are we ready to sacrifice ourselves, or are we going to do whatever it takes to stay alive?


Platforms and localisation

The game will be released for both Pc, Linux and Mac and will be subtitled in two language (Italian and English )

Features

  • Feal the Horror: let you catch from a story that will make you hold your breath until the end
  • Solve the Enigmas of the house: face the obstacles that Andrè will encounter in his story 
  • Unique melodies that will meld with the story , completing it 

Greenlight

Support us on steam Greenlight! We need your support to be on the steam store too !

Vote for us on Steam GreenLight

Rewards

All the delivery perks are Europe and USA only

Depending on your contribution to the campaign, we will offer you fantastic rewards.


We want to specify that all the rewards are limited editions, lasting only to the end of the campaign. We will not give away these items anymore once the campain has endend.


There are only five paintings, in a once only edition,meaning that the painting you chose will be unique in this world (we can’t guarantee in other galaxies). 

Unexpected Results

We want ‘Under that Rain’ to deliver the best possible experience. Listed below are the milestones for our campaign: every time we reach a target, we will release new features such as multiple languages and a version of the game for smartphones

( we want make you know what we have for you if the campain wuold exceed the pledge…. )

  • 15.000 you Got a Nightmare?!  Welcome in the Lazarius Manor, this will be a complete episode , but not all shall have an answer….
  • 30.000 Well that’s a lot! And so it End Both the episodes of Andre’s story will be delivered , How will Andre’s story end?
  • 36.000 I speak many languages  We will translate the game in  French,German and Spanish 
  • 40.000 It is everywhere The game will be released for Android e iOs  

F.A.Q.   

Why Indiegogo ?

This project began almost one year ago, with the collaboration of Riccardo Agea and Massimo Colella. After a while we relized that:

  1. We would have never been able to include all the things we wanted and still deliver the game in a realistic timescale
  2. the plot has taken on a life of its own and it did not seem to ever reach an end. We decided to split the story into two big episodes . This allowed us to propose a game with relatively low production costs for both the episodes 

What inspired you for the story?

As reference point we were inspired by the dreamlike enviroment of Howard Phillips Lovercraft’s works and Gothic suggestions by Edgar Allan Poe. The locations are totally designed by us , based on XIX century’s residences.

Then Why 15.000 ?

This might seem as a lot of money , but it is not . We tried to keep our budget to a minimum, but there is a lot of costs , even staing in low side.

We stronlgy believe in this project and we really want to create this game , and show you what an amazing and thrilling game this is  .

But why 30.000?

As mentioned , trying to keep our budget as low as possible we were forced to split the story, It’s an opportunity , if you achieve this target we will be able to develop the entire game with no future campaign. Otherwise after the release of the first chapter we will start a second campaign for the second episode

If you do not reach 30000 I will never see the full end then?

We believe in our skills and in this game , we are sure that after the game release will be easier for us to reach the goal and collect the remaining funds for the second episode (15000)

The full localisation will be only on 36000?

No, in the case we will stop at 18000 , we will guarantee the other translations for the first episode

Why release smartphone version only when you reach 40000?

At this moment we want to focus mainly on the game release,the various changes that should be necessary are too expensive for us , both for the purchase of the program for the settings and for the testing .Then we tought that the first objective for us is to give you an amazing adventure , and only afterwards we will carry on with the subsequent stages.

Will the dubbing will be included?

For the dubbing we tried to include it inside the campaign , but we are not able to quantify its costs a cost for this, we have the story but we are working on the dialogue of the cast, until we finish this part we will not have a realistic estimate of the costs of dubbing.

“Under That Rain” is a game complete even without the dubbing but yes we would like to hear Andrè’s voice , We are waiting to see how this campaign goes and then decide if we can do something about it

story:
Meet Atom, the world's smallest smartcard

Atom is an elegant smartcard made of high grade polished polycarbonate that can replace any of your existing ones. Wear it however it matters to you.

Small Product, Big Idea

Atom is tiny, so your smartcard need not belong in your wallet. It can be worn or attached on just about everything. 

Clip it on your briefcase, purse, sports band, or just a casual accessory. Atom seamlessly adapts to whatever the occasion. 


Break the Mold, Take Control

Atom is compliant with most existing infrastructure, yet personalized. When you use Atom, you are not just someone in the crowd. You are you.


Be creative with basic means of attachment, like tapes, straps or clips. Or you can even design your own wearable accessories for Atom. 

Create a Design, Drive a Community

    3D printing marketplace and services are increasingly popular. Print your design for personal use, or sell it to others. Share and browse assorted designs.  Atom allows you to connect with a larger community.

    The Atom Team

    We are focused on understanding the interaction of people and the devices encountered daily. We aim to generate discussions for the role of technology in our lives. We believe that technological products should not control our lifestyle. Instead, we should decide how they can be compatible to our own individual lifestyle. At the same time, we want to make the discussions a reality by developing great products that really allow people to be in control of technology. Atom is the first of such products we design.

    Our Story

    Fed up with the countless times we have missed trains because we had to burrow through our bags for our wallets, we happen to discuss such inconveniences over lunch one day. We observed that many people have multiple cards in the wallet that cause errors when tapped on readers. We also notice that because of this, people also often separate the cards by taking one or two out of the wallet. This leads to people misplacing those cards. 

    So we asked ourselves, "Why do chips that handle contactless payment (and other authentication processes) have to come embedded with cards? " We then worked on a design to replace existing smartcards with something that can be attached with anything you always have by your side.

    Atom is small and versatile, so you can attach it to the most important things in your life, while solving all the problems faced by traditional smartcards. We hope that through Atom, there will be greater awareness in rethinking the usage of the devices we use daily. 


    The Atom Journey


    Design Motivation

    We thought of the name 'Atom' because of the simplicity it represents. We want to create a product that strips the conventional smartcard to its essence, and yet just as functional. 
    We also asked ourselves, ‘Why hold your card when you can wear it?’ Intrigued by the possibility of technology infused fashion, we are inspired to kick things off with a clip because it is generic and multi-functional. 
    The possibilities are endless; it is up to your imagination to build up the usage for Atom.  


    Functional Prototype

    In order to make Atom small, we redesigned the antenna found in a conventional smartcard. We also optimized the antenna to authenticate at the NFC frequency of 13.56 MHz. We have patented the antenna design and it is currently being tested in a few organizations around America and Asia.


    Manufacturing Ideas

    Casing

    One of our objectives is to design the smallest smartcard in the world. As such, we made several design and manufacturing decisions to use high grade materials that are thin and extremely strong.

    We also face the challenge of using materials that will not interfere with the near field communication.

    Lastly, we want to keep our design as modular as possible so that it can fit any situation for which you want to use it.

    Chip

    The chip within your smartcard can be easily removed and inserted into Atom by:

    1. Shining your mobile flashlight through the smartcard and mark out where the chip lies
    2. Cutting out the portion of the card that holds the chip
    3. Placing this portion into the solution that we provided
    4. Removing the chip after 3 hours and slotting it into Atom

    Antenna

    Combining our patented antenna design together with the material choice, we are able to bring you a circuit that is incredibly miniaturized and yet performs close to what the smartcard does.


    We distilled all the design features into 5 very manufacturable components, which help to drive down the tooling and production costs.

    Accessories

    Stretch goals - coming soon!


      Use of Funds

      We have refined our prototypes and can start production at any time. We have optimized our supply chain. Now, we are looking for funds to enter the production stage. These are the major channels of where the funds raised will flow:
      • Production tooling for various intricate components that allow Atom to be so small and sleek. 
      • Antenna optimization and refinement to maximize the interaction with smartcard readers. 
      We are asking you to come onboard early and help us make Atom a reality. 

      Risks & Challenges

        • The specially designed antenna in Atom have been tested with most protocols. However, there is no standardization of quality in smartcard readers, especially for access control. Should you find something that doesn't work, please feedback to us. 

        • The process of removing the chip from your smartcard is irreversible. Ensure that Atomizing that particular smartcard is what you want. 

        • There are inherent production risks with any new product. However, we have already sourced for multiple providers and manufacturers for each different component in Atom.

        FAQ

        1. What is in the kit?

        A full set of tools necessary to create 1 smart ATOM! 


        2. What is the waterproof rating?

        Atom is manufactured with IP 65 rating, i.e. it is water resistant but not waterproof

        3. What kind of compatible accessories do you offer?

        Atom is designed for you to use it in any creative way. To stay true to that, we will not be offering any specific accessories in the campaign. However, as a stretch goal, we will be making the gold clip featured in the video available to our backers.

        4. Can I remove the chip from Atom and change it to another one?

        Yes you can! We designed the tray such that you can slide it out, just enough to remove the existing chip and replace it with another that you like.

        5. I have multiple smart cards I want to use with Atom, how can I differentiate them?

        As part of the reward in every tier, we’ll give out really cool stick-ons that can help you identify your different Atoms.

        6. Does it work for … cards and chips?

        We’ve designed for Atom to take in chips of size 8mm by 5mm. Most of the chips used in the markets are of this size. Here’s a non-exhaustive list of the systems we know can be used on Atom:

        https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EKTfXFFCu-u3ACF5-xSXjVXHtMNRpmGvRAG_EeKXj3w/edit#gid=0

        7. How do I know if my smart card can be used on Atom?

        Atom works for newer smartcards that operate on 13.56Mhz. If your smart card does not fall under the list above. We recommend you do the following:

        a. Download a NFC Research Lab on an Android device.

        b. Tap the card to the back of it and read the card type. If it is a MiFare Classic/DESFire, it will work on Atom.

        c. To further verify it, use your camera phone flashlight to identify the size of the chip.

        d. If you are still unsure, drop us an email, we’ll be happy to assist you!

        8. My card is using a magnetic stripe. Can I use it?

        No. Unfortunately, Atom is designed to be compatible with the chip embedded in smartcards and not the magnetic stripes.


        Comments, Questions, Ideas?

        Ask on the comment thread here or email teamatomnow@gmail.com
story_txt:
Meet Atom, the world's smallest smartcard




Atom is an elegant smartcard made of high grade polished polycarbonate that can replace any of your existing ones. Wear it however it matters to you.



Small Product, Big Idea
Atom is tiny, so your smartcard need not belong in your wallet. It can be worn or attached on just about everything. 



Clip it on your briefcase, purse, sports band, or just a casual accessory. Atom seamlessly adapts to whatever the occasion. 

Break the Mold, Take Control
Atom is compliant with most existing infrastructure, yet personalized. When you use Atom, you are not just someone in the crowd. You are you.




Be creative with basic means of attachment, like tapes, straps or clips. Or you can even design your own wearable accessories for Atom. 
Create a Design, Drive a Community

3D printing marketplace and services are increasingly popular. Print your design for personal use, or sell it to others. Share and browse assorted designs.  Atom allows you to connect with a larger community.

The Atom Team
We are focused on understanding the interaction of people and the devices encountered daily. We aim to generate discussions for the role of technology in our lives. We believe that technological products should not control our lifestyle. Instead, we should decide how they can be compatible to our own individual lifestyle. At the same time, we want to make the discussions a reality by developing great products that really allow people to be in control of technology. Atom is the first of such products we design.
Our Story

Fed up with the countless times we have missed trains because we had to burrow through our bags for our wallets, we happen to discuss such inconveniences over lunch one day. We observed that many people have multiple cards in the wallet that cause errors when tapped on readers. We also notice that because of this, people also often separate the cards by taking one or two out of the wallet. This leads to people misplacing those cards. 
So we asked ourselves, "Why do chips that handle contactless payment (and other authentication processes) have to come embedded with cards? " We then worked on a design to replace existing smartcards with something that can be attached with anything you always have by your side. 



Atom is small and versatile, so you can attach it to the most important things in your life, while solving all the problems faced by traditional smartcards. We hope that through Atom, there will be greater awareness in rethinking the usage of the devices we use daily. 

The Atom Journey




Design Motivation
We thought of the name 'Atom' because of the simplicity it represents. We want to create a product that strips the conventional smartcard to its essence, and yet just as functional. 

We also asked ourselves, ‘Why hold your card when you can wear it?’ Intrigued by the possibility of technology infused fashion, we are inspired to kick things off with a clip because it is generic and multi-functional. 

The possibilities are endless; it is up to your imagination to build up the usage for Atom.  



Functional Prototype
In order to make Atom small, we redesigned the antenna found in a conventional smartcard. We also optimized the antenna to authenticate at the NFC frequency of 13.56 MHz. We have patented the antenna design and it is currently being tested in a few organizations around America and Asia.


Manufacturing Ideas
Casing
One of our objectives is to design the smallest smartcard in the world. As such, we made several design and manufacturing decisions to use high grade materials that are thin and extremely strong. 
We also face the challenge of using materials that will not interfere with the near field communication.
Lastly, we want to keep our design as modular as possible so that it can fit any situation for which you want to use it.


Chip
The chip within your smartcard can be easily removed and inserted into Atom by:


Shining your mobile flashlight through the smartcard and mark out where the chip lies
Cutting out the portion of the card that holds the chip
Placing this portion into the solution that we provided
Removing the chip after 3 hours and slotting it into Atom

Antenna
Combining our patented antenna design together with the material choice, we are able to bring you a circuit that is incredibly miniaturized and yet performs close to what the smartcard does.

We distilled all the design features into 5 very manufacturable components, which help to drive down the tooling and production costs. 
AccessoriesStretch goals - coming soon!






Use of Funds
We have refined our prototypes and can start production at any time. We have optimized our supply chain. Now, we are looking for funds to enter the production stage. These are the major channels of where the funds raised will flow:


Production tooling for various intricate components that allow Atom to be so small and sleek. 
Antenna optimization and refinement to maximize the interaction with smartcard readers. 
We are asking you to come onboard early and help us make Atom a reality. 


Risks & Challenges




The specially designed antenna in Atom have been tested with most protocols. However, there is no standardization of quality in smartcard readers, especially for access control. Should you find something that doesn't work, please feedback to us. 
The process of removing the chip from your smartcard is irreversible. Ensure that Atomizing that particular smartcard is what you want. 
There are inherent production risks with any new product. However, we have already sourced for multiple providers and manufacturers for each different component in Atom.


  
FAQ

1. What is in the kit?
A full set of tools necessary to create 1 smart ATOM! 



2. What is the waterproof rating?
Atom is manufactured with IP 65 rating, i.e. it is water resistant but not waterproof
3. What kind of compatible accessories do you offer?
Atom is designed for you to use it in any creative way. To stay true to that, we will not be offering any specific accessories in the campaign. However, as a stretch goal, we will be making the gold clip featured in the video available to our backers.



4. Can I remove the chip from Atom and change it to another one?
Yes you can! We designed the tray such that you can slide it out, just enough to remove the existing chip and replace it with another that you like. 
5. I have multiple smart cards I want to use with Atom, how can I differentiate them?
As part of the reward in every tier, we’ll give out really cool stick-ons that can help you identify your different Atoms.
6. Does it work for … cards and chips?
We’ve designed for Atom to take in chips of size 8mm by 5mm. Most of the chips used in the markets are of this size. Here’s a non-exhaustive list of the systems we know can be used on Atom:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EKTfXFFCu-u3ACF5-xSXjVXHtMNRpmGvRAG_EeKXj3w/edit#gid=0
7. How do I know if my smart card can be used on Atom?
Atom works for newer smartcards that operate on 13.56Mhz. If your smart card does not fall under the list above. We recommend you do the following:
a. Download a NFC Research Lab on an Android device.
b. Tap the card to the back of it and read the card type. If it is a MiFare Classic/DESFire, it will work on Atom.
c. To further verify it, use your camera phone flashlight to identify the size of the chip.
d. If you are still unsure, drop us an email, we’ll be happy to assist you!
8. My card is using a magnetic stripe. Can I use it?
No. Unfortunately, Atom is designed to be compatible with the chip embedded in smartcards and not the magnetic stripes.


Comments, Questions, Ideas?
Ask on the comment thread here or email teamatomnow@gmail.com

story:
English Version 

Briefing: Building Better Dungeons



Instant Dungeon is a new way of perilous adventure modular setting.

  • Our Dungeon is very easy to transport and store
  • 1 inch walls,  universal & compatible with the all tactical rpg environments.
  • Magnetic walls in light but resistant resin, no dismount danger!
  • Create your own dangerous adventure in just one minute.

Building Better Dungeons

IDT Team Biography 


What we need and what you obtain

  • We need your support to publish a new playable solution, with standard features & others never seen.
  • We are creating a commercial web to show & offer our products.  


NOT FINAL ART


Basic Walls Set

The Instant Dungeon (Details)

"It will be good to bring a very easy to transport, store and assemble dungeon and rpg environment" -Someone RPG guy

  • Magnetic features ensure breakdown risk avoidance.
  • We use light resin, not cumbersome.
  •  We not use clips, nor paperboard dungeons.

WIP & PROJECTS

English introduction: (more videos @ our youtube channel)

Instant Dungeon Youtube Channel


Basic Packs Description & images

Basic Walls Set

Basic Pack contains:

3x 1" wall  /  4x 2" wall  / 4x 3" wall  / 2x 4" wall / 1x doorframe

3x doors (different)  / 1x 1" stairway

2 metal plates with printed tiles

Perk Level Detailed

Video briefing: 

English Perk Briefing

Perks detailed

Risks

Anyway, there are risks of not acomplish delivery times. We are very proud to have designed a unique features systems to build & ship, by demand, requested components in a very short time period.

See you at Instant Dungeon!!!

Instant Dungeon Tactical


Miniatures shown for reference purpose. Not final tiles


TILE EXAMPLES 

This will be one of the tiles to be included in Basic Pack and higher.

Metal plates included in basic pack are 25 ctms high per 25 ctms wide.

1 centimeter equals 2,54 inches.

Final Test Tiles

More details @

Tile examples

GOLD COINS AVAILABLE THROUGH PERKS

STRETCH GOALS TO UNBLOCK

We need 30000€ to make the project, but estimate to raise at least to 50000€.


EXAMPLE OF UNLOCKED ITEMS AND SPECIAL FURNITURE (WIP)

TO BE UNBLOCKED

More WIP images at gallery or @:


WIP & PROJECTS

TO BE UNBLOCKED

Building Better Dungeons

Basic Walls Set

Instant Dungeon Youtube Channel


Thanks for your help and support,

Instant Dungeon Tactical Team

Building Better Dungeons


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Versión Española


Introducción: Construyendo Mejores Mazmorras

Nuestro primer proyecto es una nueva forma de sistema modular de aventuras .

  • Nuestra mazmorra es fácil de transportar y almacenar. 
  • Los muros de 1 pulgada( 2,5 cms), son universales en cualquier juego de rol.
  • Muros magnéticos de resistente resina ligera, sin peligro de desmontarse!
  • Crea tu propia peligrosa aventura en sólo un minuto.

Building Better Dungeons

Biografía del equipo IDT 

El equipo IDT está formado por cuatro miembros principales:


Qué necesitamos y qué obtienes a cambio.

  • Necesitamos vuestro apoyo para publicar una nueva solución jugable, con características estandar y otras nuncas vistas.
  • Estamos creando una web para ofrecer nuevos diseños, en proyecto. 


CAJA PROVISIONAL


Basic Walls Set

The Instant Dungeon(La Mazmorra Instantánea)

   "Sería genial crear una mazmorra fácil de transportar, almacenar y montar." -      Alguien en una partida de rol.


  • Sus características magnéticas evitan riesgos de desmontaje repentino.
  • Usamos resina ligera. (la misma que se usa en cebos de pesca)
  • No usamos clips, ni mazmorras de papel.
  • Mira nuestro vídeo y compruébalo.

WIP & PROJECTS

Versión Española


Imágenes y descripción del Pack Básico

Basic Walls Set

El Pack Básico contiene:

3x 1" muro  /  4x 2" muro  / 4x 3" muro  / 2x 4" muro / 1x marco puerta

3x puertas (diferentes)  / 1x 1" escalera

2 planchas de hierro con tiles impresos en ellas.

Niveles de Perks Detallados

Video resumen: 

Resumen Perks en Español



Imágenes grandes en galería o en:

Perks detallados en castellano


Riesgos

En cualquier caso, exiten riesgos de no cumplir los tiempos de entrega. 

Estamos orgullosos de haber diseñado un sistema único para construir y enviar, bajo pedido, los componentes requeridos en un corto período de tiempo.

Nos vemos en Instant Dungeon!!!

Instant Dungeon Tactical


Miniaturas mostradas para referencia de tamaño. Los tiles de esta foto no son los finales.

EJEMPLOS DE TILES 

Algunos de los tiles que serán incluídos en el Pack Básico y superiores.

Las planchas de metal incluidas en el pack básico son de 25cmx25cm, es decir 10 tiles de ancho por 10 de largo.

Prueba de Tiles Definitivos

Más detalles haciendo click en:

Tile examples

GOLD COINS DISPONIBLES EN PERKS


PREMIOS DESBLOQUEABLES 

Necesitamos 30.000€ para el proyecto pero nos gustaría llegar a 50.000€.


EJEMPLOS DE DESBLOQUEABLES             (EN PROCESO) 

TO BE UNBLOCKED


Más imágenes en la galería o en: 

WIP & PROJECTS

TO BE UNBLOCKED

Building Better Dungeons

Basic Walls Set

Instant Dungeon Youtube Channel


Gracias por vuestra ayuda y apoyo,

Instant Dungeon Tactical Team

Construyendo Mejores Mazmorras

story:
Big Bully is a social 2D indie game. Basically, it’s like an upgraded “poke”, which was very popular in Facebook’s early years.
The “poke” feature slowly died out during the years, but we are now bringing it back to life!
With cool animated short clips, you can now get your friends' attention, make them laugh, or even take care of some unfinished business. And the best part - you and your friends get to be the stars of these clips!

That said, Big Bully is also a competitive game, and the player’s goal is to be the biggest bully of them all. To become the biggest bully, the player needs to bully his friends as much as possible. Every bullying action will reward the bullying player with LunchMoney, and reduce his poor friend’s energy.
The best feature in Big Bully is that whenever you’re bullying you can let all your friends know about it, by simply sharing the action clip on your social network (e.g facebook).
The more bullying actions you perform, the more LunchMoney you earn, and the more cool new actions will be unlocked. As you gain more and more bullying points, you climb up the bullying ladder, until you become the biggest bully of them all.




We’re tired of the same old boring games. Too many games today are simply clones of other games with only the smallest changes in design. We feel it’s necessary to create a social game which will be truly and fundamentally social. To us, displaying your friends’ score or their names at the bottom of the screen, as so many other games do, simply isn’t enough. We want to provide a platform for actual interaction, we want the excitement of teasing a friend and than viewing his response. We want the user to experience something new, by providing high-value content within the game but also beyond it, in the form of funny, unique and short animations that can be shared with friends.

 



Well, first of all, it will let us know that there are other people that think like us, and that will allow us to release a game that exceeds all expectations.
Besides that, your support will give us the chance to create a game without the annoying ads and sponsored content that gets shoved in your face all the time.
You can help us make this game without having to compromise!

 



Big Bully is almost ready and we have already completed most of the work, BUT -
This is a content-based game, which means that to keep it interesting and attractive we need to keep creating new animations. To do that we need to pay animators and soundmen, and get a stronger server to support all you eager players.
We also plan to keep developing the game and add shields, special effects, the ability to upgrade your character, etc...

 

 

Excited about Big Bully? Don’t be shy, unleash your inner bully!
If you have the means to become one of our Indiegogo contributors - AWESOME! If not, please tell your friends about us!

Thanks for checking us out.

Sincerely,
Pickle team.

Big Bully is almost ready and we have already completed most of the work, BUT -This is a content-based game, which means that to keep it interesting and attractive we need to keep creating new animations. To do that we need to pay animators and soundmen, and get a stronger server to support all you eager players.We also plan to keep developing the game and add shields, special effects, the ability to upgrade your character, etc...
 

 
Excited about Big Bully? Don’t be shy, unleash your inner bully!If you have the means to become one of our Indiegogo contributors - AWESOME! If not, please tell your friends about us!Thanks for checking us out.Sincerely,Pickle team.

story:
New Bonus Items:

Every backer will also get one each of the following in both print and as a PDF

  1. Printed Pocket Mod containing everything required to create a first level B/X character including full 1st level spell descriptions.
  2. Printed Pocket Mod containing an expanded list of equipment complete with descriptions.
  3. A reworking of the classic 1978 Advanced Character Sheet (see details here and here), originally produced by Games Workshop.

Character sheets are great. I designed a set of character sheets in 2010 with Labyrinth Lord's Advanced Edition Companion in mind. Over a thousand sets were downloaded, and they may still be found at RPGNow.com. As a player, I now opt for smaller, simpler character sheets and that it what is being offered in this project.

Backers will receive a professionally-printed, glued, and board-backed pad of 50 A5-sized character sheets. Whilst character sheets may easily be printed on a home printer, they are unlikely to match the crisp output of a printing press.

Rather than branding the sheets for a particular game, I've decided to keep them as generic as possible. However, the sheets will proudly proclaim that they are of the Old-School, thanks to Stuart Robertson's excellent OSR logo, which he has kindly allowed to be used on them.  The sheets will be perfect for use with retroclones like Labyrinth Lord, and original B/X editions of the world's most popular fantasy roleplaying game.  They could also be used with First Edition Advanced rules but you may need to jot down a few extra details in the Notes section.

The pads will be posted in card mailing envelopes for protection. UK orders will be posted by Royal Mail Second Class post, and overseas orders will all be sent by Airmail.

story:
The Legend Of Zahira is a platform adventure game. The protagonist Atherius is the chosen one of the land of Gaya, during the adventure he will have to overcome numerous pitfalls and fight body to body with fearsome opponents to end the tyranny of Zedh and free Gaya. Zahira, the name of the sword held by Atherius, means she who protects. only Zahira can defeat the demons and recover the crystals of the lost land.

I gather these sources to get the game done and to support me during development. the programming of The Legend Of Zahira and the level design is done by one person "Fabio Fortino" while the artwork of the covers is done by "Fabio Carretti". The game will include 10 levels full of action and combat. I care about this project because I think it is treated in detail and artistically, its pixelart style is very reminiscent of 90s games. The goal is to create a fun and solid game in gameplay and combat system. The artificial intelligence of the enemies is effective and well made, I studied in great detail how the enemies had to behave to make the experience satisfying and beautiful to see. The Legend Of Zahira will be released on Steam,ps4,xbox one and nintendo switch once the goal is reached.
 

 

 

 

My name is Fabio Fortino, I was born with the classic story of the commodore 64, given by my father, after a while I learned how to start the games, I was eight years old. I immediately fell in love with the world of video games, with the passage of time other computers arrived I passed from the amiga to the PC, where I spent many hours in the company of video games. In 2008 I began to think that I wanted to learn how to create videogames, after a few weeks I began to read up on development kits and immediately began to study. After 4 years of study I started creating small games for third party companies with very small earnings. Now here I am on Indiegogo with a project of my own. My passion and your passion. 

Thanks for the support.

The console versions will be available after the launch of steam. I can't set a specific date for the console versions, because the game will have to pass approval from Sony, Nintendo and Microsoft. I can tell you that after approval The Legend Of Zahira will also be available for consoles.

story:
What is The Academy Boardgame?

The Academy is a board game created by a police officer and two dispatchers. In the game, players are recruits in the police academy and the goal of the game is to complete the seven required classes and be the first player to reach graduation. Sounds easy enough.

The challenge of the game comes with forcing players to reach each class in the order that they are drawn at the beginning of each game. Once a player has reached the next class on their list, they either pass or fail, based on rolling the die. If they fail, they must report to "PT" (Physical Training) and return to that class to try again.



Along the way, players will encounter the dreaded academy counselors. These counselors could help you, or hurt you, depending on how far along the game is, and what classes you have left to complete. For instance, you might draw a card that sends you to the class, "Firearms." This would be helpful, as you could potentially complete this class out of order and give you an advantage, however, on the flip side, if you have already completed Firearms training, this could send you out of the way of your next class, costing you time.

   

As the game may appeal to those involved in the law enforcement community, this game requires absolutely no police background and is fun for the whole family. The recommended players are from 2-6 and ages 12 and up. The full game includes, The Academy game board, 6 player pieces, deck of classes (7 cards), deck of counselor says (24 cards), and 1 die.

What We Need & What You Get

We have already produced a professional prototype of the game as you can from our photos, but we need more money to mass produce the game to make it cheap enough for consumers to want to buy it. With a goal of $15,000 (We know that sounds like a lot!) we will be able to produce a higher number of games to lower the production costs and even be able to ship the games to you right to your door for only $20! It will not be easy to raise the required funds for us to be successful in producing our game for purchase, but with your help we can do it!

Why Support This Particular Game?

Our goal was to make a fun game for everybody. Since we all three work in law enforcement, we decided to create a game around that theme. There are a handful of police oriented games out nowadays, but some are very difficult to follow, to learn, and take too long. This game is engaging, addictive, and as soon as one game is over, players want to start a new game over again! Help us share this game with the world! For only $20, you can help us out greatly, and have a great game from its first print run mailed directly to you, now thats a heck of a deal!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you aren't interested in supporting our campaign by purchasing a game, we can still use all of the help we can get. A simple share on facebook or twitter will go a long way in aiding this campaign. If you do decide to purchase a game, we still need lots of exposure to raise enough money to get our game produced!

story:
The game is released for Android, iOS and tablet

New Features, New levels, 

and World Leagues !

FIND BELOW THE "SPREAD THE WORD" COMPETITION

This is the classic Sudoku, only better.

Discover the intuitive graphic interface and challenge yourself on new patterns and at different levels of difficulty.

Train yourself to become the best, compare your performance through the Sudoku Analytics (number of games played,  average  errors per game, average of correct entries per game, mean time to resolution, personal records ...).

When you are ready, start playing Sudoku Wars


Challange your friends on the same game plan, whenever you want. You have limited time available... it’ll win the one who saves the longest time.

Every mistake you make, will make you waste time. If the both of you complete the game plan, it’ll win the one who spends the shortest time. If time expires before completion, it’ll win the player who places the biggest amount of correct numbers in the diagram.

Each challenge has some points up for grabs. The more the victory is crushing the more points you'll get.

The multi player mode Sudoku wars keeps you constantly updated on your level of play and on the level of your opponents, in order to always keep challenges exciting and balanced.

Depending on the level of your opponent, the points at stake increase or diminish.

Link your game account to the various social profiles, share your progress with your friends and challenge them to a thrilling head-to-head!


Play and use these features:  suggestion, error checking and smart grid. We are planning to introduce other features. Of course, you can' t use them at any time you want in the Challenge Mode. In case you use a feature, the algorithm we studied, will introduce a penalty that is going to affect  your final score. It's up to you to decide if, when and how often to use them.


Championships

Yes! You read that right! we are going to organize special tournaments of Sudoku! At stake there is the honor and not only...matches will be played on knockout stage and will be organized in groups. You will get awards, you will climb the charts.

Levels

You are going to start from a low level. The more victories you gain, the more heroic  opponents you destroy and the bigger will your Sudoku Analytics be. This will allow you to climb levels and charts.

  • GET MORE COOL STUFF ... SPREAD THE WORD!!!
 Spread the word

All you have to do is share using the "Share This Campaign" link above!
Use the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it every where so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action.  The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes!

The top four referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a special  prizes (every week we'll be adding one).

The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will be offered a SUPER VALUE  prizes 

Weekly special  prizes  

        



Weekly  Super Value Prizes



    • Our Mission


    • About Us

    We are a group of professionals from the world of digital media who share a dream together: to drive the game in general and enigmatography, within the social logic, typical of  Web 2.0. The project aims to have each game become a real cornerstone of socialization with the help of its rules and dynamics.

    The goal of this campaign is to raise  $ 47,000 – none of this money will go to us; it will all go into the game production. We love working with a small budget and it makes us elated, but we had to stretch it as far as we could. If this game is taken seriously it will need to look nice in every detail.  This is what will make the difference between a homemade game and a game created by a professionals’ team.

    If you’ve decided to help, you can contribute by whatever you choose in exchange for rewards -  take a look at the column on the right to see what’s available. The more you pledge, the better the rewards and the closer we are to producing this game.

    If we hit our target by the deadline, your credit card will be charged – nothing will be taken until then. If we don’t meet our target, you won’t be charged for anything, but, on the other hand, the world will never know about all these inherent possibilities of playing Sudoku.

    Please, also share our campaign with your colleagues, family and friends - anyone who you think might be interested in playing this game. Getting the word out is impossible without your help.

    Check out our website and follow us on facebook and twitter where you will find all the latest news of our progress.



    • Here we are!


    • Why Sudoku?

    Sudoku was born in the XVIII century and the modern Sudoku, the current version, was first published in 1979.

    Starting from 2005, it has gained a great media attention. It has become one of the most famous puzzles in a few years and this makes its own rules universally recognized. In addition, its numerical nature clears the problems related to language barriers.

    In recent times there have been numerous digital versions of Sudoku, but they have always been mere transpositions of the paper version, until today...


    • Why did Brain-e choose crowdfunding? And Indiegogo?

    We believe the risks involved with bringing Sudoku War to market are minimal at this stage:

    First, we are highly experienced in game design and programming.

    Secondly, Brain-e is already quite far along in the production process. In fact, the whole process of analysis has been done, as well as the study on suggestion and the dynamics of the championships.

    However, we are lucky to work closely with industry leading partners.

    We have extensive experience with logistics and shipping issues dealing with both domestic and international orders. We do not see fulfillment as a major risk in this project.

    Depending on the offers, we forecast  Sudoku Wars shipping start in February and we are excited to offer our loyal backers the first Sudoku Wars, born from these efforts!

    http://www.best-crowdfunding-websites.com/sudok...

      Thank You, we need your help

      Thank you so much for helping! Your pledge is hugely appreciated.

      Feel free to message us with any questions at sudokuwars@brain-egames.com and make sure you tell all your crazy friends on Facebook and Twitter to help us make this project a reality.


      FAQ

      Q: Will the game be free or paid?

      A: Their will be 2 versions of the game. One will be free and there will be a second premium version that will be paid. Exact price of the premium game has not yet been determined but it will be in line with other games of similar awesomeness.

      Q. When do we get the perks?

      A: That depends on the perk AND where in the world you are. For items that require physical shipment please give us 6 - 10 weeks beyond the end of the campaign. Please note that your perks could also come a lot sooner than that.

      Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?

      A: We are reading every single comment so please leave your t-shirt size or any other additional information you think we should know to make sure we get you your perks :)

      Q. Why don't I see my comment anymore?

      All comments that require a response will be recorded, responded to, and hopefully resolved :) We delete them because it makes it easier to track progress.

      Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

      A. Yes. You can donate the additional amount to bring you up to the tier level you want. Then, you will receive everything in that tier as well as all of the tier prizes below. Leave information in the comments so we can notate it and confirm that the donation information is correct.

story:
Short Summary

 

 

 Here is an example of why we want to use INDIEGOGO to improve the potential of our graphics engine. This work requires a lot of processing time and implementations of scripts and graphic shaders that help to have a better graphic quality. 

 

FACEBOOK PAGE CLICK HERE

INSTAGRAM PAGE CLICK HERE 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is the potential delay of the game. We'll do our best to release the game in the fixed time. If we need help, We also have external partners that will join us. In developing the game we have been obsessive with the details, because our main goal is creating a game world with a big experience of entertainment. If you have any question, please reach out to us in the community space. If you believe in our game project, please help us to make it possible

story:
Short Summary

I'm an old gamer and trying to give back to the community before I exit this world. Northern Arizona has no gaming conventions but Southern Arizona has two! I've already done a lot of the legwork but nothing is going to happen unless I can get it funded. It's a monster project but I'm totally dedicated to the cause.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $1,500 to secure the date at the Prescott Resort & Convention Center. The 4% Indegogo has been included to meet our goal. The additional money will register as an LLC and to have the "perks" printed and mailed. What you get are listed in the perks on the right.

The Impact

Prescott is a vibrant community and nearly everything is available here... except a gaming convention. Launching Polyhedracon will bring revenue and reputation to the city and notoriety as the home of a quality convention.

I've been gaming since 1973, roleplaying since 1981and have traveled the country attending conventions and have had the good fortune to play with the master, E. Gary Gygax, on his front porch in Lake Geneva.

I am the founder and managing member of Polyhedron Games LLC with over 30 products to our credit in nearly two years of operation.

Other Ways You Can Help

If there are folks in Arizona, especially in the Prescott area, Polyhedracon needs staff. All positions are open, including director. It'll probably fall in my lap but it's not a feather I need in my cap.

Gaming companies and companies that manufacture products of interest to gamers can send products to the con for the raffle. Individuals can also help in this way. Any articles can be sent to:

Polyhedracon
1902 E. Madrid St,
Dewey AZ 86327

Beyond that register for the con as an attendee, volunteer, gamemaster or dealer.
story_txt:
Short SummaryI'm an old gamer and trying to give back to the community before I exit this world. Northern Arizona has no gaming conventions but Southern Arizona has two! I've already done a lot of the legwork but nothing is going to happen unless I can get it funded. It's a monster project but I'm totally dedicated to the cause.

What We Need & What You GetWe need $1,500 to secure the date at the Prescott Resort & Convention Center. The 4% Indegogo has been included to meet our goal. The additional money will register as an LLC and to have the "perks" printed and mailed. What you get are listed in the perks on the right.

The ImpactPrescott is a vibrant community and nearly everything is available here... except a gaming convention. Launching Polyhedracon will bring revenue and reputation to the city and notoriety as the home of a quality convention.I've been gaming since 1973, roleplaying since 1981and have traveled the country attending conventions and have had the good fortune to play with the master, E. Gary Gygax, on his front porch in Lake Geneva.I am the founder and managing member of Polyhedron Games LLC with over 30 products to our credit in nearly two years of operation.

Other Ways You Can HelpIf there are folks in Arizona, especially in the Prescott area, Polyhedracon needs staff. All positions are open, including director. It'll probably fall in my lap but it's not a feather I need in my cap.Gaming companies and companies that manufacture products of interest to gamers can send products to the con for the raffle. Individuals can also help in this way. Any articles can be sent to:Polyhedracon1902 E. Madrid St,Dewey AZ 86327
Beyond that register for the con as an attendee, volunteer, gamemaster or dealer.

story:
Welcome!

I'm hdk from serious lemon, designer of Realm - Fantasy Warfare.

 

serious lemon are a new games company, based in Melbourne, Australia. Realm is our first game (hopefully of many) and the result of many, many hours of work (Really, it's just playing toy soldiers though).

 

We're inviting everyone who is interested in tabletop gaming to have a look at what we have to offer and to hopefully pitch in with your support to help us develop this game to its potential.

 

Anyone who would like to know more should head to www.realmfw.com where you can read the entire rules of the game and all there is to know about it. To unlock the Armies of Realm section, please enter the key:

 

indiegogo

 

into the box at the top of the site and click 'submit'. This is a temporary key which will expire once this campaign ends.

 

Why Realm?

Realm was designed from the bottom up with freedom in mind.

Freedom is inherent two-fold:

The first is, we offer the rules to you in a 'pay what you like' model. This gives you the freedom to support the game however you wish.

Secondly, the rules themselves are designed to be open and non-restrictive. Army creation can be seen as a somewhat modular process. Each army has access to the same equipment, the same monsters and the same worldly treasures ensuring quite limitless combinations.

Even the armies themselves can be mixed through the use of the rules for Mercenaries. Here's your chance to see your Giants and Halflings in action alongside each other. Or a powerful, but malicious Human Necromancer raising an undead host.



The rules themselves are simple and intuitive. The mechanics follow a 'set and go' turn-based process where at the start of a player's turn, they declare all of the orders for each unit that turn. The results of these orders are then played out over the course of the turn.

In Realm we use a D10 system for any characteristic checking. The results are therefor instantly known to both players without the need to lookup any tables. Not that we've done away with tables, they're just reserved for when we need to generate unique or random results.

 

What's on offer?

In line with our 'pay what you like' policy, everyone who pitches in at least $1 will receive a key for a 1 year subscription to the game. All contributors will also be acknowledged in a 'thank you' page on realmfw.com.

 

Following the indiegogo campaign, Realm will enter a public beta phase for two months, open only to the indeigogo backers. Anyone with early access to the beta will get their key directly after this campaign ends. Late access beta keys will be supplied after the first month has passed.

 

Following this two month period (slightly more, scheduled for July 1st), Realm will be released openly to the public.

 

Funding Goals?

 

$2000

At $2000 we will ink out art for the majority of the units in the game.

 

$5000

At $5000 we will not only have enough to fully flesh out the rules and artwork, but we will also begin work on producing the first models in a miniature range to complement the setting.

story:
A first-person shooter game in which three people try to escape from their city, where a virus or an unknown germ has spread,  leading to a change in the behaviour of most civilians, making them more brutal and hostile.

After extensive experiments and research over an entire month, trying to reach for information to limit the virus spread, the authorities could not figure out the cause of this virus or the way it spread. During this period, the number of infected people increased significantly and the situation became impossible to control. Fearing its spread to neighbouring cities, the central government decided to send in large military teams to eliminate all civilians within the city including civilians which have not shown infection symptoms yet, for fear that they might be carrying the virus inside.

So Adam, his daughter Lisa and their friend Frank decide to leave the city as soon as possible after this decision. It takes about 72 hours to get out of the city.

 

the game was chosen as one of the best games that participated in a joint competition held by Manga Productions (@manga_prd ) and Square Enix (@SquareEnix ).

 

 

Screenshots


 

 

 

 

1-Story mode: - three people are trying to escape from their city, in which an unknown virus has spread and led to the transformation of most civilians to the zombies.  So the government decided to send in special teams to eliminate the zombies within 72 hours before the virus spreads to other neighbouring cities.

 

2-Survival mode:-  

Must Survive against endless waves of attacking zombies.

Earning points from killing zombies, These points can be used to purchase weapons.
-There is no limit to the number of rounds.
-The game will end when the player has been incapacitated or killed by the Zombies.
-Zombies will drop power-ups such as Max Ammo, Nuke, or Freeze Time, making the round easier.
-The zombies' health grows rapidly, with each round.

 

 

The Last 72 Hour is being developed for the PC with gamepad support and will be made available through Steam and also for Xbox One If we reach the required amount in the campaign.

Other platforms, like Mac, Linux, and PS4  are considered but are not a high priority.

 

Try it now on gamejolt!

 

 

The demo version does not contain all features of the game, many features will be added during the next development stage.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AI for the soldiers

Hearing system:- Depends on the sound of shooting close to the enemy, as well as when the reload of weapons is done near the enemy.

Visibility:- Depends on the angles of the vision and the distance between the enemy and the player, as well as hiding behind the barriers leads to blocking the vision of the enemy.

Hiding behind barriers:- One of the features of the AI of the soldiers is hiding behind the barriers to avoid firing shots between him and the player.

Exploration and research:- Soldiers search for you and your friends if one of the members of the squad is killed.

 

AI for the zombies

Hearing system:- Depends on the sound of shooting close to the enemy, as well as when the reload of weapons is done near the enemy.

Visibility:- Depends on the angles of the vision and the distance between the enemy and the player, as well as hiding behind the barriers leads to blocking the vision of the enemy.

 

 

*  Hunt the animals and get their meat to survive during the escape, you must roast the meat after hunting to be able to use it.

* Look for different foods such as canapes, bread and other foods to keep your hunger energy.

* You can get drinking water through water bottles as well as through the wells in the farms to keep your thirst energy.

 

 

 

 

You find a menu in the game enables you to preview the weapons and modify them from the addition of pieces like a laser, silencer or remove them as you want.

 

 

 

 

We've introduced stretch goals in advance so you can see what to expect should we exceed our goal.  

Features:-

  • Helping the player to kill zombies and soldiers in the story mode.
  • Full control of the character to perform multiple tasks such as entering places where the player can not reach.
  • Adding 30 different animations to the character.
  • You can buy the character in the survival mode to help you kill the zombies.
  • Adding the character to the co-op mode in case we reach the goal.


 

       

      Features:-

      You must survive as much as possible and protect The wounded soldiers from your squad.

      • Endless waves of attacking zombies.
      • Endless waves of attacking Nazi soldiers.
      • Add weapons used during the World war II.
      • Add new maps from WW II.
      • Purchase weapons through points collected during play.

       

       

      The game will be launched on the Xbox One If we reach $ 9000.

       

      features:-

      • Play with your friends against the endless waves of the zombies.
      • Add new four maps.
      • you can choose many characters.

      The amount required to add this mode to the game is $ 14,000

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      The budget

       

       

      Challenges and risks

      The game has gone through advanced stages of development, so the risk in the game itself is minor, but the greater risk is not reaching our main goal in the campaign. In this case, the game will not be in the way we expect.  We worked during the last period on the development of the game without salaries for more than a year, during which we spent an amount of money on the development process close to the main objective of this campaign.  Therefore, your support is very important for us to progress rapidly in its development.

       

      And here is what you can do to minimize the risk:

      1. PICK A PERK
      2. SHARE WITH YOUR FRIENDS

       

      • Your name in the Credits
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds

       

      • Digital copy of the game 
      • your name in the credits 
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds

       

      • 2 Digital copy of the game for you and your friend (saving 3$ in the game)  
      • your name in the credits 
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds

       

      • 3 Digital copy of the game for you and  2 of your friend (saving 5$ in the game)  
      • your name in the credits 
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds

       

      • 2 Digital copy of the game for you and your friend (saving 3$ in the game)  
      • your name in the credits 
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds
      • Your name on a wall in the game!

       

      • 2 Digital copy of the game for you and your friend (saving 3$ in the game)  
      • your name in the credits 
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds
      • Your name on a wall in the game!
      • Put your Picture in the game!!

       

      • 2 Digital copy of the game for you and your friend (saving 3$ in the game).  
      • your name in the credits as a level designer.
      • HQ Desktop Backgrounds.
      • Your name on a wall in the game!
      • Put your Picture in the game!!
      • Become a level designer:- Work with the team to create a level of your design to the survival mode  by sending a (sketch for the level you want to design it  or A 3d level if you are a professional level designer )

       

       

      FAQ

      Will you make a version for PS4 & Linux?

       If we get to the main goals of the project it is possible to release the game on MAC or PlayStation platforms, but now they are not the priority.

       

      Is there a CD/DVD/BLURAY copy can we buy it ??

      with the size of our current team, we want to focus on developing the game more and not on other things that may harm the development process.

       

      Isn’t the amount required in the campaign very small compared to the game you are working on?

      It is true that the amount is very small compared to the size of the current project. Our basic estimations of the project are much more than the basic amount of the campaign.We have already spent on the project from our own savings an amount close to that of the primary campaign’s amount. So our first goal is to reach the primary goal of the campaign so that we can continue the process of developing the game on the same plan of development. Also, there are other stretch goals explained in the theme of the campaign that aims to add other improvements to the game and make it more fun.
      In case we exceed the basic amount of the project, the excess will be added to each of the stretch goals by certain amounts that allow us to finish each stretch goal reached.

       

      When will the game be released?

      Expect to be released during Q2 of 2018.

       

      Does the game support gamepad(joystick)?

      Of course, the game supports the Xbox Controller.

       

      I’m a YouTuber or a Game Streamer. Can I play your game on my Channel?

      Sure you can! You can try our demo here.

      https://gamejolt.com/games/thelast72hour/284417

       

      I’m a member of the press, how can I get in touch?

      We are happy to hear from you! Please send us a message through this Email

      goldenparrotstudio@gmail.com

       

       

      Our Channels

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      Arabic

       

       

       

       

       

      لعبة  ثلاثية الابعاد من منظور الشخص الاول يحاول فيها ثلاث اشخاص الهروب والبقاء على قيد الحياة أثناء الخروج من مدنيتهم  التي أنتشر فيها فايروس أو جرثومة مجهولة المصدر ادت الى تغير في سلوك أغلب المدنيين حيث اصبحت تصرفاتهم أكثر وحشية وعدائية

       

      ولم تستطع الجهات المسؤولة معرفة سبب هذا الفايروس أو الطريقة التي  انتشر بها بعد تجارب وأبحاث مكثفة على مدى شهر كامل للمحاولة في الوصول الى معلومات تحد من أنتشاره , خلال هذه الفترة أزداد عدد المصابين بشكل كبير جدأ وأصبح من المستحيل السيطرة على الوضع فيها  ,وخوفاً من أنتشاره الى المدن المجاورة قررت الحكومة المركزية ارسال فرق عسكرية كبيرة للقضاء على جميع المدنيين الموجودين داخل المدينة خوفاً من أن يكون بعض المدنين الغير مصابين حاملين للفايروس ولم تظهر عليهم الأعراض  لحد الان

       

      لذلك يقرر أدم وأبنته ليسا وصديقهم فرانك الخروج من المدينة بأسرع وقت ممكن بعد هذا القرار حيث يستغرق الخروج من المدنية حوالي   72 ساعة مشياً على الاقدام وخلال هذه الرحلة سيصادفون في طريقهم مجموعات كبيرة من المصابين المنتشرين في جميع الارجاء أضافة  الى الفرق العسكرية المنتشرة في الداخل والتي تعمل على قتل كل شئ  يصادفونه في طريقهم في محاولة منهم للقضاء على هذا الوباء بأي شكل من الاشكال 

       

       

       

         تم اختيار اللعبة كأحدى  أفضل الالعاب المشاركة في المسابقة التي اقامتها شركة مانجا للانتاج بمجال العاب الفيديو مع شركة سكوير اينكس العالمية

       

       

       

      بعض الصور من داخل اللعبة

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       يوجد في النسخة التجريبة الحالية  طورين قابلين للعب وهما

       

       طـــور القـصـة:  والذي حاول فيه ثلاث اشخاص الهروب من مدينتهم التى اصابها وباء غير  معروف أدى الى تحول المدنيين  الى زومبي

       

      طــور الـبــقــاء في هذا الطور من اللعب يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة اطول فترة ممكنة ومقاومة مجموعات الزومبي الغير منتهية ،فعند تقدمك في اللعب تصبح لديك قدرات أضافية ونقاط تمكنك من شراء اسلحة أكثر قوة تسًهل عليك القضاء على مجاميع الزومبي التي تصبح قوتها أكبر عند وصولك الى مستويات متقدمة في هذا الطور

       

       

       

       

          في حال وصولنا للمبلغ المطلوب في هذه الحملة  XBOX ONE كذلك لأجهزة ,  PC  يتم حالياً تطوير اللعبة لاجهزة ال

       

       مع دعم ليد التحكم من مايكروسوفت Steam  سيتم أصدار اللعبة على

       

       

      وسيتم أخذ المنصات الاخرى بالحسبان  كمنصة البلايستشين, لكن حالياً  نريد ان نركز على تطوير اللعبة بصورة أكبر 

       

       

       

       من خلال هذا الزر Gamejolt يمكنكم  تحميل النسخة التجريبية من اللعبة على موقع 

       

       

       قد لاتحوي النسخة التجريبية على جميع مميزات اللعبة ,هناك الكثير من المميزات والخصائص  التي سوف يتم أضافتها لاحقاً أثناء مراحل تطويرالمقبلة بأذن الله

       

       

        أدم :-  الشخصية الرئيسية في اللعبة وهو والد ( ليسا ) ، يحاول أدم وأبنته ليسا  وصديقه فرانك  الهروب من مدينتهم التي اصابها وباء غير معروف أدى الى  تحول أغلب المدنين الى زومبي  

       

       

       فرانك :-  صديق أدم  وأحد ابطال القصة  والذي سيكون مرشدك الاساسي للخروج من المدينة ومساعدتك على قتل الزومبي والجنود الذين سوف تواجههم في طريقك اثناء اللعبة

        

       

       

       لـيسـا :-  أحد الشخصيات الرئيسية في اللعبة وأبنة بطل القصة أدم والتي تحاول مع والدها الهروب من المدينة ومساعدتهم على قتل الزومبي 

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      حالياً تم أضافة شخصيات الزومبي الموجودة اعلاه في النسخة التجريبية للعبة  وسيتم أضافة شخصيات أخرى لاحقاً عند في النسخة الكاملة من اللعبة بأذن الله

       

       

       

       

       -:مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي 

       نظام (خاصية)السمع: - يعتمد على صوت اطلاق النار القريب من العدو في حال عدم وجود( كاتم صوت ) للسلاح كذلك في حالة عمل  اعادة  تذخير للسلاح بالقرب من العدو

       مـــدى الــرؤيــة : - يعتمد على زوايا الرؤية  وعلى المسافة بين العدو واللاعب , كذلك يعمل الاختباء خلف المجسمات على حجب الرؤية للعدو

      الاختباء خلف الحواجز :-  من أحد مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي للجنود وهو الاختباء خلف الحواجز والمجسمات الموجودة لتفادي الاطلاقات النارية بينه وبين اللاعب

      .الاستكشاف والبحث  :- يقوم الجنود بالبحث  عنك وأصدقائك  في حالة رؤية احد أفراد الفرقة مقتولاً 

       

       

        -:مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي للجنود

      نظام (خاصية)السمع   : - يعتمد على صوت اطلاق النار القريب من العدو في حال عدم وجود( كاتم صوت ) للسلاح كذلك في حالة عمل  اعادة  تذخير للسلاح بالقرب من العدو

        مـدى الرؤيـة  :- يعتمد على زوايا الرؤية  وعلى المسافة بين العدو واللاعب , كذلك يعمل الاختباء خلف المجسمات على حجب الرؤية للعدو 

       

       

       

       

       أضافة ميزة صيد الحيوانات أثناء اللعب والحصول على لحومها لتتمكن من البقاء على قيد الحياة أثناء الرحلة  حيث يجب شوي اللحوم بعد أصطيادها لتتمكن من أستخدامها كطعام لتبقى محافظاً على طاقة الجوع  لديك 

       

      البحث عن الطعام المختلف كالمعلبات والخبز وغيرها من الاطعمة للحفاظ على طاقة الجوع لديك

       

      يمكنك الحصول على مياة الشرب عن طريق قناني المياة وكذلك عن طريق الأبار الموجودة في المزارع للحفاظ على طاقة العطش لديك

       

       

       

       

       

        من ضمن مميزات اللعبة هو قابلية اللاعب على أضافة قطع أضافية للسلاح مثل ليزر تصويب او منظار او كاتم للصوت وغيرها من الاضافات

      حيث تجد واجهة كاملة داخل اللعبة تمكنك من أستعراض الاسلحة والتعديل عليها من أضافة قطع او ازالتها حسب رغبتك

       

       

       

       

        سوف يتم أضافة اطوار لعب جديدة كطور اللعب التعاوني الاونلاين 4 لاعبين أضافة الى طور الحرب العالمية الثانية كذلك شخصية الكلب  ماكس الى جميع أطوار اللعب حيث بأمكانك شراءه أثناء طور البقاء كشخصية مساعدة للاعب بالاضافة الى طور الاونلاين التعاوني

       

        -:المميزات  

      .المساعدة على قتل الزومبي والجنود اثناء طور القصة

      . تحكم كامل في الشخصية لأداء مهمات متعددة مثل الدخول الى اماكن لايمكن لللاعب الوصول اليها الا بأستخدام هذة الشخصية

       .أضـافـة 30 أنـمـيـشـن مخـتـلـف للشـخـصـية 

      .وجود الشخصية اثناء (طور البقاء) حيث يمكنك شراءه  لمساعدتك على قتل الزومبي أثناء هذا الطور

      .أضـافـة الشخـصـية الى طور اللعب التعاوني في حال وصـولـنـا الى الهدف

       

      المبلغ المطلوب لأضافة هذة الشخصية للعبة مع جميع المميزات لجميع الاطوار المختلفة  هو 4200 دولار 

       

      -:الفكرة الرئيسية لطور اللعب

      .هي البقاء على قيد الحياة اطول فترة ممكنة والحفاظ على حياة الجنود المصابين من فـرقـتـك

      :في هذا الطور يوجد لديك خيارين

       اما مــــواجـــهـــة مــوجـــات مــن  الجـنـود الالـمـان الـنــازيــيــن *

      أو  مـــواجــــهــــة مـــوجــــات مــن الــزومـــبــي *

       

      مميزات هذا الطور

      . أضافة مجموعة من الاسلحة  التي تم استخدامها أثناء الحرب  العالمية الثانية *

        . أضافة خرائط جديدة تحاكي  تلك الفترة من الحرب *

      . شراء الاسلحة والعتاد من خلال النقاط التي يتم جمعها اثناء اللعب *

       . مجموعة من القدرات والقوى التي تسهل  عليك القضاء على الاعداء والبقاء اطول  فترة ممكنة *

       

      الأسلحة التي سوف يتم أضافتها لهذا الطور 

      في هذا الطور سوف يتم أضافة أسلحة مختلفة من الحرب العالمية الثانية لمختلف الدول التي شاركت فيها كالاسلحة الامريكية والاسلحة الالمانية والاسلحة الروسية

       

      المبلغ المطلوب لأضافة طور اللعب الحالي مع جميع المميزات المذكورة هو 6000 دولار

       

       

       

      في حال وصولنا الى الهدف المطلوب وهو 9000 دولار XBOX ONE  سيتم أطلاق اللعبة على اجهزة الاكسبوكس ون  * 

       

       

       

       

      طـور اللـعـب الـتعـاونـي الاونـلايـن 4 لاعـبـين

      . يمكنك اختيار شخصيات مختلفة في طور اللعب التعاوني * 

      . أضافة أربعة خرائط لعب جديدة *

      . بمساعدة أصدقائك ROUNDS اللعب ضد مجموعات غير منتهية من الزومبي يعتمد على نظام الـ *

      المبلغ المطلوب لاضافة هذا الطور الى اللعبة هو 14.000 دولار

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      الميـزانـية

       

       

       

       

      الأخطار والتحديات

      اللعبة مرت بمراحل تطوير متقدمة لذلك فالاخطار في اللعبة ذاتها قليلة ، الخطر الاكبر هو عدم وصولنا الى الهدف الاساسي للحملة ففي هذه  الحالة لن تكون اللعبة بالشكل الذي نتوقعة ، خلال الفترة الماضية عملنا على تطوير اللعبة بدون رواتب لاكثر من سنة وقمنا خلالها بصرف مبالغ مالية قريبة من الهدف الاساسي للحملة على عملية التطوير لذلك فدعمكم مهم جدأ لنا للتقدم بصورة سريعة في  عملية التطوير

      في الحقيقة الجهد المبذول على اللعبة كبير جداً  حيث نقضي حوالي 14-15 ساعة في اليوم لتقديم أفضل شيئ ممكن من كل  النواحي سواء الجرافيكس او الاضاءة او طريقة اللعب  

       التحدي الاكبر لنا هو قدرتنا على الوصول الى هدفنا الرئيسي في الحملة لكي نستطيع المواصلة على نفس الخطة التي تم وضعها لعملية التطوير وهذا الامر لايمكننا  تجاوزه ألا بدعمكم لنا في هذة الحملة

       

        : وهذا ما يمكنكم فعله لتقليل المخاطر على المشروع  

       . أخـتـر أحـد الـمـكـافـأت الـتالـية وأشـتـر اللـعبـة  *

       .شارك اللعبة مع أصدقائك على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي  *

       

       

       

      Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * 

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  * 

       

       

       

        عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على النسخة الكاملة من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم* 

      Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * 

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *

       

       

      .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم * 

      . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * 

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  * 

       

       

       

        $ عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على ثلاث نسخ كاملة من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  , سـتـوفـر 5* 

      Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  * 

       

       

       

      .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *  

      . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *  

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *  

      .  سيتم كــتــابــة أســمــك عــلــى أحـــد الـجـــدران  داخــل اللعبة  * 

        

       

       

       

      .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *  

      . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *  

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكت  *  

      . تعاون مع الفريق لأضافة صورتك الخاصة في اللعبة داخل أحد المنازل عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة  *  

       

       

      .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *   

      . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كمصمم مستويات في قائمة اللعبة *   

      . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *   

       تعاون مع الفريق لتصميم مرحلتك الخاصة لطور البقاء في اللعبة وذلك بأرسال مخطط كامل للمرحلة التي تود تصميمها أو أرسالك  *   

      لمرحلة قمت بتصميمها بنفسك في حال كنت مصمم ثري دي محترف      

       

       

       

       

       

      هل ستعملون على نسخة للبلايستيشن ؟

      .سيتم أخذ المنصات الاخرى كمنصة البلايستيشن بنظر الاعتبار لكن حالياً نريد ان تهتم بتطوير اللعبة  بصورة أكبر 

       

         هل لديكم أهداف أضافية عندما تصلون لهدفكم الاساسي ؟

      نعم بالطبع لدينا أهداف أضافية سيتم أضافتها للعبة في حال وصلنا لهدفنا الاساسي في هذه الحملة  ,وهذه الاهداف تم شرحها بالتفصيل في بداية الحملة

       

       نستطيع شراءها ؟ CD/DVD/BLURAY هل هناك نسخة 

       لا,  مع حجم فريقنا الحالي  نريد التركيز على تطوير اللعبة بصورة أكبر وليس في امور أخرى قد تضر عملة التطوير

       

      أليس مبلغ الحملة الاساسي  قليل جدأ مقارنة باللعبة التي تعملون عليها الان ؟

        صحيح , المبلغ  قليل جداً مقارنة بحجم المشروع الحالي حيث ان تقديراتنا الاساسية للمشروع هي أكثر بكثير من المبلغ الاساسي للحملة , حيث تم انفاق مبلغ مقارب لمبلغ الحملة الريئسي على المشروع لحد الان من مدخراتنا الخاصة لذلك هدفنا الاول هو  وصولنا للهدف الريئسي للحملة   لكي نستطيع الاستمرار بعملية تطوير اللعبة على نفس الخطة  ,كذلك توجد اهداف اضافية أخرى تم شرحها في موضوع الحملة هي اضافة شخصيات واطوار لعب جديدة لجعل اللعبة اكثر متعة في حال تجاوزنا المبلغ الاساسي للمشروع 

       

      متى ستصدر اللعبة ؟

      سوف يتم أطلاق اللعبة كنسخة وصول مبكر على موقع ستيم في الربع الثاني من سنة 2018

       

      أنا كاتب صحفي للألعاب، كيف أستطيع التواصل معكم؟

       نحن سعيدون بتواصلك, راسلنا عن طريق الايميل الخاص بنا 

      goldenparrotstudio@gmail.com
