story_txt:
A first-person shooter game in which three people try to escape from their city, where a virus or an unknown germ has spread,  leading to a change in the behaviour of most civilians, making them more brutal and hostile.After extensive experiments and research over an entire month, trying to reach for information to limit the virus spread, the authorities could not figure out the cause of this virus or the way it spread. During this period, the number of infected people increased significantly and the situation became impossible to control. Fearing its spread to neighbouring cities, the central government decided to send in large military teams to eliminate all civilians within the city including civilians which have not shown infection symptoms yet, for fear that they might be carrying the virus inside.So Adam, his daughter Lisa and their friend Frank decide to leave the city as soon as possible after this decision. It takes about 72 hours to get out of the city. the game was chosen as one of the best games that participated in a joint competition held by Manga Productions (@manga_prd ) and Square Enix (@SquareEnix ).  Screenshots    1-Story mode: - three people are trying to escape from their city, in which an unknown virus has spread and led to the transformation of most civilians to the zombies.  So the government decided to send in special teams to eliminate the zombies within 72 hours before the virus spreads to other neighbouring cities. 2-Survival mode:-  Must Survive against endless waves of attacking zombies.Earning points from killing zombies, These points can be used to purchase weapons.-There is no limit to the number of rounds.-The game will end when the player has been incapacitated or killed by the Zombies.-Zombies will drop power-ups such as Max Ammo, Nuke, or Freeze Time, making the round easier.-The zombies' health grows rapidly, with each round.  The Last 72 Hour is being developed for the PC with gamepad support and will be made available through Steam and also for Xbox One If we reach the required amount in the campaign.Other platforms, like Mac, Linux, and PS4  are considered but are not a high priority. Try it now on gamejolt!  The demo version does not contain all features of the game, many features will be added during the next development stage.                AI for the soldiersHearing system:- Depends on the sound of shooting close to the enemy, as well as when the reload of weapons is done near the enemy.Visibility:- Depends on the angles of the vision and the distance between the enemy and the player, as well as hiding behind the barriers leads to blocking the vision of the enemy.Hiding behind barriers:- One of the features of the AI of the soldiers is hiding behind the barriers to avoid firing shots between him and the player.Exploration and research:- Soldiers search for you and your friends if one of the members of the squad is killed. AI for the zombiesHearing system:- Depends on the sound of shooting close to the enemy, as well as when the reload of weapons is done near the enemy.Visibility:- Depends on the angles of the vision and the distance between the enemy and the player, as well as hiding behind the barriers leads to blocking the vision of the enemy.  *  Hunt the animals and get their meat to survive during the escape, you must roast the meat after hunting to be able to use it.* Look for different foods such as canapes, bread and other foods to keep your hunger energy.* You can get drinking water through water bottles as well as through the wells in the farms to keep your thirst energy.    You find a menu in the game enables you to preview the weapons and modify them from the addition of pieces like a laser, silencer or remove them as you want.    We've introduced stretch goals in advance so you can see what to expect should we exceed our goal.  Features:-
Helping the player to kill zombies and soldiers in the story mode.
Full control of the character to perform multiple tasks such as entering places where the player can not reach.
Adding 30 different animations to the character.
You can buy the character in the survival mode to help you kill the zombies.
Adding the character to the co-op mode in case we reach the goal.
  Features:-You must survive as much as possible and protect The wounded soldiers from your squad.
Endless waves of attacking zombies.
Endless waves of attacking Nazi soldiers.
Add weapons used during the World war II.
Add new maps from WW II.
Purchase weapons through points collected during play.
  The game will be launched on the Xbox One If we reach $ 9000. features:-
Play with your friends against the endless waves of the zombies.
Add new four maps.
you can choose many characters.
The amount required to add this mode to the game is $ 14,000        The budget  Challenges and risksThe game has gone through advanced stages of development, so the risk in the game itself is minor, but the greater risk is not reaching our main goal in the campaign. In this case, the game will not be in the way we expect.  We worked during the last period on the development of the game without salaries for more than a year, during which we spent an amount of money on the development process close to the main objective of this campaign.  Therefore, your support is very important for us to progress rapidly in its development. And here is what you can do to minimize the risk:

  FAQWill you make a version for PS4 & Linux? If we get to the main goals of the project it is possible to release the game on MAC or PlayStation platforms, but now they are not the priority. Is there a CD/DVD/BLURAY copy can we buy it ??with the size of our current team, we want to focus on developing the game more and not on other things that may harm the development process. Isn’t the amount required in the campaign very small compared to the game you are working on?It is true that the amount is very small compared to the size of the current project. Our basic estimations of the project are much more than the basic amount of the campaign.We have already spent on the project from our own savings an amount close to that of the primary campaign’s amount. So our first goal is to reach the primary goal of the campaign so that we can continue the process of developing the game on the same plan of development. Also, there are other stretch goals explained in the theme of the campaign that aims to add other improvements to the game and make it more fun.In case we exceed the basic amount of the project, the excess will be added to each of the stretch goals by certain amounts that allow us to finish each stretch goal reached. When will the game be released?Expect to be released during Q2 of 2018. Does the game support gamepad(joystick)?Of course, the game supports the Xbox Controller. I’m a YouTuber or a Game Streamer. Please send us a message through this Emailgoldenparrotstudio@gmail.com  Our Channels             Arabic     لعبة  ثلاثية الابعاد من منظور الشخص الاول يحاول فيها ثلاث اشخاص الهروب والبقاء على قيد الحياة أثناء الخروج من مدنيتهم  التي أنتشر فيها فايروس أو جرثومة مجهولة المصدر ادت الى تغير في سلوك أغلب المدنيين حيث اصبحت تصرفاتهم أكثر وحشية وعدائية ولم تستطع الجهات المسؤولة معرفة سبب هذا الفايروس أو الطريقة التي  انتشر بها بعد تجارب وأبحاث مكثفة على مدى شهر كامل للمحاولة في الوصول الى معلومات تحد من أنتشاره , خلال هذه الفترة أزداد عدد المصابين بشكل كبير جدأ وأصبح من المستحيل السيطرة على الوضع فيها  ,وخوفاً من أنتشاره الى المدن المجاورة قررت الحكومة المركزية ارسال فرق عسكرية كبيرة للقضاء على جميع المدنيين الموجودين داخل المدينة خوفاً من أن يكون بعض المدنين الغير مصابين حاملين للفايروس ولم تظهر عليهم الأعراض  لحد الان لذلك يقرر أدم وأبنته ليسا وصديقهم فرانك الخروج من المدينة بأسرع وقت ممكن بعد هذا القرار حيث يستغرق الخروج من المدنية حوالي   72 ساعة مشياً على الاقدام وخلال هذه الرحلة سيصادفون في طريقهم مجموعات كبيرة من المصابين المنتشرين في جميع الارجاء أضافة  الى الفرق العسكرية المنتشرة في الداخل والتي تعمل على قتل كل شئ  يصادفونه في طريقهم في محاولة منهم للقضاء على هذا الوباء بأي شكل من الاشكال       تم اختيار اللعبة كأحدى  أفضل الالعاب المشاركة في المسابقة التي اقامتها شركة مانجا للانتاج بمجال العاب الفيديو مع شركة سكوير اينكس العالمية   بعض الصور من داخل اللعبة

على  وسيتم أخذ المنصات الاخرى بالحسبان  كمنصة البلايستشين, لكن حالياً  نريد ان نركز على تطوير اللعبة بصورة أكبر     من خلال هذا الزر Gamejolt يمكنكم  تحميل النسخة التجريبية من اللعبة على موقع    قد لاتحوي النسخة التجريبية على جميع مميزات اللعبة ,هناك الكثير من المميزات والخصائص  التي سوف يتم أضافتها لاحقاً أثناء مراحل تطويرالمقبلة بأذن الله    أدم :-  الشخصية الرئيسية في اللعبة وهو والد ( ليسا ) ، يحاول أدم وأبنته ليسا  وصديقه فرانك  الهروب من مدينتهم التي اصابها وباء غير معروف أدى الى  تحول أغلب المدنين الى زومبي     فرانك :-  صديق أدم  وأحد ابطال القصة  والذي سيكون مرشدك الاساسي للخروج من المدينة ومساعدتك على قتل الزومبي والجنود الذين سوف تواجههم في طريقك اثناء اللعبة     لـيسـا :-  أحد الشخصيات الرئيسية في اللعبة وأبنة بطل القصة أدم والتي تحاول مع والدها الهروب من المدينة ومساعدتهم على قتل الزومبي        حالياً تم أضافة شخصيات الزومبي الموجودة اعلاه في النسخة التجريبية للعبة  وسيتم أضافة شخصيات أخرى لاحقاً عند في النسخة الكاملة من اللعبة بأذن الله     -:مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي  نظام (خاصية)السمع: - يعتمد على صوت اطلاق النار القريب من العدو في حال عدم وجود( كاتم صوت ) للسلاح كذلك في حالة عمل  اعادة  تذخير للسلاح بالقرب من العدو مـــدى الــرؤيــة : - يعتمد على زوايا الرؤية  وعلى المسافة بين العدو واللاعب , كذلك يعمل الاختباء خلف المجسمات على حجب الرؤية للعدوالاختباء خلف الحواجز :-  من أحد مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي للجنود وهو الاختباء خلف الحواجز والمجسمات الموجودة لتفادي الاطلاقات النارية بينه وبين اللاعب.الاستكشاف والبحث  :- يقوم الجنود بالبحث  عنك وأصدقائك  في حالة رؤية احد أفراد الفرقة مقتولاً     -:مميزات الذكاء الاصطناعي للجنودنظام (خاصية)السمع   : - يعتمد على صوت اطلاق النار القريب من العدو في حال عدم وجود( كاتم صوت ) للسلاح كذلك في حالة عمل  اعادة  تذخير للسلاح بالقرب من العدو  مـدى الرؤيـة  :- يعتمد على زوايا الرؤية  وعلى المسافة بين العدو واللاعب , كذلك يعمل الاختباء خلف المجسمات على حجب الرؤية للعدو      أضافة ميزة صيد الحيوانات أثناء اللعب والحصول على لحومها لتتمكن من البقاء على قيد الحياة أثناء الرحلة  حيث يجب شوي اللحوم بعد أصطيادها لتتمكن من أستخدامها كطعام لتبقى محافظاً على طاقة الجوع  لديك  البحث عن الطعام المختلف كالمعلبات والخبز وغيرها من الاطعمة للحفاظ على طاقة الجوع لديك يمكنك الحصول على مياة الشرب عن طريق قناني المياة وكذلك عن طريق الأبار الموجودة في المزارع للحفاظ على طاقة العطش لديك        من ضمن مميزات اللعبة هو قابلية اللاعب على أضافة قطع أضافية للسلاح مثل ليزر تصويب او منظار او كاتم للصوت وغيرها من الاضافاتحيث تجد واجهة كاملة داخل اللعبة تمكنك من أستعراض الاسلحة والتعديل عليها من أضافة قطع او ازالتها حسب رغبتك      سوف يتم أضافة اطوار لعب جديدة كطور اللعب التعاوني الاونلاين 4 لاعبين أضافة الى طور الحرب العالمية الثانية كذلك شخصية الكلب  ماكس الى جميع أطوار اللعب حيث بأمكانك شراءه أثناء طور البقاء كشخصية مساعدة للاعب بالاضافة الى طور الاونلاين التعاوني   -:المميزات  .المساعدة على قتل الزومبي والجنود اثناء طور القصة. تحكم كامل في الشخصية لأداء مهمات متعددة مثل الدخول الى اماكن لايمكن لللاعب الوصول اليها الا بأستخدام هذة الشخصية .أضـافـة 30 أنـمـيـشـن مخـتـلـف للشـخـصـية .وجود الشخصية اثناء (طور البقاء) حيث يمكنك شراءه  لمساعدتك على قتل الزومبي أثناء هذا الطور.أضـافـة الشخـصـية الى طور اللعب التعاوني في حال وصـولـنـا الى الهدف المبلغ المطلوب لأضافة هذة الشخصية للعبة مع جميع المميزات لجميع الاطوار المختلفة  هو 4200 دولار  -:الفكرة الرئيسية لطور اللعب.هي البقاء على قيد الحياة اطول فترة ممكنة والحفاظ على حياة الجنود المصابين من فـرقـتـك :في هذا الطور يوجد لديك خيارين اما مــــواجـــهـــة مــوجـــات مــن  الجـنـود الالـمـان الـنــازيــيــن *أو  مـــواجــــهــــة مـــوجــــات مــن الــزومـــبــي * مميزات هذا الطور . أضافة مجموعة من الاسلحة  التي تم استخدامها أثناء الحرب  العالمية الثانية *  . أضافة خرائط جديدة تحاكي  تلك الفترة من الحرب *. شراء الاسلحة والعتاد من خلال النقاط التي يتم جمعها اثناء اللعب * . مجموعة من القدرات والقوى التي تسهل  عليك القضاء على الاعداء والبقاء اطول  فترة ممكنة * الأسلحة التي سوف يتم أضافتها لهذا الطور في هذا الطور سوف يتم أضافة أسلحة مختلفة من الحرب العالمية الثانية لمختلف الدول التي شاركت فيها كالاسلحة الامريكية والاسلحة الالمانية والاسلحة الروسية المبلغ المطلوب لأضافة طور اللعب الحالي مع جميع المميزات المذكورة هو 6000 دولار   في حال وصولنا الى الهدف المطلوب وهو 9000 دولار XBOX ONE  سيتم أطلاق اللعبة على اجهزة الاكسبوكس ون  *     طـور اللـعـب الـتعـاونـي الاونـلايـن 4 لاعـبـين. يمكنك اختيار شخصيات مختلفة في طور اللعب التعاوني * . أضافة أربعة خرائط لعب جديدة *. بمساعدة أصدقائك ROUNDS اللعب ضد مجموعات غير منتهية من الزومبي يعتمد على نظام الـ *المبلغ المطلوب لاضافة هذا الطور الى اللعبة هو 14.000 دولار       الميـزانـية    الأخطار والتحدياتاللعبة مرت بمراحل تطوير متقدمة لذلك فالاخطار في اللعبة ذاتها قليلة ، الخطر الاكبر هو عدم وصولنا الى الهدف الاساسي للحملة ففي هذه  الحالة لن تكون اللعبة بالشكل الذي نتوقعة ، خلال الفترة الماضية عملنا على تطوير اللعبة بدون رواتب لاكثر من سنة وقمنا خلالها بصرف مبالغ مالية قريبة من الهدف الاساسي للحملة على عملية التطوير لذلك فدعمكم مهم جدأ لنا للتقدم بصورة سريعة في  عملية التطوير في الحقيقة الجهد المبذول على اللعبة كبير جداً  حيث نقضي حوالي 14-15 ساعة في اليوم لتقديم أفضل شيئ ممكن من كل  النواحي سواء الجرافيكس او الاضاءة او طريقة اللعب   التحدي الاكبر لنا هو قدرتنا على الوصول الى هدفنا الرئيسي في الحملة لكي نستطيع المواصلة على نفس الخطة التي تم وضعها لعملية التطوير وهذا الامر لايمكننا  تجاوزه ألا بدعمكم لنا في هذة الحملة   : وهذا ما يمكنكم فعله لتقليل المخاطر على المشروع   . أخـتـر أحـد الـمـكـافـأت الـتالـية وأشـتـر اللـعبـة  * .شارك اللعبة مع أصدقائك على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي  *   Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *      عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على النسخة الكاملة من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم* Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *  .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم * . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة * . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *      $ عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على ثلاث نسخ كاملة من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  , سـتـوفـر 5* Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *. سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *    .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *  . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *  . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *  .  سيتم كــتــابــة أســمــك عــلــى أحـــد الـجـــدران  داخــل اللعبة  *      .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *  . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كداعم للمشروع في قائمة اللعبة *  . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكت  *  . تعاون مع الفريق لأضافة صورتك الخاصة في اللعبة داخل أحد المنازل عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة  *    .  عند أختيارك لهذة المكافئة سوف تحصل على نسختين كاملتين من اللعبة عند صدورها على متجر ستيم  *   . Credits سيتم أضافة اسمك كمصمم مستويات في قائمة اللعبة *   . سوف تحصل على خلفيات خاصة باللعبة لسطح المكتب  *    تعاون مع الفريق لتصميم مرحلتك الخاصة لطور البقاء في اللعبة وذلك بأرسال مخطط كامل للمرحلة التي تود تصميمها أو أرسالك  *   لمرحلة قمت بتصميمها بنفسك في حال كنت مصمم ثري دي محترف           هل ستعملون على نسخة للبلايستيشن ؟.سيتم أخذ المنصات الاخرى كمنصة البلايستيشن بنظر الاعتبار لكن حالياً نريد ان تهتم بتطوير اللعبة  بصورة أكبر     هل لديكم أهداف أضافية عندما تصلون لهدفكم الاساسي ؟نعم بالطبع لدينا أهداف أضافية سيتم أضافتها للعبة في حال وصلنا لهدفنا الاساسي في هذه الحملة  ,وهذه الاهداف تم شرحها بالتفصيل في بداية الحملة  نستطيع شراءها ؟ CD/DVD/BLURAY هل هناك نسخة  لا,  مع حجم فريقنا الحالي  نريد التركيز على تطوير اللعبة بصورة أكبر وليس في امور أخرى قد تضر عملة التطوير أليس مبلغ الحملة الاساسي  قليل جدأ مقارنة باللعبة التي تعملون عليها الان ؟  صحيح , المبلغ  قليل جداً مقارنة بحجم المشروع الحالي حيث ان تقديراتنا الاساسية للمشروع هي أكثر بكثير من المبلغ الاساسي للحملة , حيث تم انفاق مبلغ مقارب لمبلغ الحملة الريئسي على المشروع لحد الان من مدخراتنا الخاصة لذلك هدفنا الاول هو  وصولنا للهدف الريئسي للحملة   لكي نستطيع الاستمرار بعملية تطوير اللعبة على نفس الخطة  ,كذلك توجد اهداف اضافية أخرى تم شرحها في موضوع الحملة هي اضافة شخصيات واطوار لعب جديدة لجعل اللعبة اكثر متعة في حال تجاوزنا المبلغ الاساسي للمشروع  متى ستصدر اللعبة ؟ سوف يتم أطلاق اللعبة كنسخة وصول مبكر على موقع ستيم في الربع الثاني من سنة 2018 أنا كاتب صحفي للألعاب، كيف أستطيع التواصل معكم؟ نحن سعيدون بتواصلك, راسلنا عن طريق الايميل الخاص بنا goldenparrotstudio@gmail.com  أنا لاعب على يوتيوب أو توتش، هل أستطيع لعب لعبتكم؟بالطبع! بامكانك تجربة النسخة التجريبية عن طريق هذا الرابطhttps://gamejolt.com/games/thelast72hour/284417 تابعنا على

story:
We have created the Alice Of Wonderland Trading Card Game with easy and simple game rules for all age levels to be able to play. We know there are a lot of other trading card games out there, but we wanted to come up with a game that everyone will recognize, and also be easy to play right out of the box. We believe our Alice Of Wonderland Trading Card Game will do just that!

Our game consists of characters based on a Steampunk Wonderland world, and also includes other fairy tale characters in the public domain that have been re-imagined. The trading card game for this project consists of 2 kingdom "core" decks, The Kingdom of Hearts, and The Kingdom of Roses. Both of these kingdom decks are included in the minimum funding goal needed to be printed. Once this goal is reached, we can aim for the stretch goals that will open up more goods that will make the game a more interesting and rewarding experience.


We are a graphic design firm consisting of 2 art and design studios, Sketch2Draw and FotogSyn, based out of Virginia. Our background consists of illustration, comic books, game design, commercial graphic design, event planning, branding, and entertainment production.

Sketch2Draw is responsible for a lot of the cool art you see in the cards, and is constantly busy creating new artwork for the game. Sketch2Draw has been designing character concepts in the comic book and fantasy genre for over 20 years, and has now just teamed up with FotogSyn to create this new trading card game. Sketh2Draw also creates video tutorials on Youtube, and operates sketch2draw.com.

FotogSyn is a graphic design studio (also helping in a lot of the cool art you'll be seeing in Alice of Wonderland). They deal in exclusive prints in a very limited quantity. Their focus is more on the quality and collectibility of items and merchandise, instead of just over saturating the market. FotogSyn has a background in the comic book illustration, character design, story creation, graphics, inking, marketing and product placement, and offers time-released limited edition prints available at comic book conventions and through their website, fotogsyn.com. 

We need your support to fund and make this game a reality. The funding for this trading card game will help with distribution and production of the game. The more it gets funded, the more things we will be able to produce!

  • We need to raise $4,000 to start. This will help create both the Kingdom of Hearts and the Kingdom of Roses core decks.
  • Our stretch goals start at $50,000 which we will release foil trading cards.
  • We will release exclusive rarity cards only at Wizard World St. Louis in April. More exclusive limited edition cards will be released at future Wizard World Comic Cons during the year.
  • We are offering limited 11x17 prints along with certain tier levels, each print is signed, numbered, stamped, with certificate of authenticity. 
  • Extra goodies may be created if we exceed our funding goals, which may include game mats and game coins. The first stretch goal to reach is the foil cards.

*SHIPPING

Domestic shipping within the U.S. is included in all the perks, please note that international shipping is added for shipping to other countries and will be adjusted at the end of the campaign.

The Game

One Alice Of Wonderland "Core" Trading Card deck consists of:

10 Character Cards - Consist of Major and Minor characters within the Alice of Wonderland Trading Card Game.

28 Booster Cards - Energy Cards

16 Element Cards - 4 Specialty Cards, 4 Gear Cards, 4 Weapons Cards and 4 Healing Cards.

 A total of 54 trading cards within these Alice of Wonderland "Core" Decks

Each deck also has an enclosed AoW case that your cards come in.

There is 1 Kingdom of the 8 Kingdoms in each AoW Trading Card Deck offered. Each card is sized to fit within a traditional trading card sleeve so you can protect your cards.


The Rules

Alice Of Wonderland is a multi-player game with 2 to 8 players. Each player chooses a kingdom within Alice Of Wonderland.

You need a minimum of 54 cards (one core deck) per player to play, but you can have a maximum of 108 cards in any playable game deck.

The goal is to win in one of two ways - by eliminating your opponent’s 50 life points to zero, or by you gaining 50 commerce points. Whichever occurs first, wins the game! 

This game involves using weapons cards, healing cards, equipment cards, energy cards, knowledge cards, and experience cards. 

There are 8 core kingdoms within Wonderland. The Kingdom of Hearts and the Kingdom of Roses are the first 2 kingdoms to be released of the 8 kingdoms. 

The 8 core kingdoms are:

Kingdom of Hearts - This deck is being offered here!

Kingdom of Clubs

Kingdom of Steel

Kingdom of Diamonds

Kingdom of Winter

Kingdom of Fire

Kingdom of Roses - This deck is being offered here!

Pirate Kingdom - Release date November 2014

***Notes***

Other kingdom decks will be released at AliceOfWonderland.com and PiratesOfNeverland.com and individual cards in denominations of 54 and 108 will be time-released or released at Wizard World Comic Conventions during 2014.

T-SHIRTS

These t-shirts come only in BLACK.  They have a white Alice of Wonderland Logo on the front.  They come is sizes Small, Medium, Large and X-Large.  If you would like a larger size. 2XL will be an added $2.00, and 3XL will be an added $4.00 to your order.

Is this cool, or WHAT!!!


The Cards

These are a few of the cards currently being created for the game. The Gallery Tab will be updated with new card designs as they are completed and released. 

*All of the cards will feature the same back design (first card shown).


More cards will be designed and posted for you to view them, but given the scope of this project some of the cards may not be posted during the campaign but they will be completed by the estimated date of ordering and shipping them. We will post sketches of them instead, so you can see what they will look like before final rendering in color.

***Notes***

These cards are only samples, the design, art, and text may change. Final design may differ.


PRINTS

The prints offered here are 11x17. Each of our prints come with a serial number just for that print.  Each print is stamped on the back and signed.  On the front of the print, each print is numbered.  Once the print reaches it end run. This print is no longer available.

Some of the exclusive prints we are offering!

From left to right: Cheshire Cat, Alice and the White Rabbit, Dark Elf Queen, the Pirate King, the Pirate Queen.


Here are some of the stretch goals for this campaign. More may be added if we exceed some goals, which can be added to your pledges later on.

  • At $50,000, we can begin to add special foil decks and cards to the game!
  • Front design on some cards will get foil.

  • At $65,000, we will be able to add game mats and coins to make this game experience really fun and enjoyable, plus these mats and coins will be collector's items.
  • The mats will feature card placement areas with a unique design over the entire mat.

***Note***

More stretch goals will be added if we go over $70,000 in pledges.


There are many ways to support us! 

  • Pledge a tier!
  • Share with friends and family! 
  • Share on your social media networks! (Facebook, Twitter, etc)
  • Visit us at the Wizard World Comic Conventions if you can! 
  • Participate as a game player at our VIP event during Wizard World Philadelphia in June!

We are very excited to be a part of this trading card game project!

Let's reach those goals!
story_txt:
We have created the Alice Of Wonderland Trading Card Game with easy and simple game rules for all age levels to be able to play. We know there are a lot of other trading card games out there, but we wanted to come up with a game that everyone will recognize, and also be easy to play right out of the box. We believe our Alice Of Wonderland Trading Card Game will do just that!Our game consists of characters based on a Steampunk Wonderland world, and also includes other fairy tale characters in the public domain that have been re-imagined. The trading card game for this project consists of 2 kingdom "core" decks, The Kingdom of Hearts, and The Kingdom of Roses. Both of these kingdom decks are included in the minimum funding goal needed to be printed. Once this goal is reached, we can aim for the stretch goals that will open up more goods that will make the game a more interesting and rewarding experience.We are a graphic design firm consisting of 2 art and design studios, Sketch2Draw and FotogSyn, based out of Virginia. Our background consists of illustration, comic books, game design, commercial graphic design, event planning, branding, and entertainment production.Sketch2Draw is responsible for a lot of the cool art you see in the cards, and is constantly busy creating new artwork for the game. Sketch2Draw has been designing character concepts in the comic book and fantasy genre for over 20 years, and has now just teamed up with FotogSyn to create this new trading card game. Sketh2Draw also creates video tutorials on Youtube, and operates sketch2draw.com.FotogSyn is a graphic design studio (also helping in a lot of the cool art you'll be seeing in Alice of Wonderland). They deal in exclusive prints in a very limited quantity. Their focus is more on the quality and collectibility of items and merchandise, instead of just over saturating the market. FotogSyn has a background in the comic book illustration, character design, story creation, graphics, inking, marketing and product placement, and offers time-released limited edition prints available at comic book conventions and through their website, fotogsyn.com. We need your support to fund and make this game a reality. The funding for this trading card game will help with distribution and production of the game. The more it gets funded, the more things we will be able to produce!
We need to raise $4,000 to start. This will help create both the Kingdom of Hearts and the Kingdom of Roses core decks.
Our stretch goals start at $50,000 which we will release foil trading cards.
We will release exclusive rarity cards only at Wizard World St. Louis in April. More exclusive limited edition cards will be released at future Wizard World Comic Cons during the year.
We are offering limited 11x17 prints along with certain tier levels, each print is signed, numbered, stamped, with certificate of authenticity. 
Extra goodies may be created if we exceed our funding goals, which may include game mats and game coins. The first stretch goal to reach is the foil cards.
*SHIPPINGDomestic shipping within the U.S. is included in all the perks, please note that international shipping is added for shipping to other countries and will be adjusted at the end of the campaign.The GameOne Alice Of Wonderland "Core" Trading Card deck consists of:10 Character Cards - Consist of Major and Minor characters within the Alice of Wonderland Trading Card Game.28 Booster Cards - Energy Cards16 Element Cards - 4 Specialty Cards, 4 Gear Cards, 4 Weapons Cards and 4 Healing Cards. A total of 54 trading cards within these Alice of Wonderland "Core" DecksEach deck also has an enclosed AoW case that your cards come in.There is 1 Kingdom of the 8 Kingdoms in each AoW Trading Card Deck offered. Each card is sized to fit within a traditional trading card sleeve so you can protect your cards.The RulesAlice Of Wonderland is a multi-player game with 2 to 8 players. Each player chooses a kingdom within Alice Of Wonderland.You need a minimum of 54 cards (one core deck) per player to play, but you can have a maximum of 108 cards in any playable game deck.The goal is to win in one of two ways - by eliminating your opponent’s 50 life points to zero, or by you gaining 50 commerce points. Whichever occurs first, wins the game! This game involves using weapons cards, healing cards, equipment cards, energy cards, knowledge cards, and experience cards. There are 8 core kingdoms within Wonderland. The Kingdom of Hearts and the Kingdom of Roses are the first 2 kingdoms to be released of the 8 kingdoms. The 8 core kingdoms are:Kingdom of Hearts - This deck is being offered here!Kingdom of ClubsKingdom of SteelKingdom of DiamondsKingdom of WinterKingdom of FireKingdom of Roses - This deck is being offered here!Pirate Kingdom - Release date November 2014***Notes***Other kingdom decks will be released at AliceOfWonderland.com and PiratesOfNeverland.com and individual cards in denominations of 54 and 108 will be time-released or released at Wizard World Comic Conventions during 2014.T-SHIRTSThese t-shirts come only in BLACK.  They have a white Alice of Wonderland Logo on the front.  They come is sizes Small, Medium, Large and X-Large.  If you would like a larger size. 2XL will be an added $2.00, and 3XL will be an added $4.00 to your order.Is this cool, or WHAT!!!The CardsThese are a few of the cards currently being created for the game. The Gallery Tab will be updated with new card designs as they are completed and released. *All of the cards will feature the same back design (first card shown).More cards will be designed and posted for you to view them, but given the scope of this project some of the cards may not be posted during the campaign but they will be completed by the estimated date of ordering and shipping them. We will post sketches of them instead, so you can see what they will look like before final rendering in color.***Notes***These cards are only samples, the design, art, and text may change. Final design may differ.PRINTSThe prints offered here are 11x17. Each of our prints come with a serial number just for that print.  Each print is stamped on the back and signed.  On the front of the print, each print is numbered.  Once the print reaches it end run. This print is no longer available.Some of the exclusive prints we are offering!From left to right: Cheshire Cat, Alice and the White Rabbit, Dark Elf Queen, the Pirate King, the Pirate Queen.Here are some of the stretch goals for this campaign. More may be added if we exceed some goals, which can be added to your pledges later on.

At $50,000, we can begin to add special foil decks and cards to the game!

Front design on some cards will get foil.


At $65,000, we will be able to add game mats and coins to make this game experience really fun and enjoyable, plus these mats and coins will be collector's items.

The mats will feature card placement areas with a unique design over the entire mat.
***Note***More stretch goals will be added if we go over $70,000 in pledges.There are many ways to support us! 
Pledge a tier!
Share with friends and family! 
Share on your social media networks! (Facebook, Twitter, etc)
Visit us at the Wizard World Comic Conventions if you can! 
Participate as a game player at our VIP event during Wizard World Philadelphia in June!
We are very excited to be a part of this trading card game project!Let's reach those goals!

story:
A puzzle game where your objective is to scare every tenant that is meddling in your house. Use the powers at your disposition to haunt and scare them. Be a Poltergeist!


We are on Steam greenlight as well! Click on the image to go there!

Welcome to the Poltergeist: Pixelated Horror Indiegogo Campaign. This campaign's objective is to give us the resources needed to be able to help us complete and polish our videogame project "Poltergeist: Pixelated Horror".

With your support, we will be able to have a very polished and refined product for everyone to enjoy. It will greatly help us to complete our vision we have for this project.

Have you ever wondered what it feels to be a ghostly being?

You have always lived happily in your manor. A manor that you managed to obtain with a lot of hard work and many personal sacrifices. Naturally you don't want anyone else to take care of it, not even in death!

But now, after your demise, many tenants have taken over it, and this is intolerable to you. Luckily, your love for your manor has granted you powers that will help you get rid of those pesky individuals.

Watch them run and scream, scaring them using your intelligence, wit, and with the use of powers like possessions, spectres, altering objects and more.

Have fun and play with the occult... and become a Poltergeist!

Poltergeist is a puzzle game for PC/Mac/Linux in which you are a ghost named Henry B. Knight. In which you will scare the tennants currently living in your house, so you can have some peace at last in the afterlife.

As a game, it will feature:

  • A total of 60+ levels. These levels will occur in different time periods of the history of the manor.

  • A variety of powers for you to control in each level: Lifting objects, possessing objects, invoking spectres and more.

  • Enemies, like priests and ghost hunters that will getting in your path of getting rid of everyone inside your manor. This will also include special "boss" characters in each time period.

Good question! Allow us to explain.

Poltergeist, as a puzzle game, will be divided in levels. In each level you will have a limited number of powers for you to use. You must use these powers with intelligence and precision, so you can haunt all the tenants the are in the level.

But be careful, if you use all of your powers in a level, and not all of the tenants were haunted, you will lose. You must be careful to choose your power and where/when to use them!

Usually powers will work in a specific "room". The execution of a power in a room will not afect characters who are outside of that room. This is important, because there are some powers that can affect various rooms with just one use.

There will be also enemies. Priests, Ghost Hunters and other "Boss" characters are tougher thant normal ones, and they can and will block certain powers. If you use a power near one of these special characters, they will block it and it won't scare anyone.

The objective of Poltergeist is not of "seriousness". It is a very light hearted take on the ghost concept by becoming the ghost itself.

It is designed to be fun, to feel more mischievous than actually evil. Pretty much like "mustache twirling evil" type. More of a playful little child that smirks every time he/she makes a prank on his neighbor.

It is also not a game of mad skill and twitching. You will carefuly execute everyone of your actions carefully to finish each level. Think of "Lemmings", but without the extra pressure that game has (n_n).

  1. Alert: Call the nearest character to an area. Animals and special characters will always take heed before other characters.

  2. Alter Object: Alters the selected object. Removes one scare point to everyone who is in the same room.

  3. Launch Object: Launches the selected object to another room. Removes one scare point on start and end rooms.

  4. Possess an Object: Possesses an object for a short time. Will cause two scare points.

  5. Possess a Human (new for the current version fo the game): Will possess a human! The human will scare a lot and will also travel to a specified room, scaring everyone in its path! When the power vanishes, the ex-possessed character will run away in panic.

  6. Invoke Spectre: Creates a spectre in an specific area. Removes two scare points.

  7. Invoke an illusion (new for the current version fo the game): Creates an illusion that scares a character and forces her to move to the selected area.

  8. Create a Portal: A portal. Very powerful, and we know you want it!

Normal characters: The normal characters just wander around the manor, waiting to be scared. They can talk and get distracted, but otherwise they are completely vulnerable to your powers!

Special characters (priest, ghost hunter): These characters are tough! They exist to make your haunting schemes more difficult, they are serious in their jobs and will block some of your powers whenever they can!

"Boss" characters (new for the current version fo the game): In every era of your manor's history, there will be one level with an special character. They are tougher than special characters and can also block powers. Beware, they can be tricky!

"Epoch" characters (new for the current version fo the game): Many more characters will exist in the house, according to the current historic era they ara living in!.

Poltergeist began as a simple idea and concept that started in November 2011. The idea was conceived by Diana Esperanza Pacheco (artist) and Italo F. Capasso B. (programmer).

But it was only with the advent of a contest created by Square Enix, called the "Latin American Game development contest 2012", in which we really started to make this game a reality. We entered in the contest by creating a small prototype of our game. At that time we were just hoping we could get if only a mention of honor or even better, end up as a finalist.

We had the very good fortune of getting the first prize of the contest! We got a super cool trophy and all (^0^).

You can see the results of the contest here:

http://close.latam.square-enix.com

Now, as of May 1st of 2013, the rights of our given were given back by Square Enix. This means the we now have the opportunity to really finish the game! We immediately started on making the full game, with more levels, better graphics and more gameplay mechanics.

At this moment, we still have the complete functional prototype. The consist of a grand total of 20 levels, and contains the basic implementation of the majority of powers, and the base mechanics, including enemies.

At this moment we are working on:

  • Reworking all of the sprites and creating new ones for the game. These new sprites and models include the objects of the other periods of history of the manor and the look of the tenants in different times.

  • Overhauling the look and feel of the game with things like dynamic lighting and an improved user interface.

  • We are implementing new powers, which are Possesing Humans and Invoking Illusions. These will bring more variety to the game and have more ways to solve individual levels.

  • Also contributing to that variety. New mechanics as "distractions" and special "boss" characters will make the game richer and deeper in its core mechanics.

  • Although not super special, we are adding very simple image sequence cutscenes, to give some sense of a simple story to the game.

  • We only have 20-25 levels. Welp, time to make more!
    To make the game more interestings, more levels are the key to be able to fully exploit all of the mechanics we have in store for it.

Our work in Poltergeist has been during the Square Enix contest deadline, and after we got the rights back in May 1st 2013. And though the money we won from the contest has been of great use to us (basically living from it in the past 8 months), we still need more support to be able to finish this project faster.

We can, technically speaking, complete the project on our own (and we will!). But that would take more time for us, since we do not have the resources for us to be able to work on it full time without worry. It would also not be the superpolished game as we want it to be (for example, not having special stuff like commentary mode, more characters and sprites, more levels and whatnot).

So any contribution we recieve will be greatly appreciated and will do wonders for us (n_n).


We would use the money for:

  • Paying an extra artist for a short time to help Diana with the new sprites and models of the game.

  • Paying for original music and audio.

  • Finance the rest of our work for the game in the future (you know, living and eating and stuff), with the ease of not having to worry on part-time jobs.

  • Formalizing Glitchy Pixel and creating an actual company (its needed of course, but also: This will be useful for talks of possibly porting the game on other platforms, and have it on multiple distribution platforms. But that is the super ideal case. No promises on that).

  • Pay the Indiegogo fess and local taxes.

We are going to use the "Fixed Funding" option of Indiegogo. This means that all of the money you contribute will only be charged if the target is reached and when the campaign ends.

Please note the we are going to finish this game no matter what. The campaign will help us is to just get it in a better state, with lots of polish and detail than we could ever do without funding.

If we do not reach the target, well, it kinda sucks. Of course things will be a lot trickier, and the game will probably have a reduced scope than we have now, but it won't die (we can't let it die, really).

We'd still work on the game (and keep you guys posted about it). But it definetly would take longer to finish it.


If you cannot contribute in our campaign with money, don't worry! There are other ways you can help us.
 
You can talk to your friend or acquaintances about this project. Or you could also share this campaign web page in your social networks, like Facebook, Twitter, or Reddit.
 
Note: Please do not to spam about this project to others. believe it or not, spamming actually will make us more harm than good. so please be always polite and share only once (n_n)b.
 
Remember, every little bit of sharing and contribution you do will help us in the making of this project. And of course we would really appreciate that!


Glitchy Pixel is an informal game development group created by it only two members: Diana Esperanza Pacheco and Italo F. Capasso B. Both are form Colombia - South America.

Since 2010 we have been creating games in our free time between jobs for entertainment.We have created a variety of projects, including games like Displaced, and Best Friends Fighter, the latter who won the "Casual Game Design Competition #9" at the website JayIsGames.

Glitchy Pixel also loves to participate in Game Jams, and has made some free small games for you to enjoy. Games like Time Travel Knight, Onryo's Legend, and The Rain and the Mist, are some of the free games created in game jams.

You can check out our website for more information and/or contact us:

http://www.glitchypixel.com.co

Name: Poltergeist: Pixelated Horror

Platforms: PC/Linux/Mac. Other platform TBD (if its even possible).

Genre: Horror Puzzle, but its fun instead of scary (^_^).

Release date: Probably early-mid 2014. It could be sooner, but no hard dates for now.

Current progress: Prototype with 20 levels and the foundation mechanics. Right now, working on an overhauled version.


  • I've seen games before with similar themes (Haunt the house, Ghost master, The haunting: starring Polterguy). Will there be any similarities in this game with these others?

To be honest, at the moment of the Square Enix contest, when we made the prototype, we had no idea about these games. We developed the game on our own, with none of these references.

That said, of course we checked them as soon as we found out about them. And what we can say is that our game tends to be more of a puzzle to unravel, rather than a more action oriented game.

You will have limited powers according to each levels and is not as easy to "spam" your powers. If you use all of your powers and there is still someone inside the level, you will lose. Each power is valuable and cannot be easily wasted.

And also, the reaction and current state of any character is very straightforward. You will clearly see when someone is about to run away, or completely sane. Its designed to be a clear distinct value, so you won't have any ambiguity problems when solving a level.

  • Are you the guys that made a similar game called Poltergeist: 16 bit horror?

Yes. In fact, that game is the very prototype we created for the contest. At the moment we chose that name... we can still choose it but we feel its better to say "pixelated horror" at the moment n_n.

In fact, if you wan to see more about that. Here is the first trailer we created for that contest n_n.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LRFeqK9Hn9A

  • But, in the contest web page (and the previous video link) I saw that the game was released on iOS/Android. What gives? Has it been released already? Is this game going to be released in which platforms?

The Poltergeist: 16 bit horror prototype was briefly released on mobile devices, and on limited countries (only in some countries of Latin America, and we think also Canada for some reason) as per contest rules. When the contest period ended, Square Enix removed all contestant games immediately. You will not find the game in the mobile stores anymore.

Since we now have the rights back, we can make pretty much whatever we want with it. And that includes our plans to release it on PC/Mac/Linux.

  • Why not on mobile devices?

We believe we have a better opportunity in the pc market, since looks to be broader and more accessible to multiple distribution methods and easier ways to generate community. That said, there is no hard rule that we won't release it on mobile devices. We will definetly consider about it after releasing on PC/Mac/Linux.

  • Ok, well what about Steam, GoG, Desura, etc?

We cannot tell you for sure if we can get a steam, desura, humble store, etc. Rest assured that we will try everything we can to get these kinds of distributions methods avaliable to you. If you pledge on a tier that includes the game, no worries, you will definitely get it DRM Free in some form.

  • Consoles maybe?

Whoa. That would be awesome! But we cannot promise other platforms other than PC/Mac/Linux. Its usually not super easy to get set up for console making or something like that, specially in a country like Colombia. But we will do everything in our power to make it happen n_n.

  • You already won a contest, why making an Indiegogo campaign?

You can read our answer in the "Why Indiegogo?" section of this text.

  • You just couldn't write it up again, could you?

Well... yep. (''n_n).

  • If you don't reach the funding limit, what is going to happen?

Two things mught happen. One, we may have to reduce the scope of the game, and two, it will probably take mor time to finish, since we would have to work part-time in other jobs to survive.

But we are still going to finish this game no matter what, so every contribution is worth it to at least gauge interest over it, even if we don't reach out target funding. And who know, even if we don't make it, it might help us to get funds from another source n_n.

  • What will happen IF you reach the target? Any stretch goals?

If we reach the target we will be very happy of course \(^_^)/. But we are NOT going to make any stretch goals. The reason is we already have defined the scope of our game and how we want it to be. Trying to promise you for new features just for the sake of it sounds weird for us, not our style. And since we are pitching the whole project to potential investors (for the record, you are the "potential investors" n_n), we are not going to add more design fluff to something we consider as complete.

Any extra money will be used for our future projects, and possibly for helping out our Latin American community of game developers, in some way or. But that would depend a lot of the amount we raise. We are not expecting too much money, just enough to cover our project (n_n)b.

  • In The Terminator movie, what would happen if John Connor never sends his friend back in the past, so it becomes his father so he can be born and then send his friend back in the past again?

We... have no idea actually. But when we get a time machine we will test the experiment and tell you all about it! If we don't blow up the universe that is \(^_^)/.

TL;DR?

If you like what you see in the video and campaign, please support us and share with others d(^o^)b! We would really appreciate any contribution from you.

We'd still work on the game (and keep you guys posted about it). But it definetly would take longer to finish it.


If you cannot contribute in our campaign with money, don't worry! There are other ways you can help us.

 
You can talk to your friend or acquaintances about this project. Or you could also share this campaign web page in your social networks, like Facebook, Twitter, or Reddit.
 
Note: Please do not to spam about this project to others. believe it or not, spamming actually will make us more harm than good. so please be always polite and share only once (n_n)b.
 
Remember, every little bit of sharing and contribution you do will help us in the making of this project. And of course we would really appreciate that!

Glitchy Pixel is an informal game development group created by it only two members: Diana Esperanza Pacheco and Italo F. Capasso B. Both are form Colombia - South America.
Since 2010 we have been creating games in our free time between jobs for entertainment.We have created a variety of projects, including games like Displaced, and Best Friends Fighter, the latter who won the "Casual Game Design Competition #9" at the website JayIsGames.
Glitchy Pixel also loves to participate in Game Jams, and has made some free small games for you to enjoy. Games like Time Travel Knight, Onryo's Legend, and The Rain and the Mist, are some of the free games created in game jams.
You can check out our website for more information and/or contact us:
http://www.glitchypixel.com.co

Name: Poltergeist: Pixelated Horror
Platforms: PC/Linux/Mac. Other platform TBD (if its even possible).
Genre: Horror Puzzle, but its fun instead of scary (^_^).
Release date: Probably early-mid 2014. It could be sooner, but no hard dates for now.
Current progress: Prototype with 20 levels and the foundation mechanics. Right now, working on an overhauled version.



I've seen games before with similar themes (Haunt the house, Ghost master, The haunting: starring Polterguy). Will there be any similarities in this game with these others?
To be honest, at the moment of the Square Enix contest, when we made the prototype, we had no idea about these games. We developed the game on our own, with none of these references. 
That said, of course we checked them as soon as we found out about them. And what we can say is that our game tends to be more of a puzzle to unravel, rather than a more action oriented game. 
You will have limited powers according to each levels and is not as easy to "spam" your powers. If you use all of your powers and there is still someone inside the level, you will lose. Each power is valuable and cannot be easily wasted.
And also, the reaction and current state of any character is very straightforward. You will clearly see when someone is about to run away, or completely sane. Its designed to be a clear distinct value, so you won't have any ambiguity problems when solving a level.

Are you the guys that made a similar game called Poltergeist: 16 bit horror?
Yes. In fact, that game is the very prototype we created for the contest. At the moment we chose that name... we can still choose it but we feel its better to say "pixelated horror" at the moment n_n.
In fact, if you wan to see more about that. Here is the first trailer we created for that contest n_n.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LRFeqK9Hn9A

But, in the contest web page (and the previous video link) I saw that the game was released on iOS/Android. What gives? Has it been released already? Is this game going to be released in which platforms?
The Poltergeist: 16 bit horror prototype was briefly released on mobile devices, and on limited countries (only in some countries of Latin America, and we think also Canada for some reason) as per contest rules. When the contest period ended, Square Enix removed all contestant games immediately. You will not find the game in the mobile stores anymore.
Since we now have the rights back, we can make pretty much whatever we want with it. And that includes our plans to release it on PC/Mac/Linux.

Why not on mobile devices?
We believe we have a better opportunity in the pc market, since looks to be broader and more accessible to multiple distribution methods and easier ways to generate community. That said, there is no hard rule that we won't release it on mobile devices. We will definetly consider about it after releasing on PC/Mac/Linux.

Ok, well what about Steam, GoG, Desura, etc?
We cannot tell you for sure if we can get a steam, desura, humble store, etc. Rest assured that we will try everything we can to get these kinds of distributions methods avaliable to you. If you pledge on a tier that includes the game, no worries, you will definitely get it DRM Free in some form.

Consoles maybe?
Whoa. That would be awesome! But we cannot promise other platforms other than PC/Mac/Linux. Its usually not super easy to get set up for console making or something like that, specially in a country like Colombia. But we will do everything in our power to make it happen n_n.

You already won a contest, why making an Indiegogo campaign?
You can read our answer in the "Why Indiegogo?" section of this text.

You just couldn't write it up again, could you?
Well... yep. (''n_n).

If you don't reach the funding limit, what is going to happen?
Two things mught happen. One, we may have to reduce the scope of the game, and two, it will probably take mor time to finish, since we would have to work part-time in other jobs to survive.
 But we are still going to finish this game no matter what, so every contribution is worth it to at least gauge interest over it, even if we don't reach out target funding. And who know, even if we don't make it, it might help us to get funds from another source n_n.

What will happen IF you reach the target? Any stretch goals?
If we reach the target we will be very happy of course \(^_^)/. But we are NOT going to make any stretch goals. The reason is we already have defined the scope of our game and how we want it to be. Trying to promise you for new features just for the sake of it sounds weird for us, not our style. And since we are pitching the whole project to potential investors (for the record, you are the "potential investors" n_n), we are not going to add more design fluff to something we consider as complete.
Any extra money will be used for our future projects, and possibly for helping out our Latin American community of game developers, in some way or. But that would depend a lot of the amount we raise. We are not expecting too much money, just enough to cover our project (n_n)b.

In The Terminator movie, what would happen if John Connor never sends his friend back in the past, so it becomes his father so he can be born and then send his friend back in the past again?
We... have no idea actually. But when we get a time machine we will test the experiment and tell you all about it! If we don't blow up the universe that is \(^_^)/.

TL;DR?
If you like what you see in the video and campaign, please support us and share with others d(^o^)b! We would really appreciate any contribution from you.

story:
World Gladiator Fighting Association is a futuristic take on professional arena gladiator fighting. The WGFA is split up by weapon classes rather than by weight. The game will also come with a second division, the WGE. World Gladiator Entertainment is a more traditional gladiator experience compared to the WGFA. More gore and violence with a focus on purely entertaining the crowd rather than fighting competitively. 

Each match in both divisions will be fought with weapons from one the Weapon Classes. Each Class provides a unique gameplay experience. Each class will be able to use any move in the list below. But each move will differ in execution, speed and effectiveness over each weapon class.

Longsword: Defending, countering, and powerful attacks. It's all about waiting for your opponent to make a mistake and then attack. Predict your opponents moves and counter, leaving him helpless to your next attack. Patience is key!
Sword and Shield: Blocking and bashing is everything in this class. Wear down your opponents stamina while preserving yours. Once you've tired your opponent down to the point when they can't even use their shield, it's time to attack!
Duel Wield Swords: Combos are key in this class. The fighter must be able to time his combos to throw off his opponent's defense. To defend, you must predict your opponent's moves as well as have quick reflexes to dodge and block the incoming combo attacks.
Electric Staff: Only the strong survive. Having a great offense is everything here. Pounding on your opponent until he passes out or can no longer stand will give you the win. Train your fighters up strong to be able to take the massive amount of damage while also dealing out as much pain.
and more! These are just a few of the weapon classes that will be in the game. 

These moves are subject to change for balancing and gameplay purposes.
Light and Heavy attacks: Basic offensive moves that can be thrown in 4 directions. 2 up top on the shoulders and 2 on each side of the body. Light attacks are quick and low damage. Heavy attacks take longer but cause much more damage.
Block/Shield: You can block in two directions unless you are using a shield. You have a high and low block. High blocks protect against attacks from the top. Low blocks protect against attacks on the sides of the body. If you're using a shield then blocking will block all attacks and stabs. However, if your opponent does a Bash/Kick on you while guarding you will be stunned. 
Counter: To counter you must hold down the counter/dodge modifier button and choose an attack button or stab button. That will launch a counter move against the attack you pressed. If timed right and the right move was countered against, you will stun your opponent. If the move fails it will take a while to recover so it's important to get it right!
Stab: This thrusting move does a lot of damage and can change the tide of the match in a second! Stabs cause massive blood loss and can greatly injure your opponent. Stabs cannot be blocked unless you have a shield. While this move is powerful, it takes a while to ready the attack making it easy to counter and dodge.
Cut: A cut is a state that can happen after a heavy attack. After a heavy attack is hit there is a chance that the weapon will cut through armour and flesh getting stuck in the opponent that sets up a hold. While in the Cut Hold, the attacker has three different moves to choose from to break the Cut Hold. One move causes more armour damage, another causes more blood loss and the last causes extra health loss. The defender must time a block move when the attacker chooses a move. If timed correctly, the defender will defend against the Cut Hold move and break free. If not then the attacker will do whatever damage move he chose.
Dodge: Dodges are the easiest defensive move to pull off because it is just a single button unlike Blocks and Counters. To pull off a dodge you must time the button press during an attack. Timed right, you will dodge the attack. Timed poorly, you will have a chance to be stunned while also taking normal damage. Also, fighters have an agility skill which will affect the chances of successful dodges. The higher the skill, the better the chance at a successful dodge.
Dash: Quickly tap forwards or backwards to dash in that direction. This is useful for getting out of dangerous situations or getting back to the fight quickly.
Bash/Kick: Bashes and kicks are moves to counter overly aggressive blockers. Bashing while your opponent is blocking will cause him to be stunned. To counter a Bash, just tap the dodge button at the right time or dash back away from the attack.
Taunt: Feeling cocky and/or want to impress the crowd? Taunting is the move for that! Taunts are non-damaging moves that pump up the crowd and anger your opponent. But be careful, you're defenseless during it.
Remember, all moves are subject to change! Changes will be made to improve gameplay and balancing. Also if you have any suggestions or ideas for the gameplay email me at community@ignitionstudios.net.

Fighter Classes 

Class A: Top tier, major fighters in the WGFA.
Class B: Newer and/or minor fighters in the WGFA.
Class C: Criminals that are allow to fight in the WGE as cannon fodder, to shorten their sentence by showing mercy or to relieve anger out on other fighters rather than in the prisons.
Class E: These are the other class of fighters in the WGE. These gladiators are signed in like regular fighters in the WGFA. These fighters usual fall into two groups, heroes and villains. Heroes fight for the crowds and show mercy to their beaten opponents. Villains on the other hand, fight to kill and become the most notorious fighters in the WGE.

The WGFA has clubs and shows. A club is an organization inside the division that employs fighters. They have their own training facilities and staff. The reason fighters choose to sign with clubs is so they can get into more prestigious fights and train with private staff and facilities. Fighters can choose to be independent but the fighter must hire his own trainer, find a gym and use an agent to find fights. Higher ranked fighters are more likely to be independent because they can afford to build their own facilities, hire staff and get any fight they want. 

Shows are basically different leagues in the WGFA. Each show has a select number of weapon classes, each with their own title. Each show has different prestige levels. Higher prestige means the show has more money, as well as more valuable titles and fights. Each show has their own event scheduling practices. Some shows have events very often while others might just have a few each year making that show more rare and valuable. 
The WGFA has rules to keep the fights as safe as possible while providing fans with brutal fights. To win, a fighter must wear down his opponent until he collapses due to a lack of blood, falls down and can't get up before a 10 count or by decision. The armour is provided by the WGFA for the fighters. There isn't any armour customization here.

The WGE has just 3 shows but has clubs just like the WGFA. Everything about how clubs manage and train fighters is the same. Fighters can still be independent as well.
The 3 shows are all different levels of prestige. One at the highest prestige, one in the middle and one for establishing new fighters. Each show has it's one schedules as well and events are determined by the company.
Rules are few and far between. Deaths happen at every event here. Match types are much more broader compared to the WGFA. Classic one on one, team battles, king of the hill, horde and more. Armour is up to the fighter to provide. Repairs can be done in between rounds on both the fighter's armour and the fighter himself.

Franchise Mode

In this mode, you own a club. You run how the club operates. Choose where the club is located, build and upgrade facilities, manage staff and sign fighters. You have full control on how your fighters train week by week. Manage sponsorships to make extra income and brand your fighters. But if you don't want to have to worry about the nitty gritty, you can assign the AI to control certain management jobs.
As your fighter's events come up, you can either play them, watch the event or simulate. 

Career Mode

You are the fighter! Create your gladiator and choose a background. Then choose one of the four classes that are available. From here, do what you want! Sign with a club or try to cut it as an independent. Become the most notorious gladiator in the WGE or go for as many titles as you can in the WGFA. 
Manage how you train as well as how hard. Hire personal trainers and coaches. Even build your own facilities if you have the cash flow!

Exhibition Mode

The easiest way to get into a fight. Fight against your friends or practice against the AI. Even set up AIs to fight each other.

I've been working hard on the game for about 3 months now and I'm really happy with how it's turning out. But, in order to continue to develop the game full time I need some income. This Indiegogo campaign will hopefully give me enough funds to get the game on steam early access or kickstarter.
If the campaign gets above $40,000 then I won't have to do a kickstarter which would be lovely! If this is achieved then it'll be straight to Steam Early Access once the fighting system is done. If not, then kickstarter will be the next move once the fighting system is complete. I hope to get the fighting system fully featured in about 6-8 months.  I'll provide a roadmap on the website detailing the plans for future versions soon.

  • Food. Well, I think we all can agree that food is important.
  • Bills. Rent, utilities, basic living costs.
  • Business costs. Expenses that come with running a business.
  • Programs. Substance painter, Unity, Adobe products.
That's the basic necessities I need to make the game! If the minimum goal isn't met then development on the game will slow down quite a bit while I try to find a job. More on that below.

I want to be a game developer for the rest of my life and to grow this studio into the dream studio I've always wanted. I want this studio to work closely with the players because that's how good games are made! I need your opinions to help mold these games into something great!

Delays might happen for a number of reasons: Technical issues, unforseen circumstances or the need to polish the game further. I'll keep everyone updated if delays happen but hopefully we'll never have to go there! I'm going to work hard to get the game out as quickly as possible without sacrificing quality or my sanity. :)
If the minimum goal isn't met then development of the game will slow down quite a bit while I try to find a job. I will keep developing while working but I won't be able to get nearly as much done on the game. 
If the minimum goal is met then I'll be able to do this full time! I already talked about this up above in the "Why indiegogo?" section. I will start to introduce the stretch goals if we get closer to reaching the goals.

Ways to help out!

Spreading the word of the game is huge! Keeping in touch and providing constructive criticism will help make the game better! Links to contact me are down at the bottom or you can email me at community@ignitionstudios.net.

I want to incorporate your ideas and designs into the game. With that said there has to be rules to keep things from getting out of hand.
  • No copyrighted content in your designs.
  • No inappropriate, offensive or obscene content.
  • No foul language.
  • I reserve the right to approve and adjust the final designs.
I want you all to be creative and have fun! After the campaign is over, I'll get in touch with you via email and we'll go from there.

story:
What is this campaign about?

We Emojis so much that we made them audible in ChatFish® - our messaging app . We now want to create a new design for the standard set of Emojis. But we want to make it fun!

First, and foremost, the new set of Emojis will be free. We want everyone to be able to use it in their texts, apps, and designs, on T-shirts, kitchen sinks, and so on.

Second, as ChatFish has audible Emojis, the new Emojis will have a special sound of their own - different than the current sounds we offer.

And third, just for added fun, we want to produce a cool deck of cards, bearing the Emojis. These limited edition cards are designed especially for this Indiegogo campaign! Each card instance will bear a unique serial number (QR code) on its face. The serial number will be unique per card, and set.

Update: Scanning the QR code into ChatFish chat unique message editor will let you use the Emoji, and its unique sound in your messages.
 

 

Table of content

  1. More details, please
    • Emojis explained
    • The cards
    • ChatFish
  2. The perks
  3. Action plan
    • Timeline
    • What will the money be used for?
    • Risks
  4. Stretch goals
  5. Contact us

 

More details, please 

Emojis explained

There is a standard set (alphabet) of over 800 Emojis, and more are being added all the time (like the racial Emoticons, and Vulcan salute).

There are roughly five big groups of Emojis:

  1. People
  2. Nature
  3. Objects
  4. Leisure, and holidays
  5. Symbols and Misc.

We are going to design one poker set of the most used 54 People Emojis, and one of the most used 54 Nature Emojis. This campaign's goal is not to create a full set of Emojis, but a substantial part of it. Watch our stretch goals.

The new Emojis design (and font) will be licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution and Share-alike (BY-SA) license. In short: anyone can use it, and derive from it, even for commercial purposes. But you must give attribution to the origin in your work, and your derived work should be distributed under the same BY-SA license. see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Creative_Commons_license

 

 

  The cards

Size 64mm X 89mm, standard Poker size (2.52'' X 3.5'')
Material Polypropylene
Print Full color, UV laminated
Design Original ChatFish designs. Each card will be based on a different Emoji from the deck's theme (People, or Nature)
Uniqueness Each card will have a unique serial number, printed as QR code. This number makes each card distinct. No two cards of the same, or different, deck will have the same serial number.
Audio Update: Scanning the card's QR code into ChatFish MultiMessage editor will let you use (print, and hear) the Emoji in your messages.

 

ChatFish

UPDATE:  as a feedback from this campaign we have decided to extract ChatFish's MultiMessage editor to a standalone message editor, that can be used with any other messaging app (such as WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.). We will announce this message editor after the campaign ends.

=====================================

ChatFish is a unique messaging application. It has several features that make it standout from the crowd, Such as:

  • The regular 1-to-1, and group chats.
  • All Emojis have sound FX.
  • MultiMessage - compose messages with images, music, and Emoji sound FX.
  • Aggregate messages using hashtags, and manual selection.
  • OOPS messages - un-send a message.



The perks



Action plan

Timeline

April 21st, 2015

Indiegogo campaign kickoff.
May 30th, 2015

Indiegogo campaign ends.
Start graphic design.
Start sounds production.
August 16th, 2015

Design of Emojis, and cards finished.
Production of sounds finished.
ChatFish application updated to include new Emojis.
Update: Announcing the new standalone MultiMessage editor app, that can scan Emoji cards, and create messenger independent MultiMessages.
August 17th, 2015

Publish the public repository of Emojis (under CC BY-SA).
Printing the Poker cards.
September 1st, 2015

Sending out the perks.


 

What will the money be used for?

  • Design the new Emojis.
  • Design Two decks of 54 cards, based on the Emojis (108 unique cards).
  • Print the cards, using a unique process that gives a unique serial number TO EACH card.
  • Design and manufacture Two cardboard boxes - one for each deck.
  • Produce unique ChatFish sounds for each new Emoji.
  • Update ChatFish application to let users scan Emoji cards - and get their image & sound.
  • UPDATE: Create the new, standalone MultiMessage editor, that will also let users scan Emoji cards - and get their image & sound.
  • Shipping worldwide.

 

Risks

This is the first time we are producing cards. Our main concern is that the printing might take longer than we anticipated, because it depends on many factors we do not control, like: (timely) availability of materials, and QA. We will update you if delivery times change - hopefully for the better.

BUT...

For Emoji graphics, and card designs we have Grigory. A talented, veteran artist. See: https://www.behance.net/grigorimagb05d

Sound and programming is our expertise at ChatFish. You can read more about us at http://www.chatfish.mobi

And we already found, tested, and signed an agreement with a very advanced printing shop that can create our unique cards (of high quality, and unique QR codes).

 

Stretch goals 

$115,000 - An extra set of Emojis + cards will be produced (for a total of 3 sets in the campaign). The Emoji group will be selected by a poll on our Facebook page.

$150,000 - Another extra set of Emojis + cards will be produced (for a total of 4 sets in the campaign). The Emoji group will be selected by a poll on our Facebook page.

 

Contact us

We would love to hear from you! Feel free to contact us on any issue of this campaign, or of ChatFish.

  shohaml@chatfish.mobi

  lior@chatfish.mobi

  nissan@chatfish.mobi
story_txt:
What is this campaign about?
We  Emojis so much that we made them audible in ChatFish® - our messaging app . We now want to create a new design for the standard set of Emojis. But we want to make it fun!

First, and foremost, the new set of Emojis will be free. We want everyone to be able to use it in their texts, apps, and designs, on T-shirts, kitchen sinks, and so on.

Second, as ChatFish has audible Emojis, the new Emojis will have a special sound of their own - different than the current sounds we offer.
And third, just for added fun, we want to produce a cool deck of cards, bearing the Emojis. These limited edition cards are designed especially for this Indiegogo campaign! Each card instance will bear a unique serial number (QR code) on its face. The serial number will be unique per card, and set. Update: Scanning the QR code into ChatFish chat unique message editor will let you use the Emoji, and its unique sound in your messages.
 

 
Table of content


More details, please

Emojis explained
The cards
ChatFish


The perks

Action plan

Timeline
What will the money be used for?
Risks


Stretch goals
Contact us

 
More details, please  


 Emojis explained
There is a standard set (alphabet) of over 800 Emojis, and more are being added all the time (like the racial Emoticons, and Vulcan salute).
There are roughly five big groups of Emojis:

People
Nature
Objects
Leisure, and holidays
Symbols and Misc.

We are going to design one poker set of the most used 54 People Emojis, and one of the most used 54 Nature Emojis. This campaign's goal is not to create a full set of Emojis, but a substantial part of it. Watch our stretch goals.
The new Emojis design (and font) will be licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution and Share-alike (BY-SA) license. In short: anyone can use it, and derive from it, even for commercial purposes. But you must give attribution to the origin in your work, and your derived work should be distributed under the same BY-SA license. see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Creative_Commons_license

 

 

  The cards



Size
64mm X 89mm, standard Poker size (2.52'' X 3.5'')


Material
Polypropylene


Print
Full color, UV laminated


Design
Original ChatFish designs. Each card will be based on a different Emoji from the deck's theme (People, or Nature)


Uniqueness
Each card will have a unique serial number, printed as QR code. This number makes each card distinct. No two cards of the same, or different, deck will have the same serial number.


Audio

Update: Scanning the card's QR code into ChatFish MultiMessage editor will let you use (print, and hear) the Emoji in your messages.



 

 ChatFish
UPDATE:  as a feedback from this campaign we have decided to 
extract ChatFish's MultiMessage editor to a standalone message editor, 
that can be used with any other messaging app (such as WhatsApp, 
Facebook, etc.). We will announce this message editor after the campaign
 ends.=====================================ChatFish is a unique messaging application. It has several features that make it standout from the crowd, Such as:

The regular 1-to-1, and group chats.
All Emojis have sound FX.

MultiMessage - compose messages with images, music, and Emoji sound FX.
Aggregate messages using hashtags, and manual selection.
OOPS messages - un-send a message.
