story:
The easiest way to know? Play the beta demo!
Available free for windows, More versions coming soon.

****** IMPORTANT ******

A PS4/XBOX controller is recommended!

****** ****** ****** ******

(Win64 Demo 0.8) MediaFire - Mega.nz

(Win32 Demo 0.8) MediaFire - Mega.nz

Get the demo on itch.io

 

LVL99: AxeRage is an homage to what we consider our favourite gaming age, from 80's to 90's. 
Titles like Megaman X, Castlevania, Street fighter, and Super Metroid, are the inspirations that drive us to create this game.
It includes a B-Movie feeling as well, because we just love that stuff! Gore, fantasy sci-fi, robots, aliens, and apocalyptic scenarios blend in perfectly with our vision for an action packed adventure, so in the end LVL99 AxeRage is a reflection of all the badass brutal stuff we enjoy, and we hope you can enjoy it as well!

Features: 

  • Classic Platformer Moves
    • Run, Jump, Attack
    • Slide To escape enemies or discover secret passages
    • Air backflips For an extra jump boost (not as cheap as double-jumping)
    • Charged attacks Hold the button and charge forward in a dash attack
    • Divekicks Chain combos attacking from the air
  • Unique abilities
    • Pets: Control a Radioactive/cyber/mutant buddy to help you obliterate enemies*
    • Axe Uppercut: Shoryuken-type attack to end a combo with style
    • Heavy Slash: Devastating axe attack. Become invincible for a few frames
    • Rage Meter: Perform combos to fill it, and unleash special moves
    • Parry System: Provide perfect defense from enemy attacks, Like Street Fighter III
  • Special Moves
    • Super Art ( Focus all your Rage and shoot a spinning plasma force wave)
    • Power Bomb (Devastating grapple slam to destroy objects and enemies alike)
    • Hyper Art (Outta my way! a merciless attack with all you got)
    • Giga Attack (Last resource move. Annihilate all enemies around you!)
  • ​​Exploration and discovery
    • ​Upgrades: they will allow you entrance to new sections
    • Collectibles: Fill and manage your inventory to survive
    • Secret Rooms: Use your platforming instincts to reach hard spots for special items!
    • Super Secret Rooms: Discover them and get strange upgrades or paths!**
    • Bosses: Colossal Machines, Martial Artist aliens, Psychokinetic monsters
  • Currently on the Beta Demo
    • A single big map with all inside
    • Around 45 mins. duration (for us devs, maybe you can make a better speedrun?)
    • 3 main sections with several screens each
      • Mudslide City: Devastated town invaded by weather and alien forces
      • Cybodyne labs: Abandoned Military cyborg lab, with a little more cybo
      • Alien Outpost: Pulsating alien colony producing Cyclian vermins
    • 2 Bosses: Mega Metal Guard & Alien Trooper
    • More than 15 unique enemies (and we're just starting)

* Only one pet, Blaster the Radioactive Mutt, is available on the beta demo
** Super Secrets are not yet implemented in the beta demo

We love the look and feel of 2D pixel platformer games, their precise control, fast-paced combat and straight-forward gameplay, and we wanted to reflect this in a game of our own. 
The game is action focused, with melee fighting involving combos, special moves, and quick reflexes.  

You also need platforming skills to traverse the terrain, discover secrets, and survive the hazardous apocalyptic scenarios of the game.  

Boss fights are diverse, with fast moving opponents that fight you one on one, and massive monsters that you'll need to climb to destroy.

Overall, we can safely say we're making this game into one we would've loved to play in our SNES or an Arcade back in the day!

  • $50000: Full Game Release!
    • 3 Giant maps with 9 areas total, each with several sections
    • 2 Pets to find and befriend
    • 9 bosses and 1 secret boss
  • $75000: Extra Content!
    • Items for Secondary attack
    • Speedrun Scoreboard
    • Achievements/medals
  • ​$95000: 2 Player co-op mode!
    • ​A new character to play with!
    • 2 players on Cooperative mode 
  • $​120000: Pixel Upgrade​
    • Original sprites redrawn in awesome new style!
    • General graphic Overhaul

 The story is actually very simple. We strongly prefer gameplay over story in a videogame, and we specially dislike cutscenes and long text boxes that cut the gameplay flow. Due to this, we included the least amount of text as possible, and intend to tell everything through the game itself.  

If you still want to know the story though, the short version is that 2 alien races battle for Earth's life energy, and this war leads the world into total supernatural climate disasters, creating several apocalypse scenarios at once. Your role as Cheins (a renegade firefighter) is to fight against all this because damn, people are getting hurt, and you can't let that happen. Who would? 
Also you get a mutant dog!

 As we mentioned, Street Fighter, Castlevania, Megaman X, and the great action / platformer games of decades past are our main inspirations, but there's also lots of things we want to homage such as movies like Predator, Alien, Terminator, John Carpenter's work, Horror B-Movies, as well as other 80's cool/weird memories we treasure.  

For starters, we can mention the Parry from Street Fighter! A move that's hard to time, but when performed correctly, will not only provide perfect defense from enemy attacks, but will also recover some HP and fill the RAGE meter!  

Movements from Megaman X series like the dash and wall jumping are also in the game! They left a fantastic impression on us, being new moves from a franchise that was already the pinnacle of platforming bliss.  

Exploring and discovering secret paths and backtracking thanks to new upgrades are not only inspired from Metroid, but also from Castlevania SOTN, and from the vampire franchise we also want to imitate some of the detailed and dramatic death animations!

 When we started the project, we wanted to re-live the feelings of old-school videogames, the difficulty of not being sure what to do and where to go, along with the satisfaction of figuring things out just by playing. 
The same process could be said of the development of the game and ourselves, as a team; where we just started working out of love for games, but without being 100% about what we're doing and how should we do it.

 We started with just engine tests and ideas, but slowly we kept making sprites, animations, designing stages and everything else; and suddenly we found ourselves working full time on LVL99, and loving every minute of it. The only downside is, of course, that we can't afford to do that indefinitely. 
Savings don't last forever, but there's still a lot to do. That's why at this point, we need to start looking for people who can enjoy LVL99 and the things that we want to represent inside the game, and ask sincerely for help.
 We will finish the game one way or another, but if we can keep working on itat a full-time rhythm, the result will be much better and much sooner. 


U.O.M.U. (Union Of Master Uomu) Team

story:
Many computer gamers prefer the control, precision and comfort offered by a trackball, but find their device choices very limited. The market is flooded with gaming mice, but no trackball with the features, functions and form wanted by today’s gamers. GameBall is the answer.

We designed GameBall from the ground up specifically for computer gaming. We are gamers ourselves and focused on creating a quality high-end trackball that can stand up to the demands and needs of gamers. In short, GameBall was built by computer gamers for computer gamers. 

Please select one of the perks on the right side of the page to support our campaign and help bring GameBall to life.

GameBall is the first trackball developed specifically for the computer gamer. Its unique design and gaming specific features distinguish it from all other products on the market today.



Even though GameBall was designed for gaming; it is a fully capable, everyday computer trackball. Its high precision controls make it perfect for 3D design work, video/picture editing, spreadsheets, or just web browsing. There is no need to switch devices between gaming and general computer use. GameBall does it all.

As a $69 Indiegogo Backer you will be one of the very few to own the world's first computer gaming trackball. In addition, you will receive a limited edition version known as “GameBall Ice” and become a GameBall Founder. Our full production version will be carbon black with red lighting and a red ball. While our limited edition will be carbon black with blue lighting and a blue ball. GameBall Ice will only be offered to Indiegogo Backers. GameBall Founders will receive special discounts and exclusives on future versions, new products and updates. Each Founder's name will be proudly displayed on the GameBall website.

We have teamed up with a leading trackball designer and manufacturer out of the United Kingdom. We have worked out the engineering, manufacturing and distribution processes. Following a successful campaign, GameBall will be sold only online. Eventually, we hope to have a presence with a major retailer and have global order fulfillment. The GameBall product website is already up and running and can be found at www.gamingtrackball.com. All we need now is you!

Much time and effort has gone into preparing for this crowdfunding launch. Timelines, with contingencies, have been created for each development phase. At the completion of this successful campaign, we will move into full development. Indiegogo Backers will be kept up to date as we move through the production phases. Please see the key milestones in the timeline below:

The main challenges we face are associated with the manufacturing of the actual product. This is a new product with features not yet seen in a trackball. New products have potential for defects, material shortages, redesigns and schedule slippage. This is why we teamed up with a company who is a leader in the trackball industry. We wanted to leverage the experience and knowledge of a company who manufactures trackballs as their core business.

Whether you are an Indiegogo Backer or not, please help us get the word out about GameBall. You can use the Indiegogo sharing tools (left of the page) to easily share this campaign.

Thank you and game your way!


www.gamingtrackball.com

GameBall patent and trademark pending.

story:
Whether you are a supporter or a visitor you can greatly help the project to succeed by spreading the word out. My gratitude will be forever yours for your help. (Please use the buttons under the video to share.)


This logo looks pretty exciting, isn't it? But before I start to talk about the game itself  I need to go back to the origin.

Leg splitting has never been so fun...

I was one of those millions who have dropped their yaws watching Van Damme famous Epic Split video. I know that he was secured (with a wire) during the shoot, but it looked really great and so far nobody spotted any evidence that the shoot wasn't real. So I really liked the video and the idea.
All rights belong to AB Volvo. (I use this photo only for demonstration purposes under fair use.)

But as a game designer I have a slightly bad habit: I always look at life situations, ads, Youtube videos as how they could be turned into a video game. And at the very first moment when I've seen Epic Split I knew right away that it would deserve a game version, since it could be very fun. That's how the idea of Epic Split Splat Game was born.


First I planed to do just a short web game for fun. So when I had some time I've made a short flash game. The result can be seen here:

To play this game click here (Image courtesy by AB Volvo)

Then, during the test of the game, I've suddenly realized that THIS TYPE OF GAME REALLY deserves a more complex version and an original graphic style. And I've got a very strong feeling that it could be really fun to play on touch screens too. (Especially on tablet devices.) That's the main reason why this Indiegogo Project has been born. Unfortunately I've got not enough money to pay all the cost of this project and my only chance to get the required amount of money is up on you. (I cannot produce the whole game alone.) I really believe that this game would make many funny moments to the people who will play with it. So let's make it together for the sake of fun.

And nevertheless this is a never coming back opportunity for me to produce my own game title and present to people directly. (I always use to work  in the background so far.) My kids would be very proud of me getting this game done.

Now it's up to this awesome community if this little funny game is going to be a reality or not. Any help is appreciated, and will be honoured with special Indiegogo awards.  (Please see my perks below)

The more money we rise the bigger and more complex the game will be. So keep it in mind that it is really worthy to spread the word out about this game and support it with a few pounds. (Please see milestones below)


Why could be funny to play this game?

I cannot give you scientific explanation. But I know that no matter who played so far the little Flash Game made by me the result was always laughing and a feeling a little bit of competition. And these together are very high emotions. That's why I resist to do this game. I'd like to cause enjoyable moments to people. Plus with the Motion Track Control people can do some exercise  while sitting in front of the computer.
And if these reasons are not enough: to be absolutely sure that the game doesn't gets boring in a short period of time I've made  3 different types of gameplay. All three are absolutely different.


Team Time  - This is the original style of playing. You have to drive your vehicles to help Jane-Claudette avoiding to fall. Be careful the driver of the opponent vehicle will do anything just  to disturb our heroine. (Throw objects onto her for example)

One man falling - Jane-Claudette is not participating in this kind of gameplay. The main hero is you as the driver. Now your main purpose is to make the opponent's hero to fall down from the vehicles. Drive as crazy as you can. :)

"Mario" style - This type of gameplay is for those who don't like any violence. I promise no one will be hurt in "Mario" style. Jane-Caludette won't fall down and the drivers won't compete each others. You will drive both of the vehicles (a little bit tricky but not impossible) and you will have to collect points and rewards.

And what will make this game an ultimate fun generator: MOTION DETECTION CONTROL. If you've got any type of ordinary web-camera on your device you can control the game by making movements. (From side to side.) So you can make a lot of exercise while playing. Not just fun but healthy too.

900 pounds - This is the primary goal of mine. By reaching this goal tree version of the game will be produced: PC (in any browser with Flash plug-in), Android and iOS version. The game will consist of the 3 different gameplays mentioned above. Supporters (5 pounds or above) only will get access to tree very special and funny level. (The money will be used for such tasks I cannot handle like sound and music. Some 3D model production as I've got limited time to do so much vehicle model.)

1800 pounds - Multi player options will be added to all platforms mentioned above. There is no more fun than making you friends hero to fall down. It is not so easy as it seems. I really hope that we achieve this milestone as I eager to play against others.

3300 pounds - New scene type will be added. Called Future Race. Enjoy futuristic races. New game style added too.

5500 pounds - New scene type will be added called Ancient Madness. Did you liked the movie 300? So imagine this type of graphical style and vehicle types.

I am very thankful to anyone helping the project. I've defined the perks to give everybody a great value as a reward for the given support:




Very important note: When I will make any vote regarding game features (like reward system) your personal vote will count 1 plus the amount you paid in pounds. So if you support the project with 25 pounds your vote will count as 26. This is to give more influence to those who supported the project more. This is fair only this way.


About the author:

My portfolio site.
My name is Balazs Hardi. I'm a game designer and developer since 1998. I use to do small web games for kids and commercial titles for big companies. I always worked in the background. So this indiegogo campaign would make a BIG-BIG difference for me. This would be a game title to be released under my own name. This could seem to you a small thing but it is very big step to me. Really-really big.

I've got tree awesome kids who would be very proud of me if this project would succeed. 

Risk and Challenges:
With 15 years of experience of production I can see not much risk in this project. I would love to work on it and so I would burn the midnight oil to finish it as promised.

Frequently asked questions:

- Am I really going to know how to do perfect splits from your E-Book?
- Yes, if you take it seriously. I will show you the ways to achieve this ability but it's up to you how hard you practice it. So I will provide you handful knowledge but I cannot hold your hands. And to be honest: this book is going to be rather a funny writing than a scientific study. I will list a bunch of funny methods as well which will make you laugh I'm sure. The exercises will be illustrated with vegetables ;)


- Will the mobile version of the game work on phones or only on tablet devices?
They will work on phones as well (Android 2.3 or above required) but I personally think that it is not so convenient to play them on small screens.

Whether you are a supporter or a visitor you can greatly help the project to succeed by spreading the word out. My gratitude will be forever yours for your help. (Please use the buttons under the video to share.)This logo looks pretty exciting, isn't it? But before I start to talk about the game itself  I need to go back to the origin. Leg splitting has never been so fun...I was one of those millions who have dropped their yaws watching Van Damme famous Epic Split video.
 I know that he was secured (with a wire) during the shoot, but it 
looked really great and so far nobody spotted any evidence that the 
shoot wasn't real. So I really liked the video and the idea.All rights belong to AB Volvo. (I use this photo only for demonstration purposes under fair use.)But as a game designer I have a slightly bad habit: I always look at
life situations, ads, Youtube videos as how they could be turned into a
 video game. And at the very first moment  when I've seen Epic Split I 
knew right away that it would deserve a game version, since it could be very fun. That's how the idea of Epic Split Splat Game was born.First I planed to do just a short web game for fun. So when I had some time I've made a short flash game. The result can be seen here:To play this game click here (Image courtesy by AB Volvo)Then, during the test of the game, I've suddenly realized that THIS TYPE OF GAME REALLY deserves a more complex version and an original graphic style. Unfortunately I've got not enough money to pay all the cost of this project and my only chance to get the required amount of money is up on you. (I cannot produce the whole game alone.) I really believe that this game would make many funny moments to the people who will play with it. story:
A nevem Lawrence. Leslie L. Lawrence ...

(My name is Lawrence. Leslie L. Lawrence ...)

MAGYARUL

Lőrincz L. László a magyar bestseller író évtizedek óta szórakoztatja közönségét különleges hangulatú, lebilincselően izgalmas kalandregényeivel. A regények főhőse Leslie L. Lawrence, a neves keletkutató és rovartudós, aki keresztül kasul bejárja a világot, s közben minduntalan misztikus, megoldhatatlannak tűnő rejtélyekbe botlik, melyeknek vaslogikája, kemény ökle és .38-as Smith & Wessonja segítségével jár a végére. 

IN ENGLISH

Laszlo L. Lorincz, the Hungarian bestseller novelist entertained his readers for decades through his beautifully exciting adventure stories with special atmosphere. The main hero of these stories is Leslie L. Lawrence the noted orientalist and entomologist, who traverses through the length and breadth of the world, while constantly bumps into seemingly unsolvable mysteries, which he solves with the help of his iron logic, hard fist and .38 Smith & Wesson.

MAGYARUL

A Lawrence regények különlegessége, hogy bár egytől egyig kitalált történetek, mégis mindegyikük valós helyszíneken játszódik, s mivel a regényekben feldolgozott legendáknak általában valamilyen valós gyökerük is van, a Lawrence könyvek nem csak szórakoztatóak, de komoly ismeretterjesztő jelleggel is bírnak.

Lőrincz L. László tanulmányai során hosszú éveket töltött a Távol-Keleten, ösztöndíjasként tanult az ulánbátori Állami Csojbalszan Egyetemen, valamint a bonni Friedrich Wilhelm Egyetemen.

A tibeti és a mongol folklór és irodalom, valamint e népek történelme képezi tudományos munkásságának fő területeit. Mintegy 100 tudományos cikke jelent meg e témakörökben, ezen kívül burját és mongol eposzokat fordít.

Írói tevékenységét ifjúsági regények írásával kezdte. Igazán népszerű íróvá azonban a nyolcvanas évek elejétől megjelenő tudományos fantasztikus regényei, valamint a Galaktika folyóiratban megjelent sci-fi novellái tették. Ezeket a Lőrincz L. László néven megjelentetett műveket Galaktika-díjjal és Arany Meteor-díjjal jutalmazták.

IN ENGLISH

The Lawrence novels are unique, because while they are all made-up stories, all of them takes place in real places, and the processed legends usually have some real root. Therefore the Lawrence books are not only fun to read, but also has serious educational value.

During his studies, Lorincz L. Laszlo spent long years in the Far East, he studied at the Mongolian State (Choybalsan) University in Ulaanbaatar and at the Friedrich Wilhelm University of Bonn.

The main areas of his scientific works are the Tibetan and Mongolian folklore and literature, furthermore the history of these nations. He has over 100 publications in these areas; besides that, he translates Buryat and Mongolian epic poems.

He started his career as a writer by writing juvenile literature. However, he really became popular by his science-fiction novels published in the early 80’s and his sci-fi short stories published in the magazine Galaktika. These works written under the name Laszlo L. Lorincz were honored by the Galaktika Award and the Arany Meteor (Gold Meteor) award.

MAGYARUL

Leslie L. Lawrence írói álnéven kiadott első munkája, a 'Sindzse Szeme' hozta meg számára az országos népszerűséget. E néven publikált, többségében keleti tárgyú kalandregényeiben ötvöződik a biztonsággal kezelt tudományos ismeretek és a kutatások során felhalmozott tapasztalatok ismeretterjesztő szándéka, valamint a fordulatos, izgalmas cselekmény. Ez a kettősség — a tudományos háttér és az élvezetes olvasmányosság — adja műveinek igazi értékét.

Regényei nemcsak hazánkban, de külföldön is igen népszerűek. Németországban, a volt Szovjetunióban, Szlovákiában, Csehországban, Lengyelországban, Bulgáriában és Franciaországban is jelentek meg művei.

Munkájának része és szenvedélye az utazás. A mai napig is lehetőség szerint regényeinek minden helyszínét felkeresi, hogy az adott országnak és az ott élő népek kultúrájának minél szemléletesebb leírását tudja adni.

Lőrincz L. László könnyed, sokszor humoros, egyedi stílusát nagyon könnyű megszeretni, és ha valakit egyszer magával ragad történeteinek különleges hangulata, nagyon hamar rajongóvá válik.

Valószínűleg ennek is köszönhető, hogy az elmúlt 40 évben több mint 80 Lőrincz L. László kötet jelent meg, melyek túlnyomó többsége Leslie L. Lawrence kalandjait dolgozza fel.

IN ENGLISH

His first work published under the pen-name Leslie L. Lawrence, Sindzse Szeme (Eye of Shinje) brought him national fame. The adventure novels published under this name, which usually take place in the East, combine scientific knowledge handled confidently, a wish to propagate knowledge gained during the research and a thrilling story full of surprises. This double nature – the scientific background and the delightful readability – give the real value of these works.

His novels are popular not only in Hungary but also abroad. He has works published in Germany, in the former Soviet Union, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, Poland, Bulgaria and France.

A part of his job and also his passion is traveling and even today, if possible, he travels to every place pictured in his works to be able to give a most vivid description of the given country and the culture of its nations.

The light, often humorous, unique style of Lorincz L. Laszlo is very easy to like, and if once you're stuck by the unique feeling of these stories, you'll very quickly become a fan.

Most likely this is one of the reasons that over the past 40 years, more than 80 Lorincz L. Laszlo volume was published, and the vast majority of these are about Leslie L. Lawrence's adventures.

A Keselyűk Gyászzenéje
(Requiem of the Vultures)

MAGYARUL

Cégünk a Mystery Interactive nem kisebb feladatot tűzött maga elé, mint hogy egy multi-platform kalandjáték keretein belül feldolgozza az egyik legnépszerűbb Leslie L. Lawrence történetet, 'A Keselyűk Gyászzenéjét', Requiem of the Vultures - A Leslie L. Lawrence Adventure címmel.

IN ENGLISH

Our company Mystery Interactive has set itself a goal, that we'll develop a multi-platform adventure game based on one of the most popular Leslie L. Lawrence stories : Requiem of the Vultures.

MAGYARUL

A fejlesztés alatt álló feldolgozásban, a játékos Leslie L. Lawrence bőrébe bújva izgulhatja végig a kalandokat, miközben maga is részesévé válik a cselekménynek.

IN ENGLISH

In this game, the classic story is retold as the player himself will become part of the plot, to solve the deadly secret behind the Requiem of the Vultures.

MAGYARUL

Azok akik  már olvasták a könyvet, érdekesnek  találják  majd az ismert történet, és karakterek megelevenedését  ebben a modern,  interaktív kalandjátékban. 

IN ENGLISH

Those who have read the novel will be thrilled as they re-experience the classic story in this modern interactive form. 

MAGYARUL

Azok akik előtt még  ismeretlen a 'Keselyűk Gyászzenéje' című Lawrence regény, könnyen és gyorsan megszeretik majd azt, a játék intelligens feladványain, érdekfeszítő, sokszor humoros dialógusain és a fantasztikusan izgalmas,  szórakoztató  sztorin keresztül.

IN ENGLISH

Those who haven't read the book yet, will quick get to love it, through the intelligent puzzles, interesting, often humorous dialogues, and through the fantastically exciting and entertaining story of the game.

MAGYARUL

A játék jó néhány órányi feledhetetlen kikapcsolódást ígér a hardcore kalandjáték rajongóknak és a stílust most felfedezőknek egyaránt! Mindenkinek bátran ajánljuk, aki szereti a misztikumot, történelmet és humort!

IN ENGLISH

The game offers many hours of amusement and thrills for the first time gamer as well as those who have been long-time fans of adventure games. It is aimed at everyone who loves suspense, mystery, humor and who likes to use his wit.

MAGYARUL

A játék minden jelentős platformon hozzáférhető lesz, tehát készül belőle iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8, Windows, Mac, Linux és Web-en játszható verzió. Megfelelő nemzetközi érdeklődés esetén a magyaron kívül tervezünk angol és német lokalizációt is.

IN ENGLISH

The game will be available for all major platforms, so there will be iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8, Windows, Mac, Linux, and Web Player versions. Upon serious international interest, beside Hungarian we've aimed to localize it to English and German languages too.

MAGYARUL

Az elmúlt években rengeteg időt, energiát és pénzt fektettünk abba, hogy lerakjuk a fejlesztés alapjait, megírjuk a játék teljes Design Dokumentációját (melyet Matthias Kempke, a 'What Makes You Tick?' és a 'The Night of the Rabbit' című nagysikerű kalandjátékok alkotójával szoros együttműködésben készítettünk el), létrehozzunk egy egyedi és hangulatos látványvilágot, egy működő prototípust, és még sorolhatnánk.

IN ENGLISH

In recent years we've invested a great deal of time, effort and money to establish the foundation of the development, write the game's complete Design Documentation (in close cooperation with Matthias Kempke, creator of the critically acclaimed adventure titles 'What Makes You Tick?' and 'The Night of the Rabbit'), create unique, charming visuals, a working prototype, and the list goes on.

MAGYARUL

Ahhoz viszont,  hogy  tovább  tudjunk  lépni,   és  be  tudjuk fejezni a fejlesztést, szükségünk van a leendő játékosok segítségére is!

Célunk, hogy jelen Indie GoGo kampány keretein belül, 2014 január 15-ig összegyűjtsünk $120.000 USD-t, mely összeget a fejlesztés befejezésére szeretnénk fordítani. Ha a kampány sikerrel zárul, és összegyűlik a szükséges összeg, 2014 szeptemberének végéig elkészítjük a játékot.

IN ENGLISH

However, in order that we can move forward, and we can finish the development, we need to help of the players too!

Our goal with this Indie GoGo campaign is, to raise $120.000 USD until 15th of January 2014, which amount we intend to spend to finish the development of the game. If this campaign is going to be successful, and we can raise the above amount, we are planning to deliver the finished game no later than September 2014.

MAGYARUL

S hogy mit kínálunk a segítőkész játékosok bizalmáért cserébe?

Természetesen egy igényesen kivitelezett, színvonalas és izgalmas videojáték mellett, rengeteg egyéb exkluzív meglepetést is, melyek limitált példányszámban, kizárólag azok számára lesznek hozzáférhetőek, akik a kampány időtartama alatt, támogatásukkal hozzájárulnak tervünk megvalósításához!

IN ENGLISH

And what we offer you for your help and confidence?

Of course first of all a high quality, exciting video game, but beside that, we have many exclusive surprises, which are going to be available in limited numbers, only for contributors supporting us during this campaign, so we can achieve our goal!

Egérpadok (Mouse Pads)



Pólók (T-shirts)

iPad tartók (iPad Cases)

Bögrék (Mugs)



MAGYARUL

... és még számtalan további meglepetés, melyek folyamatosan kerülnek majd bejelentésre a kampány időtartama alatt!

IN ENGLISH

... and countless other surprises that will constantly be announced during the campaign!

Néhány hely, ahol már olvashatsz a játékról:

(Some places where you can already read about the game - these are in Hungarian language. English links are coming soon too)


Playdome.hu - Kalandjáték készül Lôrincz L. László egyik regényébôl

Tulpa - Interjú a Lőrincz L. László kalandjáték fejlesztőivel

Szeretettel várunk továbbá a Mystery Interactive hivatalos weboldalán is:

(Please visit the official website of Mystery Interactive too)

www.mysteryinteractive.com

ahol rengeteg további érdekes információt tudhatsz meg a fejlesztőkről, eddigi projectjeinkről, és természetesen a Requiem of the Vultures-ről is!

Támogatásodat előre is köszönjük! 


IN ENGLISH

There you'll find lots of additional information about the developers, our past projects, and of course about Requiem of the Vultures!

Thank you very much for your contribution!

László a magyar bestseller író évtizedek óta szórakoztatja közönségét különleges hangulatú, lebilincselően izgalmas kalandregényeivel. A regények főhőse Leslie L. László tanulmányai során
hosszú éveket töltött a Távol-Keleten,
ösztöndíjasként tanult az ulánbátori Állami Csojbalszan Egyetemen, valamint a
bonni Friedrich Wilhelm Egyetemen.
A tibeti és a
mongol folklór és irodalom, valamint e népek történelme képezi tudományos
munkásságának fő területeit. Mintegy 100 tudományos cikke jelent meg e
témakörökben, ezen kívül burját és mongol eposzokat fordít.Írói tevékenységét
ifjúsági regények írásával kezdte. Igazán népszerű íróvá azonban a nyolcvanas
évek elejétől megjelenő tudományos fantasztikus regényei, valamint a Galaktika
folyóiratban megjelent sci-fi novellái tették. Ezeket a Lőrincz L. László néven
megjelentetett műveket Galaktika-díjjal és Arany Meteor-díjjal jutalmazták.IN ENGLISHThe Lawrence novels are unique, because while they are all made-up stories, all of them takes place in real places, and the processed legends usually have some real root. Therefore the Lawrence books are not only fun to read, but also has serious educational value.During his studies, Lorincz L. Laszlo spent long
years in the Far East, he studied at the Mongolian State (Choybalsan) University in Ulaanbaatar and at the
Friedrich Wilhelm University of Bonn.
The main areas of his scientific works
are the Tibetan and Mongolian folklore and literature, furthermore the history
of these nations. He has over 100 publications in these areas; besides that, he
translates Buryat and Mongolian epic poems.
He started his career as a writer by
writing juvenile literature. However, he really became popular by his
science-fiction novels published in the early 80’s and his sci-fi short stories
published in the magazine Galaktika. These works written under the name Laszlo L. Lorincz were honored by the Galaktika Award and the Arany Meteor (Gold
Meteor) award.MAGYARULLeslie L. Lawrence írói álnéven kiadott első munkája, a 'Sindzse Szeme' hozta meg számára az országos népszerűséget. E néven publikált, többségében keleti tárgyú kalandregényeiben ötvöződik a biztonsággal kezelt tudományos ismeretek és a kutatások során felhalmozott tapasztalatok ismeretterjesztő szándéka, valamint a fordulatos, izgalmas cselekmény. Ez a kettősség — a tudományos háttér és az élvezetes olvasmányosság — adja műveinek igazi értékét.Regényei nemcsak hazánkban, de külföldön is igen népszerűek. Németországban, a volt Szovjetunióban, Szlovákiában, Csehországban, Lengyelországban, Bulgáriában és Franciaországban is jelentek meg művei.Munkájának része
és szenvedélye az utazás. A mai napig is lehetőség szerint regényeinek minden
helyszínét felkeresi, hogy az adott
országnak és az ott élő népek kultúrájának minél szemléletesebb leírását tudja
adni.Lőrincz L. László könnyed, sokszor humoros, egyedi stílusát nagyon könnyű megszeretni, és ha valakit egyszer magával ragad történeteinek különleges hangulata, nagyon hamar rajongóvá válik.Valószínűleg ennek is köszönhető, hogy az elmúlt 40 évben több mint 80 Lőrincz L. László kötet jelent meg, melyek túlnyomó többsége Leslie L. Lawrence kalandjait dolgozza fel.IN ENGLISHHis first work published under the pen-name Leslie L. Lawrence, Sindzse Szeme (Eye of Shinje) brought him national fame. The adventure novels published under this name, which usually take place in the East, combine scientific knowledge handled confidently, a wish to propagate knowledge gained during the research and a thrilling story full of surprises. This double nature – the scientific background and the delightful readability – give the real value of these works.His novels are popular not only in Hungary but also abroad. He has works published in Germany, in the former Soviet Union, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, Poland, Bulgaria and France.A part of his job and also his passion is traveling and even today, if possible, he travels to every place pictured in his works to be able to give a most vivid description of the given country and the culture of its nations.The light, often humorous, unique style of Lorincz L. Laszlo is very easy to like, and if once you're stuck by the unique feeling of these stories, you'll very quickly become a fan.Most likely this is one of the reasons that over the past 40 years, more than 80 Lorincz L. Laszlo volume was published, and the vast majority of these are about Leslie L. Lawrence's adventures.A Keselyűk Gyászzenéje(Requiem of the Vultures)MAGYARULCégünk a Mystery Interactive nem kisebb feladatot tűzött maga elé, mint hogy egy multi-platform kalandjáték keretein belül feldolgozza az egyik legnépszerűbb Leslie L. Lawrence történetet, 'A Keselyűk Gyászzenéjét', Requiem of the Vultures - A Leslie L. Lawrence Adventure címmel.IN ENGLISHOur company Mystery Interactive has set itself a goal, that we'll develop a multi-platform adventure game based on one of the most popular Leslie L. Lawrence stories : Requiem of the Vultures.MAGYARULA fejlesztés alatt álló feldolgozásban, a játékos Leslie
L. Lawrence bőrébe bújva izgulhatja végig a kalandokat, miközben maga is
részesévé válik a cselekménynek.IN ENGLISHIn this game, the
classic story is retold as the player himself will become part of the plot, to solve the deadly
secret behind the Requiem of the Vultures.MAGYARULAzok akik  már olvasták a könyvet, érdekesnek  találják 
majd az ismert történet, és karakterek megelevenedését  ebben a modern,  interaktív kalandjátékban. IN ENGLISHThose who have read
the novel will be thrilled as they re-experience the classic story in this modern
interactive form. MAGYARULAzok akik előtt
még  ismeretlen a 'Keselyűk Gyászzenéje' című Lawrence regény, könnyen és gyorsan megszeretik majd azt, a játék intelligens
feladványain, érdekfeszítő, sokszor humoros dialógusain és a fantasztikusan
izgalmas,  szórakoztató  sztorin keresztül.IN ENGLISHThose who haven't read the book yet, will quick get to love it, through the intelligent puzzles, interesting, often humorous dialogues, and through the fantastically exciting and entertaining story of the game.MAGYARULA játék jó néhány
órányi feledhetetlen kikapcsolódást ígér a hardcore kalandjáték rajongóknak és a stílust most felfedezőknek
egyaránt! Mindenkinek bátran ajánljuk, aki szereti a misztikumot, történelmet és
humort!IN ENGLISHThe
game offers many hours of amusement and thrills for the first time gamer as
well as those who have been long-time fans of adventure games. It is aimed at
everyone who loves suspense, mystery, humor and who likes to use his wit.MAGYARUL
A játék minden jelentős platformon hozzáférhető lesz, tehát készül belőle iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8, Windows, Mac, Linux és Web-en játszható verzió. Megfelelő nemzetközi érdeklődés esetén a magyaron kívül tervezünk angol és német lokalizációt is.
IN ENGLISH
The game will be available for all major platforms, so there will be iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8, Windows, Mac, Linux, and Web Player versions. Upon serious international interest, beside Hungarian we've aimed to localize it to English and German languages too.MAGYARULAz elmúlt években rengeteg időt, energiát és pénzt fektettünk abba, hogy lerakjuk a fejlesztés alapjait, megírjuk a játék teljes Design Dokumentációját (melyet Matthias Kempke, a 'What Makes You Tick?' és a 'The Night of the Rabbit' című nagysikerű kalandjátékok alkotójával szoros együttműködésben készítettünk el), létrehozzunk egy egyedi és hangulatos látványvilágot, egy működő prototípust, és még sorolhatnánk.IN ENGLISHIn recent years we've invested a great deal of time, effort and money to establish the foundation of the development, write the game's complete Design Documentation (in close cooperation with Matthias Kempke, creator of the critically acclaimed adventure titles 'What Makes You Tick?' and 'The Night of the Rabbit'), create unique, charming visuals, a working prototype, and the list goes on.MAGYARULAhhoz viszont,  hogy  tovább  tudjunk  lépni,   és  be  tudjuk fejezni a fejlesztést, szükségünk van a leendő játékosok segítségére is!Célunk, hogy jelen Indie GoGo kampány keretein belül, 2014 január 15-ig összegyűjtsünk $120.000 USD-t, mely összeget a fejlesztés befejezésére szeretnénk fordítani. Ha a kampány sikerrel zárul, és összegyűlik a szükséges összeg, 2014 szeptemberének végéig elkészítjük a játékot.IN ENGLISHHowever, in order that we can move forward, and we can finish the development, we need to help of the players too!Our goal with this Indie GoGo campaign is, to raise $120.000 USD until 15th of January 2014, which amount we intend to spend to finish the development of the game. If this campaign is going to be successful, and we can raise the above amount, we are planning to deliver the finished game no later than September 2014.MAGYARULS hogy mit kínálunk a segítőkész játékosok bizalmáért cserébe?Természetesen egy igényesen kivitelezett, színvonalas és izgalmas videojáték mellett, rengeteg egyéb exkluzív meglepetést is, melyek limitált példányszámban, kizárólag azok számára lesznek hozzáférhetőek, akik a kampány időtartama alatt, támogatásukkal hozzájárulnak tervünk megvalósításához!IN ENGLISHAnd what we offer you for your help and confidence?Of course first of all a high quality, exciting video game, but beside that, we have many exclusive surprises, which are going to be available in limited numbers, only for contributors supporting us during this campaign, so we can achieve our goal!Egérpadok (Mouse Pads)Pólók (T-shirts)iPad tartók (iPad Cases)Bögrék (Mugs)MAGYARUL... és még számtalan további meglepetés, melyek folyamatosan kerülnek majd bejelentésre a kampány időtartama alatt!IN ENGLISH... and countless other surprises that will constantly be announced during the campaign!ENGLISH TRANSLATION OF THE PERKS:___________________________________________________________________________________$15 :  I JUST WANT TO PLAY ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.___________________________________________________________________________________$25 :  I COULD USE A MOUSE PAD TOO ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.+ Mouse pad, decorated with an illustration connected with the game.(shipping costs will apply for purchases outside Hungary)___________________________________________________________________________________$40 :  HOT TEA AND LAWRENCE WHAT I NEED ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.+ Mug, decorated with an illustration connected with the game + tasty Indian tea.(shipping costs will apply for purchases outside Hungary)___________________________________________________________________________________$50 :  AN ROTV T-SHIRT IS MY DREAM ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.+ T-shirt, decorated with an illustration connected with the game. (we'll need to know your size)(shipping costs will apply for purchases outside Hungary)___________________________________________________________________________________$55 :  I'LL TAKE GOOD CARE OF MY iPAD ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.+ iPad case, decorated with an illustration connected with the game.(shipping costs will apply for purchases outside Hungary)___________________________________________________________________________________$160 :  I WANT IT ALL ...- Digital download of the game, on any of the platforms available.+ Mouse pad, mug (+Indian tea), T-shirt and iPad case, decorated with an illustration connected with the game.(shipping costs will apply for purchases outside Hungary)___________________________________________________________________________________$260 :  I'D LIKE SOMETHING PERSONAL ...This is a special offer for Hungarian supporters only.___________________________________________________________________________________$666 :  I'M A HARDCORE FAN ...This is a special offer for Hungarian supporters only.___________________________________________________________________________________Néhány hely, ahol már olvashatsz a játékról:(Some places where you can already read about the game - these are in Hungarian language. English links are coming soon too)Playdome.hu - Kalandjáték készül Lôrincz L. László egyik regényébôlPCGuru.hu - Leslie L. Lawrence kalandjáték, magyaroktól!GameChannel.hu - Magyarok a játékfejlesztésbenTulpa - A Leslie L. Lawrence rajongók virtuális kolostoraTulpa - Interjú a Lőrincz L. László kalandjáték fejlesztőivelIpon.hu - A keselyűk gyászzenéje ...Szeretettel várunk továbbá a Mystery Interactive hivatalos weboldalán is:(Please visit the official website of Mystery Interactive too)www.mysteryinteractive.comahol rengeteg további érdekes információt tudhatsz meg a fejlesztőkről, eddigi projectjeinkről, és természetesen a Requiem of the Vultures-ről is!Támogatásodat előre is köszönjük! IN ENGLISHThere you'll find lots of additional information about the developers, our past projects, and of course about Requiem of the Vultures!Thank you very much for your contribution!

story:
What exactly is Masters of Cetrea? And why another campaign setting?

 

Good question. Let me begin by telling you what our project is all about. Obviously, we are offering you a whole new campaign setting, yes, fully compatible with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. A shiny new world for you to play in. At the very soul of our project, though, is the intention to show you a different way of enjoying the game we all know and love. Our approach has always been to focus the game on the characters. All good stories are like that.

Masters of Cetrea introduces not only a different location, but several variations on the game to allow you to play differently. We focus on the narrative elements of the game: characters, plot, choices. This does not mean we forget about rules or the other parts of the game, but our main line is designed to provide both GMs and Players with interesting options and elements to build epic campaigns, filled with memorable moments and plot-twists. The campaign setting books will be featuring not only new races, classes and options for Player Characters, or new monsters and dungeons for the GM. They are packed with clever ways to give more power to the players and GM's decisions: ways to tweak or bend the rules into what you want them to be in order to suit your gaming style. Make your adventures a bit more like your favorite movies, series, comic-books or novels.

Besides the Masters of Cetrea line, we have some other stuff: generic “any-world-friendly” adventures, suitable to fill the gaps between your own campaign adventures, or to have a happy dungeon delving night, and books full of rules and options to change the face of your game: these will introduce new mechanics into the game-engine, allowing you to tell more stories and make them more engaging. So, we have a lot of things for you, besides merely more castles with slightly different names.

 

Okay... but what about Cetrea? I wanna know your world.

 

Glad you asked. Cetrea is different from most worlds, because it was not born as a game setting. First it housed stories and philosophies created for their own sake. That let it grow in a very organic way, and develop its own features at its own pace. Instead of adapting the world to the mechanics, we had the chance to see our realm evolve in its own terms, and then we came up with clever ways to adapt the mechanics to what our world was all about. Most “narrative” in many worlds is created to match the cosmologies of the most popular settings, as to fit the rules into them. The same planes, the same concepts... deities, for instance, are pretty much merely a game-mechanic than a part of an actual world. Cetrea's roots are not those. Deities in Cetrea are there to offer mysteries to the game, to generate plots, not only to grant spells or to provide answers via spells. While most rules and mechanics can be used as they are, it includes many variants for all kinds of aspects: new rules for alignments (which have something to do with the Elements), new classes, new rules for magic allowing to bypass the annoying “prepare your spells” system without totally breaking the game. Cetrea is designed to empower imagination instead of restricting it.

First and foremost, Cetrea is a very young world, created by deities mostly unknown by mortals, collectively named the Faceless Gods, as no one seems to have ever seen them. These Deities rarely ever interact with mortals; they simply create and observe. The general ignorance about their purposes, goals and even nature or identity has lead to a myriad of religions, each focused on very different aspects of divinity and life (and death). Religious conflicts, then, are frequent and harsh.

That said, one of few things all people seem to accept is that every living creature has a soul, and when it dies, its soul only fades into the Life-force before coming back to the creation, as a new entity. Reincarnation is what keeps the universe moving, as it allows souls to become better (or worse). It also makes honor and disgrace more meaningful, as they can affect the next life of any person: heroes may return, still trying to make good on an unfulfilled oath, and villains still holding ancient grudges. Besides that, Reincarnation prevents creatures from being resurrected; a soul cannot be returned to a body once they have been parted, and trying to prevent it from following the cycle may result in great evil taking shape.

Now, as the deities themselves rarely ever intervene in their own creation, they appointed their agents, known as the Masters by the mortal races, to watch over the world. These mysterious keepers – and often breakers – of the status quo act secretively to bring order or chaos into the world, according to their own intricate agendas. It is said that the will of the Masters is what truly rules fate, as their alliances and rivalries often involve mortal nations and champions in deadly conflicts that may last for decades or even centuries.

And speaking of mortals, Cetrea is different in one more way. Dragons, not humans, have been the dominant race of the world for a long time. Only recently the Draconian Empire has fallen, and so in this period of transition the other races struggle to fill the power gaps. All of Cetrea's races are different, not only in their game-mechanics, but also in their philosophies and cultures, allowing for deeper development of characters, but also influencing the rules and options available for them.

Magic in Cetrea is a force that most can see, but not many can control. The prodigious artifacts of the Masters have slipped into oblivion, and the weapons and marvels crafted by the dragons are now part of a disorganized black market. Powerful spellcasters are a rarity, since only a few can truly master any of the three paths of magic: Arcane, Natural and Spiritual. As a result, magic is not as prominent as it is in most settings, making things quite grittier than they are in other fantasy realms: magical healing has limits, and it is not widely available, while truly powerful spells are only available to creatures of godlike power, such as the deities themselves, the Masters and the feared Titans. In short, magic is not there to allow regular people to cut corners or have it the easy way in most scenarios.

Another thing that has major relevance in Cetrea, unlike in most settings, are dreams. Dreams allow Masters and other entities to contact mortals, but also allow mortals to visit other Planes with relative safety, without the need for any special magic to be used. Dreams communicate truths too dark to be perceived in “reality”, and nightmares may be as perilous as the vilest dungeon. Many have lost their sanity, their lives and even their souls by carelessly wandering the Dreamscape, yet for some reason it calls out to all mortals. What will you find there, and how will it affect your “reality”?

Finally, the most important themes in Cetrea are both Fate and Freedom. Some things are meant to be, yet many try to defy destiny. Many have claimed that running away from Fate only makes it come sooner. Will you be compelled to do as you are supposed to, or will you defy destiny and break its chains? What the consequences of such a defiance will be?

 

But, who are you, guys? Why support a completely new project?

 

Well, both of us have worked on the publishing world for some time. Besides that, we have always been passionate writers and story-makers, only it had been merely a hobby until now. We created the world of Cetrea by adding a character here, a story there, a legend, and then a few details, and it kept growing silently, witnessed by no one but us and a few friends. However, we believe that Cetrea has become a project too large to remain merely a leisure-time sandbox. We know a bit about making books, so publishing the materials we have on our world felt like the next logical step.

Why to support us? The simple answer is because we are new. New is good. Fresh ideas should always be welcomed, in any context or area of knowledge. We have something different to say. We like to question what has been said before. We have a point of view that no one else had.

Another answer is that we want to do this. Cetrea is happening. With your help it can be done sooner and better. So to speak, we are merely looking for an excuse to make this books; we are not working on something we hate, filling our hours and then forgetting all about Masters of Cetrea until we have to come back to the office. We love what we do. We love our world. We are thinking of it more than of any other thing each and every day. This kind of commitment is our guarantee that you will get what we are promising and more. Let us bring Cetrea to you as fast as possible and with the quality you deserve. The whole thing is already created; putting it into books for you is all that remains.

Final answer: you are getting stuff out of it! Sweet, right?

 

How else can I help?

 

While the obvious way is to contribute with this campaign, and we urge you to do so, there are some other ways you can help us. Start by talking to your friends about this project. Share the link, spread the word. Give us some likes and make this thing viral. Help us get to more people, so they can join forces too! The more people in it, the better our products and your rewards.

If you want to do even more you can donate your artwork to us, and have it appear in our books and website, fully credited and visible to all of our audience, not as fan-art but as official Masters of Cetrea artwork. We cannot use everything, and we may have to be a bit picky, as Cetrea means a lot to us. If you wish to try your hand, there are two ways:

1. You can let us know you are available for a free commission, and send us a piece of artwork that represents your work. In time we will contact you and thank you for your support, and we may add a request for you. As you are donating your work, we'll give no deadlines. You are not even obligated to actually take the commission, but if you want to do it, we will need to know when we can expect your work. If you are unable to finish it, or need more time, it's okay; just make sure you let us know, please. When it is ready, we'll inform you when it gets published.

2. If you have a piece of art that suits the project and has not been published, or decide to create something expressly for it, based on what you have seen so far, you can send it to us, declaring that you wish to donate your work and that it was made by you. We will thank you appropriately and inform you if it will be published, and when.

Please, if you wish to contribute with artwork, be honest. Make sure you submit something we can use without any issues. Do not send artwork owed by third-parties or made by someone else without permission of the artist and/or owner. We appreciate your help, but mind the law and copyrights.

Finally, I ask you once more: try to donate some money, if you have not done so yet. No matter how “small” your collaboration is, it is huge for us. Your support means a lot, and it can make the difference.

 

And what will you do with the money? Partying hard, right?

 

Not really. In fact, most of it will be used to upgrade our equipment. Offering you the best quality means that we need to have the best quality as well. Most of our production happens digitally, as you may well suspect, so having the things necessary to create the artwork and the books is essential; computers, supplies, the occasional need to license fonts and stuff like that... all those require us to invest on them.

Another priority of our team is to put up our website and make sure it stays functional no matter what. Not only it will be our main channel of communication with you guys, but it will also be the place where we will publish lots of free stuff: maps, designer's insight, trivia, and all the basic information of Cetrea that would take forever to be published in books, will be featured there, so you have all data you need to build a whole campaign at hand and without paying a cent for it! Last, but clearly not least, it will also be our main sales platform, as our web store will be there too, along with all the information and teasers on our upcoming products, including summaries on the books to be published, release dates and trial versions when available.

All that said, having people working with us in this project also requires money. Convincing people join our team and devote their time to creating products for you instead of pursuing any other activity means we have to pay them. Even if the main team were to work on Cetrea for free, then we would necessarily divert time and effort from our publishing to focus on paying the rent, publishing slowly and sporadically, which would end up annoying you as much as us. Not to say that we also need to pay people from outside the team to have the books printed and sent to you, for instance, so there is no way around the fact that people's work is not for free.

That is pretty much it. We will gladly respond to your questions and we wish you choose to help us bring Cetrea to life. Thank you!

Religious conflicts, then, are frequent and harsh.
That said, one of few things all people seem to accept is that every living creature has a soul, and when it dies, its soul only fades into the Life-force before coming back to the creation, as a new entity. Reincarnation is what keeps the universe moving, as it allows souls to become better (or worse). It also makes honor and disgrace more meaningful, as they can affect the next life of any person: heroes may return, still trying to make good on an unfulfilled oath, and villains still holding ancient grudges. Besides that, Reincarnation prevents creatures from being resurrected; a soul cannot be returned to a body once they have been parted, and trying to prevent it from following the cycle may result in great evil taking shape.
Now, as the deities themselves rarely ever intervene in their own creation, they appointed their agents, known as the Masters by the mortal races, to watch over the world. These mysterious keepers – and often breakers – of the status quo act secretively to bring order or chaos into the world, according to their own intricate agendas. It is said that the will of the Masters is what truly rules fate, as their alliances and rivalries often involve mortal nations and champions in deadly conflicts that may last for decades or even centuries.
And speaking of mortals, Cetrea is different in one more way. Dragons, not humans, have been the dominant race of the world for a long time. Only recently the Draconian Empire has fallen, and so in this period of transition the other races struggle to fill the power gaps. All of Cetrea's races are different, not only in their game-mechanics, but also in their philosophies and cultures, allowing for deeper development of characters, but also influencing the rules and options available for them.
Magic in Cetrea is a force that most can see, but not many can control. The prodigious artifacts of the Masters have slipped into oblivion, and the weapons and marvels crafted by the dragons are now part of a disorganized black market. Powerful spellcasters are a rarity, since only a few can truly master any of the three paths of magic: Arcane, Natural and Spiritual. As a result, magic is not as prominent as it is in most settings, making things quite grittier than they are in other fantasy realms: magical healing has limits, and it is not widely available, while truly powerful spells are only available to creatures of godlike power, such as the deities themselves, the Masters and the feared Titans. In short, magic is not there to allow regular people to cut corners or have it the easy way in most scenarios.
Another thing that has major relevance in Cetrea, unlike in most settings, are dreams. Dreams allow Masters and other entities to contact mortals, but also allow mortals to visit other Planes with relative safety, without the need for any special magic to be used. Dreams communicate truths too dark to be perceived in “reality”, and nightmares may be as perilous as the vilest dungeon. Many have lost their sanity, their lives and even their souls by carelessly wandering the Dreamscape, yet for some reason it calls out to all mortals. What will you find there, and how will it affect your “reality”?
Finally, the most important themes in Cetrea are both Fate and Freedom. Some things are meant to be, yet many try to defy destiny. Many have claimed that running away from Fate only makes it come sooner. Will you be compelled to do as you are supposed to, or will you defy destiny and break its chains? What the consequences of such a defiance will be?
 
But, who are you, guys? Why support a completely new project?
 
Well, both of us have worked on the publishing world for some time. Besides that, we have always been passionate writers and story-makers, only it had been merely a hobby until now. We created the world of Cetrea by adding a character here, a story there, a legend, and then a few details, and it kept growing silently, witnessed by no one but us and a few friends. However, we believe that Cetrea has become a project too large to remain merely a leisure-time sandbox. We know a bit about making books, so publishing the materials we have on our world felt like the next logical step.
Why to support us? The simple answer is because we are new. New is good. Fresh ideas should always be welcomed, in any context or area of knowledge. We have something different to say. We like to question what has been said before. We have a point of view that no one else had.
Another answer is that we want to do this. Cetrea is happening. With your help it can be done sooner and better. So to speak, we are merely looking for an excuse to make this books; we are not working on something we hate, filling our hours and then forgetting all about Masters of Cetrea until we have to come back to the office. We love what we do. We love our world. We are thinking of it more than of any other thing each and every day. This kind of commitment is our guarantee that you will get what we are promising and more. Let us bring Cetrea to you as fast as possible and with the quality you deserve. The whole thing is already created; putting it into books for you is all that remains.
Final answer: you are getting stuff out of it! Sweet, right?
 
How else can I help?
 
While the obvious way is to contribute with this campaign, and we urge you to do so, there are some other ways you can help us. Start by talking to your friends about this project. Share the link, spread the word. Give us some likes and make this thing viral. Help us get to more people, so they can join forces too! The more people in it, the better our products and your rewards.
If you want to do even more you can donate your artwork to us, and have it appear in our books and website, fully credited and visible to all of our audience, not as fan-art but as official Masters of Cetrea artwork. We cannot use everything, and we may have to be a bit picky, as Cetrea means a lot to us. If you wish to try your hand, there are two ways:
1. You can let us know you are available for a free commission, and send us a piece of artwork that represents your work. In time we will contact you and thank you for your support, and we may add a request for you. As you are donating your work, we'll give no deadlines. You are not even obligated to actually take the commission, but if you want to do it, we will need to know when we can expect your work. If you are unable to finish it, or need more time, it's okay; just make sure you let us know, please. When it is ready, we'll inform you when it gets published.
2. If you have a piece of art that suits the project and has not been published, or decide to create something expressly for it, based on what you have seen so far, you can send it to us, declaring that you wish to donate your work and that it was made by you. We will thank you appropriately and inform you if it will be published, and when.
Please, if you wish to contribute with artwork, be honest. Make sure you submit something we can use without any issues. Do not send artwork owed by third-parties or made by someone else without permission of the artist and/or owner. We appreciate your help, but mind the law and copyrights.
Finally, I ask you once more: try to donate some money, if you have not done so yet. No matter how “small” your collaboration is, it is huge for us. Your support means a lot, and it can make the difference.
 
And what will you do with the money? Partying hard, right?
 
Not really. In fact, most of it will be used to upgrade our equipment. Offering you the best quality means that we need to have the best quality as well. Most of our production happens digitally, as you may well suspect, so having the things necessary to create the artwork and the books is essential; computers, supplies, the occasional need to license fonts and stuff like that... all those require us to invest on them.
Another priority of our team is to put up our website and make sure it stays functional no matter what. Not only it will be our main channel of communication with you guys, but it will also be the place where we will publish lots of free stuff: maps, designer's insight, trivia, and all the basic information of Cetrea that would take forever to be published in books, will be featured there, so you have all data you need to build a whole campaign at hand and without paying a cent for it! Last, but clearly not least, it will also be our main sales platform, as our web store will be there too, along with all the information and teasers on our upcoming products, including summaries on the books to be published, release dates and trial versions when available.
All that said, having people working with us in this project also requires money. Convincing people join our team and devote their time to creating products for you instead of pursuing any other activity means we have to pay them. Even if the main team were to work on Cetrea for free, then we would necessarily divert time and effort from our publishing to focus on paying the rent, publishing slowly and sporadically, which would end up annoying you as much as us. Not to say that we also need to pay people from outside the team to have the books printed and sent to you, for instance, so there is no way around the fact that people's work is not for free.
That is pretty much it. We will gladly respond to your questions and we wish you choose to help us bring Cetrea to life. Thank you!

story:
We are one of the most recognised UK-based indie providers of game creation software, with a great range of affordable game creation tools that make it easier for anyone to make their own apps and computer games. Over the years we have created many game-making products including Dark Basic, FPS Creator, The 3D Gamemaker and AppGameKit. 

One of our most successful products is GameGuru, an easy to use 3D game maker. We're now on a mission to take GameGuru to the next level. We're gearing up to work on GameGuru MAX, the next generation of GameGuru, featuring faster performance and incredible new visuals!

Development is already underway with these features already completed and available in the early Alpha versions that all backers can get access to:

  • Improved user interface
  • Advanced Character Creator
  • Text to speech for AI characters
  • Structure editor for creating buildings
  • Dynamic script system
  • Game entity search and filter library
  • VR support - Windows Mixed Reality

With your help we aim to develop these exciting new features:

  • A new high quality 3D engine
  • Advanced lighting
  • Multiple shadow casts
  • Enhanced Terrain system
  • Flexible vegetation and grass painting
  • Volumetric particle effects
  • Realistic water system
  • Atmospheric weather
  • Time of day system
  • 3D model importer
  • Photon based multiplayer
  • 64 Bit architecture 
  • Steam VR Support (Oculus Rift, HTV Vive, Steam Index headsets)
  • Zombie escape demo game
  • High quality 3D assets

 

We're aiming to raise $20,000 which will all be used to fund the development of GameGuru MAX. The majority will be used to pay for the programming work with the remaining directed towards creating 3D models for the core library.

 

With its easy to use design, GameGuru MAX can be harnessed by anyone who wants to create their own masterpiece. You won't need to learn how to code and we'll be making it even easier for you to import the 3D models and assets you want to use in your games.

You can be sure we'll deliver a great product. TheGameCreators have been in business for over 21 years and comprises of the core team who started back in 1999 plus additional expertise and experience. We'll invest prudently and aim to deliver on time.

 

There are many challenges developing a games engine but we're confident we have the team, experience and skills to overcome what lies ahead. The main area of uncertainty lies with the new 3D rendering engine. We're confident we have this covered because we're aiming to integrate an open source 3D engine called the Wicked Engine, so in a way a lot of the heavy lifting has been done. We're also putting three of our finest minds onto the project to split the work up and ensure a collaborative, quality result is achieved. 

 

If you cannot help financially then please get the word out and share the campaign with friends, family and via any forums or social areas you're involved in. You can use the Indiegogo share tools

story:
We play games to experience adventures that aren’t possible in our real lives. But what if someone could bring that adventure to you?

Alice & Smith want to do just that. As a company, their goal is to make our lives exciting. Through their Alternate Reality Game (ARG) The Black Watchmen, Alice & Smith create a virtual world that blurs the line between a game and real life. Based on the level of immersion you request; they may call you in the middle of the night with clues to a mystery, or leave a package at a predetermined location with vital information, or even abduct you right off the street.

The goal of this Campaign is to bring Alice & Smith to the Midwest to host a Multi-Day Real World Mission in The Black Watchmen Universe. For less than $200, you can be part of a small group of Agents participating in a real world mission created just for us. It’s hard to fly anywhere for less than that anymore, and we can bring it here. We need you, to help make the world more exciting!


*The mission must take place in the red zone. Red zone is for mission loading and unloading only.

And the game doesn’t end with the mission. The mission if just one part of a greater conspiracy that will shape the future of The Black Watchmen ARG. Don't know what an Alternate Reality Game is? Don't worry, a few years ago I didn't either. An ARG immerses you in a virtual world where your wits and skills in the real world are just as important as those in the game. Learn all about the experience from Alice & Smith as well as from those that have experienced their work.

Full disclosure, I am not affiliated with Alice & Smith beyond working with them to create this experience. I am a fan who wishes to bring something exciting to the Midwest, as well as see the Black Watchmen succeed!

The cost of the Swat Team - Real World Mission (created just for this campaign) is $5000 Canadian. That works out to just about $4603 US at the moment. In order to cover the fees for this campaign, we will be raising $4728 and I'll cover the remaining $208 as my pledge. 

Since this is important it will probably get repeated: I'll make the pledge via Kickstarter to help Alice & Smith’s campaign, but even if the Kickstarter does not succeed, we will be giving the proceeds to Alice & Smith and they will be hosting the mission for us and providing the perks.

I chose US dollars for ease of use and to lower fees. If the Canadian dollar gets stronger during the campaign, I will pick up any extra costs.

An adventure right here in the Midwest, where you play a leading role, is not enough? You also get an equal vote on the time and place (Midwest only) of the event so you can be sure it’s close to home for you (seeing as you have to provide your own transportation to the mission).

Still not enough you say?  Every Agent will receive the seven awesome perks from Alice & Smith below; as well as a poker chip exclusively created for this event and the chance to win a hat, dog tags, or even an army jacket. Of course you will also receive full access to The Black Watchmen game for the first season (if the Kickstarter succeeds). For more details on these and the other rewards, check them out here.

*Every agent will receive the rewards above.

*Three lucky agents will earn one of the items above. One of each item is available for the team.


  • What if the Kickstarter for The Black Watchmen doesn't succeed? Alice & Smith have committed to bringing us our mission and perks regardless! 
  • What if you can't make it? If you can't be on site, you can take part as a virtual agent and be with us every step of the way, as well as receive all the perks above.
  • What if we don't meet our goal in this campaign? As a Fixed Goal Campaign, all the money will be refunded automatically by Indiegogo if it doesn't succeed. 
  • What if we can't decide a location or time? I plan to host several rounds of votes, where we slowly narrow the field and have a random number tie breaker. In the end it comes down to the will of the majority, or how good you are at convincing others.

story:
Introduction

Outsider World est le premier jeu en développement du studio Cardigames. C’est un jeu de survie multi-joueurs open world en ligne.
Nous sommes en 2020, vous faites parti d’un des derniers survivants de l’île contrôlée par les Xelox, ses impitoyables envahisseurs venus de l’espace. Maintenant vous devez chercher de quoi survivre sur cette terre désolée afin de combattre pour votre vie.
Partez à l’exploration seul ou en coopération, carftez et réparez des objets pour vous améliorer, capturez des points stratégiques et défendez votre honneur en repoussant au mieux votre ennemi et pour en découvrir plus sur leur espèce.

L’univers du jeu

L’île dans laquelle le jeu se déroule est reconnu pour son activité industrielle. Autour de ce secteur, des zones militaires sont là pour superviser les opérations et les recherches. Une ville et un territoire rural sont également présents sur l’île.
 La région est divisée en plusieurs secteurs eux mêmes divisées en zones. Chaque secteur représente un intérêt unique de le contrôler. Il existe quatre secteurs différents :

Secteur Urbain

C’est le cœur de la région. Une grande ville en guise de terrain de jeu ou vous pourrez vous aventurer pour vous cacher, préparer des embuscades ou tout simplement faire de la recherche d’objets.
C’est aussi la zone d’apparition des survivants lors de leurs débuts dans l’aventure.

Secteur Industriel

Les zones industrielles sont situées à l’est de la ville. Elles sont consultées de différents centres métallurgiques. Maintenant hors de fonctions, il faudra alimenter les différents générateurs pour assembler, grâce au craft, des objets avancés à partir d’objets plus basiques trouvés lors de votre périple. Mais prenez garde à ne pas attirer l’attention…

Secteur Militaire

Anciennement un centre militaire très actif, il est aujourd’hui qu’un tas de débris laissé à l’abandon, situé au nord de l’île. Vous y trouverez des véhicules et des armes inutilisables à moins d’avoir les connaissances requises pour les réparer.

Secteur Rural

Orienté à l’ouest de l’île, c’est un groupement de zones agricoles autrefois paisibles sans grandes activités. On y trouve des terrains d’agricultures et des champs. La végétation y est omni présente, idéal pour se cacher, se reposer et préparer des affrontements en groupe par exemple.

Métiers

Lors de la création de votre personnage il vous sera proposé de choisir un métier qui influera sur votre façon de jouer. Voici la liste des métiers avec les caractéristiques proposés :

  • Le fermier vous permettra de récolter de la nourriture plantée au préalable. Mais ne pensez pas que la récolte sera très profitable.
  • Le militaire est physiquement plus athlétique et maitrise le maniement des armes avec plus de facilité.
  • L’ouvrier vous permettra d’avoir un plus large panel de craft et de travailler le titanium avec plus d’aisance.
  • Le médecin est capable de se soigner et de soigner les blessures plus graves les autres joueurs à l’aide d’équipement qu’il faudra trouver.
  • L’ingénieur est capable de réparer les armes, armures et les véhicules.

Les métiers sont évolutifs : le joueur commence à 75% des capacité acquise grâce au métier. Le métier se présente en points de compétences qu’il faudra déverrouiller au cours de son expérience acquis dans le jeu.
Il sera possible de déverrouiller d’autres métiers avec une limite de 30% de ses capacités.

Les modes

Nous avons la volonté de vous proposer quatre modes de jeu :

  • Le premier est celui du joueurs contres joueurs. Ce mode vous permettra d’incarner un Xelox ou un survivant humain. Qu’allez vous préférer ? Jouer au prédateur ou survivre en tans que proie ?
  • Le deuxième mode est la confrontation à objectif. Xelox ou Humain, votre but sera la réussite de la mission.
  • Le troisième mode est celui de I.A contres joueurs. Vous incarnez un survivant face aux Xelox qui seront impitoyables.
  • Enfin, Le dernier mode de jeu consiste à implémenter du contenu solo pour en découvrir plus sur l’univers du jeu.

Il faut savoir que tous ses modes sont sujet au changement selon les résultats de la compagne de financement.

Les différents objectifs


A savoir

Toute la conception et la réalisation d’Outsider World ont comme ligne directrice le plaisir de jeu. Pour cela nous serons à l’écoute de la communauté et de leurs retours sur le projet. Pas d’extensions, de free to play et de micros transactions qui nuiraient du plaisir du jeu. Nous pensons que le système de sondage est la meilleure solution pour donner la parole aux joueurs tout comme les échanges sur le forum. Par conséquent nous attachons une attention toute particulière à ses outils pour le développement du jeu.


Pour toutes questions éventuelles liées au jeu, veuillez nous contacter sur support@cardigames.com.

Pour plus d'informations nous vous invitons à regarder la vidéo ci-dessus ou à visiter le site http://outsider-world.com/

Merci beaucoup de votre attention et à bientôt sur Outsider-World !
