story:
"We play hard, we play tough, we smash heads, we break bones"

The Mighty Orks cheering song

Hello Fantasy Football fans!!! Here come The Mighty Orks, the hardest and succesful team ever!!! These greenskin killing machines are willing to jump to the pitch. Will you be the coach that lead them to victory?

The Mighty Orks is a new Spanish company that has come to bring you amazing Fantasy Football miniatures. We are a group of enthusiastic players and after a lot of years in the hobby we want to give the next step and start producing our own figures. So we need your help to make this a reality. Of course, we have chosen orks as our first team, because why to choose any other if you can choose orks?

We have the idea and we have the miniatures, but we need your help to release them and make The Mighty Orks team a reality.  All the greens are done, so as soon as we achive the goal and the campaign is funded we will be able to cast and ship the teams. We think that our funding goal is reasonable and we trust that the worldwide Fantasy Football players community will help us to achieve it.

All the miniatures will be casted in high quality resin. This material is lighter than metal and the finish is very good, so we obtain a full detail miniature and the low weight permits us to offer all the backers FREE WORLWIDE SHIPPING.


UPDATE: We have decided to unlock al the Stretch Goals, so now you get a full team composed of 16 players: 4 blitzers, 4 black orks, 4 linemen, 2 throwers, 1 goblin and 1 star player.

We start with a 12 players team but we have prepared a series of goals, and if we can reach them we will finish with a 16 players team, perfect for leagues or tournaments. And what happens if all the goals are achieved and the campaign keeps growing? Don't worry, we have more surprises planned for it!!! You can see bigger pics of the models in the Images Gallery from the campaign.



This is our first crowdfunding campaign, but we have the counselling of the good people from Willy Miniatures, so they have provided us their experience and good advices. You know that they have launched very successful projects in the past so we really appreciate their support and help in this project.

All the miniatures of the campaign are modelled and ready to be casted, so we only wait to obtain the necessary funding to make the resin casting. We have calculated that all the backers will receive their teams in June 2016.

We ship from Europe, so backers from USA, Canada, Australia and other overseas locations can suffer from some kind of delay in the delivery of their teams. That's is a fact that we can't ignore, but we are confident that all the shipments will arrive in the estimated time.
story_txt:
"We play hard, we play tough, we smash heads, we break bones"
The Mighty Orks cheering song
Hello Fantasy Football fans!!! Here come The Mighty Orks, the hardest and succesful team ever!!! These greenskin killing machines are willing to jump to the pitch. Will you be the coach that lead them to victory?


The Mighty Orks is a new Spanish company that has come to bring you amazing Fantasy Football miniatures. We are a group of enthusiastic players and after a lot of years in the hobby we want to give the next step and start producing our own figures. So we need your help to make this a reality. Of course, we have chosen orks as our first team, because why to choose any other if you can choose orks?


We have the idea and we have the miniatures, but we need your help to release them and make The Mighty Orks team a reality.  All the greens are done, so as soon as we achive the goal and the campaign is funded we will be able to cast and ship the teams. We think that our funding goal is reasonable and we trust that the worldwide Fantasy Football players community will help us to achieve it.
All the miniatures will be casted in high quality resin. This material is lighter than metal and the finish is very good, so we obtain a full detail miniature and the low weight permits us to offer all the backers FREE WORLWIDE SHIPPING.













UPDATE: We have decided to unlock al the Stretch Goals, so now you get a full team composed of 16 players: 4 blitzers, 4 black orks, 4 linemen, 2 throwers, 1 goblin and 1 star player.


We start with a 12 players team but we have prepared a series of goals, and if we can reach them we will finish with a 16 players team, perfect for leagues or tournaments. And what happens if all the goals are achieved and the campaign keeps growing? Don't worry, we have more surprises planned for it!!! You can see bigger pics of the models in the Images Gallery from the campaign.












This is our first crowdfunding campaign, but we have the counselling of the good people from Willy Miniatures, so they have provided us their experience and good advices. You know that they have launched very successful projects in the past so we really appreciate their support and help in this project.
All the miniatures of the campaign are modelled and ready to be casted, so we only wait to obtain the necessary funding to make the resin casting. We have calculated that all the backers will receive their teams in June 2016.
We ship from Europe, so backers from USA, Canada, Australia and other overseas locations can suffer from some kind of delay in the delivery of their teams. That's is a fact that we can't ignore, but we are confident that all the shipments will arrive in the estimated time.

story:
Meet Dale Hardshovel fearless australian archeologist – a mixture of characters between Indiana Jones and Crocodile Dundee.


Without hesitation Dale Hardshovel gets himself involved in his first quest to help his daughter Daisy in finding a solution to the cyphered manuscript.

Dale's most valuable tools that he uses in solving his quests are his head/mind and his hard and heavy shovel as his last name implies.

Dale and Daisy's first adventure starts in Dale's study

“It is a usual working day in Dale's study. Suddenly, his daughter Daisy rushes in, holding a piece of old papyrus with strange inscriptions. She needs it for her archaeological exhibition, but she can't translate it. Intrigued by the papyrus, Dale checks his archaeological network and finds out that the inscription is the belonging of an ancient brotherhood from Egypt, and the only key to the translation is the mysterious Bloomstone.

However, the secret is hidden in the Big Pyramid, guarded by Anubis, an ancient Egyptian deity. Now, Dale has to solve 100 puzzles that Anubis set for him, and to collect all the missing pieces of the Bloomstone. But he will soon discover that there is much more to this challenge...”

We started working on our previous version of the game in 2007. using C and SDL library – combination that made sense for that time. Game was developed only for PC and Windows OS and later ported to Mac OS X.

As time passed by, new revolutionary hardware gadgets were presented by Apple, iPhone at first, followed by iPad and later counter attacked by Google's Android. Touch gaming became very popular, and we came with the idea to remake Dale Hardshovel to suit those devices and input mechanics – mouse is just not enough for Dale.

Following touch revolution – game development engine revolution happened! Unity engine became popular and we at PHIME STUDIO stared using it. Our production boosted with the Unity engine and now we are able to port our games to many platforms as desktop PC and Mac and Linux , iOS iPhone / iPad and Android phones and tablets.

Game features over 100 of pure mind twisting levels to solve, original inhouse composed soundtracks, story based quest

Gameplay in Dale Hardshovel HD was inspired by old puzzle game by TAITO called Puzznic. Main idea in the game is that you move, drop and connect when you solve the artifacts in level.

Figurine

There are two types of figurines

  • Small one with the dimensions  2.6w x 4.0 d x 5.95 h

  • Large one with the dimensions  5.2 w x 8.0 d x 11.9 h

 

T-shirts male/female

Large printed poster

Jigsaw puzzle with 252 pieces

 

The estimated date for the finished game is March/April 2013.

story:
Short Summary

  • We are an indie game development studio based in Mumbai. We have just started out and have planned to register ourselves as a company and then release games.
  • This campaign is very important because it helps us with the registration and after that, release the games on all the respective platforms.
  • The contributions will go a long way to create a base for the company and a set of games we plan to release.

What We Need & What You Get

To break it down in more detail:

  • Basically, we need funding for our registration as an entity.
  • This would create a base on which we could grow our company.
  • We have already launched a lite version of the game on iOS, The gameplay video can be viewed above. We are intending to have a mega release of the game involving a variety of Portal travelling experiences for our users and increase the interactivity through Virtual Reality and an additional platform, Apple TV.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we would try to make sure that whatever money we get is used for the things we want to achieve. 

The Impact

  • This kind of contribution will bring an immense difference in our plans to grow the company. We would also like to make games which give a different experience to the user, both virtual reality and normal games. For the details of our upcoming projects, you can have a look at www.acidtriparts.com
  • The link for the lite version of Beyond The Void -  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/beyond-the-void...

Risks & Challenges

  • For the first release of the game, we made it in two weeks. We did not have any money for marketing. 
  • One of the reasons we want some funding is because we can also focus on marketing as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If not money, we would like people to spread the word about our product. We want our product to be known to as many people as possible.
  • We want our users to enjoy the experience and not only play the game from a scoring standpoint but also have a look into the interaction of the game with ambient sounds and mesmerising artwork.
  • You could share our campaign using the tools available at indiegogo.

Visit our website - www.acidtriparts.com

FB Page - https://www.facebook.com/AcidTripArts/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/AcidTripArts

SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/acidtrip-arts

story:
Lords of the Water Cooler is a 2D adventure RPG, where players can play as two customizable classes in a world created completely by the characters’ imagination.  The game is currently being developed for iOS devices.


Players take the role of a typical office employee, bored to death with his job.  As most of us have, at one point or another, the character gets so bored he pretends he is in an adventure RPG when he has to complete tasks at work.  He uses his imagination to literally transform the environment, objects, and even the people around him to create themed levels and worlds.  Ordinary objects become weapons, armor, quest items, and even monsters to fight!  Tedious tasks become quests, and your supervisor becomes a boss you fight to move up to the next floor.

  • No:

    • Ads

    • Subscriptions

    • Premium Currency

    • Microtransactions

  • Two playable classes, Warrior and Mage

  • Four “floors”, each with its own Challenge Arena, boss room, and two large dungeon areas to explore, complete quests, kill enemies, and do all of those great RPG things you love to do!

  • Customizable skills

  • Armor and Weapons that change in both appearance and ability as your character levels up

  • Replay value – classes level up independently, so you can play the game through multiple times with a new gameplay experience every time.



Dorkatorium Games is an independent video game studio in Reno, Nevada comprised of Dan Bailey, Jake Leveroni, and Zack Cordisco.  We all got started in the game industry because we are hardcore gamers and want to spend our days creating the games that we love to play.  We work hard to stay true to our roots, and love hearing from other gamers, attending conferences, and playing games as much as we can in our spare time.  Loyalty to the fans and quality games are Dorkatorium’s #1 priorities, so we refuse to sacrifice our integrity.  All of our games are and will remain original; no cookie-cutters here!  Every idea we have is unique, and we will never rehash old ideas just to make a quick buck. 

The team has a combined ten years’ experience in the video game industry.  Among us, we have shipped almost 20 titles and have worked in both internal and third-party development.  We have worked on titles including XCOM: Enemy Unknown, StarCraft II, Grand Theft Auto III, Mini Motor Racing, Tap the Frog, Hollow Point, and more.




We are raising funds to finish our game, and get it out to you!  There are still art assets and plenty of programming left to create, and our team needs to eat.  100% of the money raised will go directly to making the game.  The more money we raise, the better the game will look and the more content we can add.  If we raise enough, we can even hire more people so that we can add even more content and still get the game out on time, or even early!

Because integrity and fan loyalty are our #1 priorities, we are self-publishing the game.  This allows us to make the game how we and our fans want it to be, without having changes made by someone who is just looking at numbers and doesn’t care about originality or integrity.  It also allows us to stay connected to the fans, by getting the players involved in development.  Backers can actually participate in development, by contributing ideas and staying tuned in to the happenings throughout the development process.  However, that also means we have to pay for everything ourselves, including feeding the team, computers, software, marketing, and all that fun stuff.  We have already invested a lot of our own money and we will continue to do so, but we would really love to get folks involved so we can make the game as great as it really can be!



As we said, 100% of the money raised will go directly to making the game, even if we raise more than our goal!  If that happens, we will be able to add more content to the game and even start working on expansions.  We have an initial list of stretch goals below, but as the campaign goes on, we will add more perks and stretch goals as each milestone is passed.  The more we raise, the bigger the game gets.  It is also important that we get the game out when we say we will, so even if the campaign is a success and we add more content, the stretch goals take into account the cost of adding more content while still releasing the game on time!



This is a low risk project, because we will be releasing the game no matter what.  We have already invested our personal money to get things started, and should be able to finish the game.  We are raising money so that we can get the game done in a reasonable time, add all of the features the players deserve to see, and make the game function and look tip-top!  Any money we raise will go to making the game as great as it can be, as well as add new content to the game!


Thanks for checking out our campaign!  We appreciate your time and any contributions you made!  Please share this site with your friends so we can make this game as epic as possible!

Facebook:    https://www.facebook.com/Dorkatorium

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Dorkatorium1

Our Website:  http://www.dorkatoriumgames.com

YouTube Channel:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l6pXdweARZA

story:
Xion (pronounced Zion) will be a hub for all things geek, gamer, and otaku. We will be opening soon, but we could use your help! We don't want to just give you the shop you need. We want to give you the shop that you deserve!  We don't want it to be bare-bones starting out! We want to be able to hit the ground at full speed and we need your help to make this the best geek, gamer, and otaku shop around!

Funds from this Indiegogo campaign will go towards purchasing things like tables, chairs, display cases, wall decorations, licenses, gaming gear, and much more.

Recently, we hosted Epicon, southwest Georgia's first geek convention. It was a huge success thanks to all of you who came out and joined us!  The next step is bringing you a shop that is a little piece of what you experienced there!  Xion will help us in turn make Epicon even bigger and better every year by giving us a means to raise awareness and grow the geek culture in our area and at the same time bring in funds to support it year-round!


Xion will be like a second home for most of the Albany area geek community and we want your help to make it the best it can possibly be from day one! 

This will be a shop for geeks, gamers, and otakus, by geeks, gamers, and otakus! 

Our mission is to provide the Southwest Georgia area with a centralized hub for all things Geek, Gamer, and Otaku, such as:

  • Trading Card Games (Magic the Gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh!, Pokemon)
  • Video Games (Call of Duty, Super Smash Brothers, etc...)
  • Table Top Games (Dungeons & Dragons, Warhammer, Shadow Run)
  • Anime and Manga
  • Cosplay Supplies
  • LARPing Supplies
  • Artisan made wares that you would normally only find at Conventions
  • Collectibles
  • And lots more!

Xion will also help to create new jobs and entertainment for our area. 

As the popularity of movies and television shows such as The Walking Dead, The Avengers, Dr. Who, Star Trek, Star Wars, etc… continues to grow, people want to keep feeding their fandom through shops like we are proposing.  With the advent of cyber and tabletop gaming and overall geek culture continuing to grow at an exponential rate, easy and affordable access to a centralized place where you can get these services is quickly becoming a necessity.

We want to provide a place with activities that are focused on community socialization and play in a comfortable place.  People of all ages and backgrounds will come to enjoy the unique and innovative environment that Xion will provide and will want to come back-- and bring their friends with them!

We are not just creating repeat customers. Xion will be growing a fan base of it's own.

We need your help in order to make this, a dream that is shared by many, a reality! 

We are trying to reach a goal of $20,000.00.

This money will go towards:

  • Lease on Building
  • Licenses
  • Utilities
  • Interior and Exterior Improvements like: signage, shelves, counters, displays, paint, decorum, seating, tables, TVs, games, etc...

That sounds like a lot of money, but it is not as much as you would think! In order to create a place and experience like none other, we will need it all if not more. 

We don't just want to be a novelty shop or game store that you walk in and leave immediately after. We want you to have a place to be able to relax and enjoy all the things that make you a fan of whatever fandom you might like. Where you can do things like: 

  • Use the high-speed Wi-Fi internet for free!
  • Watch the latest anime! 
  • Game with your friends around a table or on a console without worry. 
  • A safe environment where people can gather and have fun.
  • Events such as weekly tournaments and contests with prizes.
  • Large in-store events and Mini Cons!
  • Earn rewards for repeat visitors and event goers through our Members XP program where you gain experience points (XP) and Level Up through your participation and purchases giving you discounts, prizes, and access to special events! There will even be Achievements to Unlock at Xion! 


Our Indiegogo supporter rewards will include:

  • Exclusive Indiegogo only swag from XION!
  • Jump starts for Member Levels and XP!
  • In-store discounts!
  • An exclusive XION Members Badge with Lanyard with your name on it!
  • Early Admission to our tournaments the day of grand opening!
  • Having your name immortalized on our store walls!
  • Always having a seat with your name on it available to you!
  • The opportunity to own a piece of XION itself through in-house stocks!


We want you to know that these XION memberships and rewards will be well worth it.

Here's how the XP system will work and why it is a good idea to get these bonuses while you can by being one of our backers.

  • Every time you attend an event or make a purchase in the store, you will earn XP and will be able to level up after reaching a threshold. As you level up you will get in-store exclusives like achievements, discounts, freebies, admission to special events, drawings, tournament entries, and even in-store credit. 
  • The level of backing that you choose in the rewards will also be the level that you will start at when the shop opens, after the campaign is over everyone else from that point on will start off as a Level 0 member. This is a chance to get a jump start on earning future rewards once we open. I hope this will encourage you to become a backer and help us create the paradise for geeks that we all want.

  • We will have a Wall of Fame in Xion that will include a special permanent place exclusively to thank those who back us here! This will be dedicated to all of you who help make this paradise become a reality.
  • We will also have special guests from across the geek community at our Grand Opening.  Our first special guest will be announced after we reach the $10,000 mark and we will continue to announce more at every $5,000 increment after that!


Stretch Goals!

If we reach our goal for this Indiegogo, we will have further rewards for everyone. Our first stretch goal will hit just as soon as we break $20,000. The reward will be an in-store mini-con just in time for Halloween! We plan on having special guests, cosplay contests, gaming tournaments, food, and more! The best part is, this event will not cost anyone that comes a single dime! It will be a reward for everyone's hard work and efforts to help make Xion happen. Every single one of our backers will all receive something special at this event as well be recognized for their contributions!

Stretch Goals

$20,001 // An in-store Mini-Con for Halloween with free admission!

$25,000 // ??????Unlocked once $20,001 is reached???????????

$30,000 // ????? Unlocked once $25,000 is reached???????????


The Impact on our Area

I feel like this is something that not just geeks, but everyone in the southwest Georgia region, as a community, could use for entertainment and socialization. This would save people money by giving them a local place to go to instead of having to drive for hours to get to anything entertaining. It would also give people an inclination to get out of their houses and meet new people, as well as friends, in a place that is both welcoming and comfortable. We want people to be able to socialize in a place that isn't a social network but a network of fellow enthusiasts in a social environment!

It would go beyond just entertainment.

We would also do charitable work in the region by having the Xion's Cosplayers dress as everyone's favorite superheros and visit children in local and regional hospitals bringing kids happiness and hope and also appear at charity events giving back to the community. 

We will also be hosting charitable tournaments and events to raise funds for local charities as we did with Epicon!

The events and tournaments we host could also bring in many out-of-town customers that could in turn equal additional customers and clientele for surrounding businesses in the region.

The risks and challenges involved with starting Xion are:

Will there be a demand for the services offered by Xion in the city of Albany or the Southwest GA region?

Yes.  Without driving at the least an 2 hours, and into another state, the services XION has to offers is not available anywhere else in our region.


This photo shows a small section of locals that came to Epicon.

Will the popularity of the Geek culture continue to grow, or is it merely a fad? 

As long as comic books and movies are around, there will always be someone looking to further their fandom. We want to be the ones meeting that need.

We are going to be fostering the growth of E-Sports, LARPing and Table Top competition with official tournaments and leagues that players can join. These will include both single player and team play. 

We will also be an Official Learning Hub site for anyone wanting to learn how to play any of the games that we are having tournaments for and teach new players how to advance in their skills and become competitive players. 


Is there a client base already existing in the area?

Yes. There are many people who are already members of different geek, gamer, and otaku related clubs at the colleges and in the Albany area in general who would like to see a shop like ours take root and have a place to be able to have group functions at. They are already driving hours away to shops in Tallahassee, FL and Dothan, AL. We would be able to supply them with a place that is local and help keep our regional economy stronger in doing so. We had over 1000 in attendance at our event Epicon, a 1 day convention, showing that the demand in the area is here! We just need a place to be able to serve it!

Will you still open XION if you do not succeed in reaching your goal?

Yes. We will we are putting our own funds into this project and will be opening at the latest November of 2015. If we are successful, however, we will be shooting to have our Grand Opening in October 2015! Moving the timeline forward quite a bit and giving you an even better experience and environment than we alone could offer.

We are confident in our past Indiegogo success from using a crowd-funding source to start Epicon that we could reach our goals if everyone comes together for this.



After all, this is not just our shop, it is a place for customer to come and celebrate what they enjoy and be themselves!

Even if you can't help financially, you can help us by getting the word out and spreading it across the social media like wildfire! Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Instagram, etc...


Anyway you can get the word out please do!
story_txt:
Xion (pronounced Zion) will be a hub for all things geek, gamer, and otaku. We will be opening soon, but we could use your help! We don't want to just give you the shop you need. We want to give you the shop that you deserve!  We don't want it to be bare-bones starting out! We want to be able to hit the ground at full speed and we need your help to make this the best geek, gamer, and otaku shop around!Funds from this Indiegogo campaign will go towards purchasing things like tables, chairs, display cases, wall decorations, licenses, gaming gear, and much more.Recently, we hosted Epicon, southwest Georgia's first geek convention. It was a huge success thanks to all of you who came out and joined us!  The next step is bringing you a shop that is a little piece of what you experienced there!  Xion will help us in turn make Epicon even bigger and better every year by giving  us a means to raise awareness and grow the geek culture in our area and at the same time bring in funds to support it year-round!Xion will be like a second home for most of the Albany area geek community and we want your help to make it the best it can possibly be from day one! This will be a shop for geeks, gamers, and otakus, by geeks, gamers, and otakus! Our mission is to provide the Southwest Georgia area with a
centralized hub for all things Geek, Gamer, and Otaku, such as:


Trading Card Games (Magic the
Gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh!, Pokemon)


Video Games (Call of Duty, Super Smash Brothers,
etc...)


Table Top Games (Dungeons &
Dragons, Warhammer, Shadow Run)


Anime and Manga

Cosplay Supplies
LARPing Supplies
Artisan made wares that you would normally only find at Conventions

Collectibles


And lots more!


Xion will also help to create new jobs and entertainment for
our area. 
As the popularity of movies and television shows such
as The Walking Dead, The Avengers, Dr. Who, Star
Trek, Star Wars, etc… continues to grow, people want to keep
feeding their fandom through shops like we are proposing.  With the advent
of cyber and tabletop gaming and overall geek culture continuing to grow at an
exponential rate, easy and affordable access to a centralized place where you
can get these services is quickly becoming a necessity.


We want to provide a place with activities
that are focused on community socialization and play in a comfortable place.
 People of all ages and backgrounds will come to enjoy the unique and
innovative environment that Xion will provide and will want to come back-- and
bring their friends with them!
We are not just creating repeat customers. Xion will
be growing a fan base of it's own.
We need your help in order to make this, a dream that is
shared by many, a reality! 
We are trying to reach a goal of $20,000.00.
This money will go towards:


Lease on Building

Licenses

Utilities


Interior and Exterior Improvements
like: signage, shelves, counters, displays, paint, decorum, seating, tables, TVs, games, etc...


That sounds like a lot of money, but it is not as much as
you would think! In order to create a place and experience like none
other, we will need it all if not more. 

We don't just want to be a novelty shop or game store that you
walk in and leave immediately after. We want you to have a place to be able to
relax and enjoy all the things that make you a fan of whatever fandom you
might like. Where you can do things like: 


Use the high-speed Wi-Fi internet
for free!


Watch the latest anime! 


Game with your friends around a
table or on a console without worry. 


A safe environment where
people can gather and have fun.


Events such as weekly tournaments and
contests with prizes.

Large in-store events and Mini Cons!
Earn rewards for repeat visitors and
event goers through our Members XP program where you gain experience points
(XP) and Level Up through your participation and purchases giving you
discounts, prizes, and access to special events! There will even be
Achievements to Unlock at Xion! 


Our Indiegogo supporter rewards will include:


Exclusive Indiegogo only swag from
XION!


Jump starts for Member Levels and XP!


In-store
discounts!


An exclusive XION Members Badge with Lanyard with your name on it!


Early Admission to our tournaments the day of grand opening!


Having your name immortalized on our store walls!


Always having a seat with your name on it available to you!


The opportunity to own a piece of XION itself through in-house stocks!



We want you to know that these XION memberships and
rewards will be well worth it. Here's how the XP system will work and
why it is a good idea to get these bonuses while you can by being one of our backers. 
Every time you attend an event or make a purchase in the store, you
will earn XP and will be able to level up after reaching a threshold. As you
level up you will get in-store exclusives like achievements, discounts,
freebies, admission to special events, drawings, tournament entries, and even
in-store credit. 

The level of backing that you choose in the rewards will also be the level that
you will start at when the shop opens, after the campaign is over everyone else
from that point on will start off as a Level 0 member. This is a chance to get a jump
start on earning future rewards once we open. I hope this will encourage you to
become a backer and help us create the paradise for geeks that we all want.





We will have a Wall of Fame in Xion that will include a
special permanent place exclusively to thank those who back us here! This will be dedicated to all of you who help make this paradise become a
reality.


We will also have special guests from across the
geek community at our Grand Opening.  Our first special guest will be announced after we reach the
$10,000 mark and we will continue to announce more at every $5,000 increment after that!



Stretch Goals!If we reach our goal for this Indiegogo, we will have further rewards for everyone. Our first stretch goal will hit just as soon as we break $20,000. The reward will be an in-store mini-con just in time for Halloween! We plan on having special guests, cosplay contests, gaming tournaments, food, and more! The best part is, this event will not cost anyone that comes a single dime! It will be a reward for everyone's hard work and efforts to help make Xion happen. Every single one of our backers will all receive something special at this event as well be recognized for their contributions!Stretch Goals$20,001 // An in-store Mini-Con for Halloween with free admission!$25,000 // ??????Unlocked once $20,001 is reached???????????$30,000 // ????? Unlocked once $25,000 is reached???????????The Impact on our Area
I feel like this is something that not just geeks, but everyone in the southwest
Georgia region, as a community, could use for entertainment and socialization. This would save people money by
giving them a local place to go to instead of having to drive for hours to get
to anything entertaining. It would also give people an inclination to get out
of their houses and meet new people, as well as friends, in a place that is
both welcoming and comfortable. We want people to be able to socialize in a
place that isn't a social network but a network of fellow enthusiasts in a
social environment!It would go beyond just entertainment.
We would also do charitable work in the region by having the
Xion's Cosplayers dress as everyone's favorite superheros
and visit children in local and regional hospitals bringing kids happiness
and hope and also appear at charity events giving back to the community. We will also be hosting charitable tournaments and events to raise funds for local charities as we did with Epicon!
The events and tournaments we host could also bring in many
out-of-town customers that could in turn equal additional customers and
clientele for surrounding businesses in the region.
The risks and challenges involved with starting Xion are:
Will there be
a demand for the services offered by Xion in the city of Albany or the
Southwest GA region?
Yes.  Without driving at the least an 2 hours, and into
another state, the services XION has to offers is not available anywhere else
in our region.
This photo shows a small section of locals that came to Epicon.Will the
popularity of the Geek culture continue to grow, or is it merely a fad? 
As long as comic books and movies are around, there will
always be someone looking to further their fandom. We want to be the ones
meeting that need.We are going to be fostering the growth of E-Sports, LARPing and Table Top competition with official tournaments and leagues that players can join. These will include both single player and team play. We will also be an Official Learning Hub site for anyone wanting to learn how to play any of the games that we are having tournaments for and teach new players how to advance in their skills and become competitive players. 
Is there a
client base already existing in the area?
Yes. There are many people who are already members of different geek, gamer, and otaku related clubs at
the colleges and in the Albany area in general who would like to see a shop like ours take root and have a place to be able to have group functions at.
They are already driving hours away to shops in Tallahassee, FL and Dothan, AL. We would
be able to supply them with a place that is local and help keep our regional economy
stronger in doing so. We had over 1000 in attendance at our event Epicon, a 1 day convention, showing that the demand in the area is here! We just need a place to be able to serve it!
Will you
still open XION if you do not succeed in reaching your goal?
Yes. We will we are putting our own funds into this project and will be opening at the
latest November of 2015. If we are successful, however, we will be shooting to
have our Grand Opening in October 2015! Moving the timeline forward quite a
bit and giving you an even better experience and environment than we alone
could offer.
We are confident in our past Indiegogo success from using a
crowd-funding source to start Epicon that we could reach our goals if everyone comes together for this.

After all, this is not just our shop, it is a place for
customer to come and celebrate what they enjoy and be themselves!

Even if you can't help financially, you can help us by
getting the word out and spreading it across the social media like wildfire!
Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Instagram, etc...
Anyway you can get the word out please do!

story:
Why We Exist?

Lovewin combines people's love for playing mobile games, fashion, gadgets and travel  to support and impact social change,

The goal is for LOVEWIN to bring the idea of ‘giving back’ into mainstream consciousness.”


How does it work ?

 

What We Need

We are hoping for a funding of US$150,000 to help us kickstart the next stage of our campaign. 

 

Support LOVEWIN to receive our token of appreciation

To thank our backers, we have put together several tiers of gifts. Besides free game credits, we have curated some limited edition LOVEWIN merchandise. This includes 3 different pouch designs and a trendy bracelet. 

 

Giving Back

LOVEWIN hopes to collaborate with even more charity organizations, so that people using LOVEWIN can give back locally within their own communities

LOVEWIN is not a charity organization. Nor is it attempting to eradicate the culture of desire for material goods. Rather, it a company that aims to get people to give back, while also getting something for themselves.

 

 
 
Do check us out on the social media platform to stay up to date on the prizes that we give out every 10 days.
 

 https://www.facebook.com/Lovewinofficial/

https://www.instagram.com/lovewin_official/

https://www.lovewin.com/

story:
An Educational Game Studio for the 21st - Century 

Different Game Studio

 

Welcome to Mars

Learn

Solve

Vanquish

Have Fun!

 

Project Skylab 2 - Description

Project Skylab 2 is going to make Algebra three-dimensional, engaging, and non-isolating. In the game, you are stranded on the surface of Mars due to a catastrophic accident. You will learn how to solve basic to advanced Algebra problems in your pursuit to escape Mars, but danger lurks around every corner. There is an army of cybernetic killer robots hunting for you. Your goal is to shut down the AI computer known as CAL(Cybernetic Assisted Learning) who controls this army of killer robots. You will have to use your arsenal of weapons to defeat CAL. You will also have your trusty rover to guide you across the red planet. The Mars landscape is 4x4 miles, so have fun exploring. The goal of the game is to create a comfortable, relaxing, and fun learning environment for students.

 

About Different Game Studio

My name is Justin Gedeon. I am a 21-year old college student from Murrieta, California who is passionate about changing education in the United States. I am the founder and president of Different Game Studio. I am a math, computer, and science geek who wants to get everyone excited about learning math. I love education! I built this company because I am tired of watching American students continue to score poorly in math. I believe some math teachers should not be teaching math as they overcomplicate the subject for students. I have had two horrible math teachers at the college level, one laughed at me for asking a question on a complicated topic, and the other taught directly from the book, which was extremely difficult. I’ve also had some incredible math professors, who have forever changed my life for the better. Math has been taught the same way for thousands of years, and it’s time for something new to be done. I want my video games to be there for the students who feel hopeless and don’t have a professor that believes in them. I think the cost of private tutoring is far too expensive, so I wanted to create an affordable alternative to help low-income families and even poor college students, who cannot afford private math tutoring. I want to help as many students as I can because I care about people. Anyone can learn anything with the right teacher and with just the right amount of encouragement. I have independently developed and have published two free-to-play educational math video games on the digital distribution platform known as Steam. Both games are in the early stages of development and are free-to-play.  Both games are rough drafts of what my vision for education should look like in the future. Project Skylab is focused around intermediate algebra, whereas Project Skylab 2 is focused around simple fundamental math concepts. All of my efforts are going towards the completion of Project Skylab 2, which is the game featured in this Indiegogo campaign. Understanding simple fundamental math concepts is so vital to understanding intermediate algebra.  This is why all my efforts are going towards Project Skylab 2. My games are nowhere near perfect, but they are lightyears ahead of my competitors. I read all of the user feedback because I genuinely care about building the best educational video game. Click on the image to be redirected to the Steam store page and the full trailer link below.

 

 

Why an Indiegogo Campaign?

Different Game Studio is dedicated to education through gamification. I, Justin Gedeon, am the sole developer and the only employee of Different Game Studio. I want to assemble a team of talented developers to help me complete the development of Project Skylab 2.  I am a self-taught game developer and a computer geek. I have reached the technical limits of what I can accomplish by myself. The framework for the game is already complete and ready to go for when new developers come on staff.  Project Skylab 2 is available now in Early Access on Steam, but it’s far from completion and is in the Alpha phase of development. Both of my games are functional proof of concepts that educational video games can and should be better. I can no longer sit idly by and watch kids continue to struggle in math. Learning any subject should always be fun and interactive. All of the funds raised from this campaign will go directly into the development of Project Skylab 2. The goal for the final game is to have 200-250 math equations with mini-lectures, online multiplayer, and be better optimized for console hardware. The funds will also go towards publishing the game on Xbox One. If you want to learn more about my vision for education through gamification, read the About Us page on my website linked below. Thank you very much for your time!

"I am not reaching for the stars, I am reaching just an inch higher" (The Newsroom).

Risks & Challenges

The funds raised from this campaign are going towards building a talented team to reconstruct Project Skylab 2 from the ground up for low-end computer hardware as well as consoles. This optimization challenge is a significant hurdle, but I believe we can overcome it. Maintaining a quality of excellence based upon user feedback is my most important priority. Implementing user feedback can sometimes lead to delays in production, but it’s crucial to building a better user experience. I view competition as my most significant risk, but I already have a big headstart on them. There are not that many educational game studios left in the world, and the ones that still exist, have very little to no market traction. The quality of my competitor's educational video games, in my opinion, are inferior and feel like the traditional, not very fun, educational video game we have all come accustomed.

Other Ways You Can Help

User feedback is by far my greatest asset; you the player, by leaving just a single comment on my game can help me learn and improve upon my mistakes. I want to get people excited about learning math, and the only way that’s going to happen is by listening to players. So even if you don’t want to contribute to my campaign today and only leave some feedback, I am still incredibly grateful. I am trying to make learning more fun, interactive, and more practical for the real world. And that's all there is to it.

story:
Magic Farm 3: Ice Danger is an adventure at your own pace. Take care of your farms and customize them as you see fit. Explore the magic world, solve quests, meet people and trade for the rare goods.​

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1113060/Magi...

Our community: https://www.facebook.com/magic.farm.community/

The good old-fashioned farm is here again! The story started way back in in 2008... The first installment of Magic Farm series was warmly welcomed by the players:​

  • “The graphics and sound are amazing the gameplay is near perfect and your pet dragon is amazingly awesome!” - Jason Stanhouse, Amazon [Magic Farm 2 Ultimate Flower] (https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RJ8I...)
  •  “Magic Farm brings a rare combination of features to the casual game genre” - Joel Bridie, Gamezebo (Magic Farm) [https://www.gamezebo.com/2008/03/10/magic-farm-...]
  • “The graphics is great, the game play is addictive and you can buy so many decor things to keep you busy for weeks” - mikylangela, Big Fish (Magic Farm 2) [https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/6346/magic-f...]

We are pleased that we can return to this project once more and finally give our players a continuation of an exciting time management Magic Farm series.

What is waiting for you:

- Meet with familiar old characters and make more new friends

- Favorite gameplay with a lot of improvements

- 4 new amazing locations

- More than 100 quests

- Think strategic — choose how to achieve goals

- Leveling up main characters makes the gameplay progressively interesting. You can choose who you are: a brawler who fights with enemies or a gardener who forces everything to bloom around with a wave of the hand

- Additional quests and free gameplay in open locations

Iris, the main character of the game, has an amazing ability to grow magical flowers! Who would have thought that this skill could be useful at the most crucial moment?

You have to organize the management of your own farm, help plants grow faster, harvest them, and protect from pests that are trying to destroy your priceless flowers!

Familiar gameplay with delightful new features.

Grow and upgrade your own farm. Customize it to make it prettier. Grow flowers, collect magical ingredients and create magnificent bouquets!


 

Replenish water supplies in a time and make sure that the basket with flowers for sale is not overfilled.


Fight with pests and do not let them destroy your precious plants! Be careful! Pests now have their own abilities!


Make your fists do the talking! Hard time call for extreme measures!

Collect different types of flowers and sell them! Improve your plants and they will bring you more profits!


Gaining experience and money will allow you to buy improvements. They can make your life much easier!

Can you cope with growing magical flowers and successfully complete all the tasks? 4 locations with unique landscapes for you to build on!

Enjoy challenging endless mode after completing the main storyline.

Healers, fairies, leaders, merchants ... A whole string of characters to befriend! Immerse yourself in a fascinating unknown world! More than 100 quests await you, as well as side stories! You can choose your own way of doing things: fight the enemies with a brute force or use your hands not for violence, but for the creation of new life.

 

You can get precious items for helping us:

1. FULL Game Access (1 Steam Key instant delivery)

2. Pre-Release Test Access (1 Steam Key)

3. Name in credits - We apprecitate your interest


 

 

The release of the game is planned for PC and Mac.



 

 

Our studio Meridian’93 have more than 25 years of experience on the market!

One of our most successful projects is the Magic Farm series, originated in 2008. We saw that the players miss it, so we decided to return to this game series after a long break!

Our games:

Admiral: Sea Battles (1996)

Rooster’s Revenge 1.0 (1998)

Rooster’s Revenge 1.5 Addon (1998)

Rooster’s Revenge 2.0 (1998)

Rooster’s Revenge 3.0 (1998)

Pipi Prinz (1999)

Puzzle (1999)

HotRod (2000)

BallerParty (2001)

DuckHunt (2001)

Die Rache der Sumpfhühner 2 (2001)

BSE Bomber (2002)

Battle of Election (2002)

Carcasonne (2003)

Carcassonne Addon (2003)

Carcassonne 2 (2003)

Alexander: The Heroes Hour (2004)

El Grande (2004)

MouseForce (2004)

Muzzle (2005)

Dreamworld's Open: Mini Golf (2006)

Wolfhound (2006)

Numericon (2006)

Carcassonne: Koenig und Raubritter (2006)

Key Words (2006)

Dragon (2006)

Baby Drive (2007)

Destiny Architect (2007)

Flowers Story (2007)

Magic Farm (2008)

Flowers Story: Fairy Quest (2008)

Mystery of Unicorn Castle (2008)

Hidden World of Art (2009)

Hidden World of Art 2: Undercover Art Agent (2009)

Antique Shop (2009)

Magic Farm: Ultimate Flower (2009)

Unexpected Journey (2010)

Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands (2011)

Summer Rush (2011)

Magic Life (2011)

The Book of Desires (2012)

Enigma Agency: The Case of Shadows (2015)

Twilight City: Love as a Cure (2015)

Mystery Castle: The Mirror's Secret (2015)

The mystery of Unicorn Castle: The Beastmaster (2017)

Witchcraft: Pandora’s Box (2018)

Magic Farm 3: Ice Danger (2019)

 

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask us by e-mail.

Also, we don't mind your suggestions and ideas!

Magic Farm Series Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/magic.farm.community/

 

 

 

The story of Magic Farm series starts in 2008. Many players loved Iris adventures, so we followed it with the release of Deluxe Edition with improved graphics, increased resolution, and new bonuses in 2009.

In the 2011 we shipped the sequel: “Magic Farm Ultimate Flower”.

In the same year took place release of the “Magic Farm 2 Fairy Lands” with new graphics and characters.

And so, in 2019, we will revive the series once again in its 3rd installment: Magic Farm 3. Ice Danger! We decided to make it happen because we felt that fans need this story to continue. Knowing how you love this series, we will try to give you the best experience you could possibly imagine!

 

Story

Snow and blizzard suddenly came to the Iris homeland. Her best friend dragon Robin and her old allies went on an expedition to find out what happened...

Along the way, Robin got in trouble and now Iris will have to save him and help everyone else she will meet on her way.

Save the world from the onslaught of cold by growing and selling magical flowers!

 

Locations

4 game locations and 4 farms with different landscapes are waiting for you: a swamp, a volcano, a flying island, and a frozen city. A fascinating world will leave you amazed!

Kikimora’s Hut

In her quest to save Robin, Iris stumbled upon the settlement of a swamp nation! What secrets does the healer's hut keep? By the way, this place surely needs a helping hand!

Volcano

Growing flowers on a volcano — isn't it tempting? There's nothing impossible for our Iris! However, in the vicinity of the volcano, there is also a settlement. And it’s very hostile towards those living in the swamp.

Flying Islands

The adventures will continue on the flying islands where Iris gets on the Flying Ship. Fairies of the islands also need your help! Flowers will save this world!

Snow City

Chilling cold is ready to devour the inhabitants of the snow-covered city. Help Iris to find the cause of global freezing and save the world from disaster!



Characters

Iris

The main character, a cheerful and resilient girl with a special gift to grow magical flowers.

 

 

 

Robin

Little naughty dragon, dear friend and Iris assistant. She loves to chat and eat, as well as help with all her sorceries.

 

 

Bobby the Engineer

A little boy, clumsy and humble. It’s his hobby to get into awkward situations, especially at a worse time. He has the talent of an engineer to fix almost everything. He loves to invent new devices and machines.

 

 

Kikimora.

The representative of the swamp people and a herbalist. She protects her kin from all kinds of misfortunes. Her main task is to ensure that all of her people are safe and sound.

 


 

Superintendent Dibbs

Owner of land on Volcano. The master of the furniture workshop. A dangerous and cruel fat cat, who will stop at nothing to get profit.

 

 

 

Traveler

An old friend of Iris — an adventurer.

 

And many other characters!

 

 

 

There are many ways to help our cause!

  • Spread the word about this campaign to friends and fellow gamers. A little noise goes a long way if shared by enough people.
  • Share the link to this site, the Steam page, and the game page.
story_txt:
Magic Farm 3: Ice Danger is an adventure at your own pace. Take care of your farms and customize them as you see fit. Explore the magic world, solve quests, meet people and trade for the rare goods.​
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1113060/Magi...

Our community: https://www.facebook.com/magic.farm.community/
The good old-fashioned farm is here again! The story started way back in in 2008... The first installment of Magic Farm series was warmly welcomed by the players:​
“The graphics and sound are amazing the gameplay is near perfect and your pet dragon is amazingly awesome!” - Jason Stanhouse, Amazon [Magic Farm 2 Ultimate Flower] (https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RJ8I...)
 “Magic Farm brings a rare combination of features to the casual game genre” - Joel Bridie, Gamezebo (Magic Farm) [https://www.gamezebo.com/2008/03/10/magic-farm-...]
“The graphics is great, the game play is addictive and you can buy so many decor things to keep you busy for weeks” - mikylangela, Big Fish (Magic Farm 2) [https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/6346/magic-f...]
We are pleased that we can return to this project once more and finally give our players a continuation of an exciting time management Magic Farm series.What is waiting for you:- Meet with familiar old characters and make more new friends- Favorite gameplay with a lot of improvements- 4 new amazing locations- More than 100 quests- Think strategic — choose how to achieve goals- Leveling up main characters makes the gameplay progressively interesting. You can choose who you are: a brawler who fights with enemies or a gardener who forces everything to bloom around with a wave of the hand- Additional quests and free gameplay in open locationsIris, the main character of the game, has an amazing ability to grow magical flowers! Who would have thought that this skill could be useful at the most crucial moment?You have to organize the management of your own farm, help plants grow faster, harvest them, and protect from pests that are trying to destroy your priceless flowers!Familiar gameplay with delightful new features.Grow and upgrade your own farm. Customize it to make it prettier. Grow flowers, collect magical ingredients and create magnificent bouquets! Replenish water supplies in a time and make sure that the basket with flowers for sale is not overfilled.Fight with pests and do not let them destroy your precious plants! Be careful! Pests now have their own abilities!Make your fists do the talking! Hard time call for extreme measures!Collect different types of flowers and sell them! Improve your plants and they will bring you more profits!Gaining experience and money will allow you to buy improvements. They can make your life much easier!Can you cope with growing magical flowers and successfully complete all the tasks? 4 locations with unique landscapes for you to build on!Enjoy challenging endless mode after completing the main storyline.Healers, fairies, leaders, merchants ... A whole string of characters to befriend! Immerse yourself in a fascinating unknown world! More than 100 quests await you, as well as side stories! You can choose your own way of doing things: fight the enemies with a brute force or use your hands not for violence, but for the creation of new life. You can get precious items for helping us:1. FULL Game Access (1 Steam Key instant delivery)2. Pre-Release Test Access (1 Steam Key)3. Name in credits - We apprecitate your interest  The release of the game is planned for PC and Mac.  Our studio Meridian’93 have more than 25 years of experience on the market!One of our most successful projects is the Magic Farm series, originated in 2008. We saw that the players miss it, so we decided to return to this game series after a long break!Our games:Admiral: Sea Battles (1996)Rooster’s Revenge 1.0 (1998)Rooster’s Revenge 1.5 Addon (1998)Rooster’s Revenge 2.0 (1998)Rooster’s Revenge 3.0 (1998)Pipi Prinz (1999)Puzzle (1999)HotRod (2000)BallerParty (2001)DuckHunt (2001)Die Rache der Sumpfhühner 2 (2001)BSE Bomber (2002)Battle of Election (2002)Carcasonne (2003)Carcassonne Addon (2003)Carcassonne 2 (2003)Alexander: The Heroes Hour (2004)El Grande (2004)MouseForce (2004)Muzzle (2005)Dreamworld's Open: Mini Golf (2006)Wolfhound (2006)Numericon (2006)Carcassonne: Koenig und Raubritter (2006)Key Words (2006)Dragon (2006)Baby Drive (2007)Destiny Architect (2007)Flowers Story (2007)Magic Farm (2008)Flowers Story: Fairy Quest (2008)Mystery of Unicorn Castle (2008)Hidden World of Art (2009)Hidden World of Art 2: Undercover Art Agent (2009)Antique Shop (2009)Magic Farm: Ultimate Flower (2009)Unexpected Journey (2010)Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands (2011)Summer Rush (2011)Magic Life (2011)The Book of Desires (2012)Enigma Agency: The Case of Shadows (2015)Twilight City: Love as a Cure (2015)Mystery Castle: The Mirror's Secret (2015)The mystery of Unicorn Castle: The Beastmaster (2017)Witchcraft: Pandora’s Box (2018)Magic Farm 3: Ice Danger (2019) If you have any questions, please feel free to ask us by e-mail.Also, we don't mind your suggestions and ideas!Magic Farm Series Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/magic.farm.community/   The story of Magic Farm series starts in 2008. Many players loved Iris adventures, so we followed it with the release of Deluxe Edition with improved graphics, increased resolution, and new bonuses in 2009.In the 2011 we shipped the sequel: “Magic Farm Ultimate Flower”.In the same year took place release of the “Magic Farm 2 Fairy Lands” with new graphics and characters.And so, in 2019, we will revive the series once again in its 3rd installment: Magic Farm 3. Ice Danger! We decided to make it happen because we felt that fans need this story to continue. Knowing how you love this series, we will try to give you the best experience you could possibly imagine! StorySnow and blizzard suddenly came to the Iris homeland. Her best friend dragon Robin and her old allies went on an expedition to find out what happened...Along the way, Robin got in trouble and now Iris will have to save him and help everyone else she will meet on her way.Save the world from the onslaught of cold by growing and selling magical flowers! Locations4 game locations and 4 farms with different landscapes are waiting for you: a swamp, a volcano, a flying island, and a frozen city. A fascinating world will leave you amazed!Kikimora’s HutIn her quest to save Robin, Iris stumbled upon the settlement of a swamp nation! What secrets does the healer's hut keep? By the way, this place surely needs a helping hand!VolcanoGrowing flowers on a volcano — isn't it tempting? There's nothing impossible for our Iris! However, in the vicinity of the volcano, there is also a settlement. And it’s very hostile towards those living in the swamp.Flying IslandsThe adventures will continue on the flying islands where Iris gets on the Flying Ship. story:
Medieval engineers found a new way to defend castles.They invented magnetic repulsion system which levitates certain objects, which can be placed around the castle for defense. Cruel kings and queens are using this technology to make their castles strong.Now,they are after you and your people to make you, their slaves.Your objective is to save your people,build new castle,build the web,defend your castle and attack others.

When the game starts you will be provided with few people and a small place where you can build your dream castle.you start as a small leader(male/female) and can rise up to an emperor.

Build water lane from nearest river to castle.

To upgrade your castle you will attack other castles , take their resources and make them slaves.Buy attractive things from store to attract more people to join your kingdom.

Start agriculture and use your people to collect wood, stone, food, gold and gems.Store them for future use.

Collect taxes, build defense towers, train your people and prepare them for combat.

This game includes all the obvious things like upgrading army units,weapons,buildings,walls,castle towers,day and night cycle,weather system,inventory system, repairing system,quests,treasure hunts,character customization,rewards,acheivements,stats.

Hunt  fish and sea creatures, feed and grow them into larger beasts which helps protect the castle.

 

For every upgrade you get experience points.increase points, increase your level of leadership.

After you reach certain level, you can start building outposts.

In this game, you can hunt animals/creatures/monsters for food/battle/transportation.

The following are the three examples of hunting types in this game.

1.Traditional Hunting

Use archers to hunt for food.

2.Avatar Hunting

This hunting type is similar(not exact) to that of avatar movie ikrane scene.

 

3.Mammoth Hunting

This hunting type is similar to that of 10000 b.c. movie mammoth scene.

 

Your units can mount these creatures/monsters/animals and can be used in battle.

My plan is to make the environment more interactive, so that you can implement your own hunting strategy.

Buy engineers to start building the web around the castle.

A web consists of several circles.Each circle is made of several blocks.You can place anything on the block from defense towers to creatures.

Increase the number of  circles in the web to add more defense things.

As the web levitates above the ground,during battle you can use rotator(a type of monster which is shown below) to rotate the circle so that others may not enter.

 

Upgrade the web to make it strong and rotate faster.upgrade your towers,army and beasts.

Engineers also build new defense towers and battle equipment,so make sure to upgrade them.

When the battle starts,the outermost circle of the web starts to rotate.

 

To enter the web one must kill rotators to stop the rotation of the circle.it takes some time for others to kill the rotators,in the mean time you attack others using catapults, archers, wizards, dragons etc

If the rotators are killed and the rotation stops,then the next outermost circle starts to rotate.

Others enter the web with their army, siege towers and other battle equipment.

 

The following are the few examples of the battle in this game.

 

The following is inspired from 300 movie.

 

Army units move through the web into the castle.

You need to kill the king/queen to gain victory.

After reaching certain level, you can attack larger castles and if you win you own that castle Web. 

Castles that are near to the rivers have higher value, so make sure to attack them.

This game includes battle formations.Just like combo attack which is mixture of several single attacks,you can create different formations of units and use that in battle.this takes the game to a new level.

Battles can also take place on battle grounds.game also has turn based strategy battle system used on battle grounds.

Jumpers are creatures with special abilities.they can jump from circle to circle on the web.they can even jump onto a rotating circle and attack rotators.if you upgrade jumpers,they will get the ability to carry other units from circle to circle.

Every unit in the castle web tries to protect the king/queen from enemies.some have less stamina and more combat skills and others have the opposite.

Protector is a creature/monster which has more stamina, skills, abilities than others.protector doesn't care about anything other than protecting you(leader/king/queen).

Hero's are similar to protectors.they have special skills and abilities just like protectors. 

Unlike protectors, they care about every other unit and you.

Boss is more powerful than protectors or hero's.you have to complete many tasks to own a boss.you can have several hero's or protectors but you can have only one boss for each castle web.boss doesn't care about anyone until and unless you are going to die.if you attack other castle webs, you need to kill the boss first and king/queen next to own that castle web.this takes the game to another new level.

Game will have Forest environment.so the models get redesigned based on the environment.

Local/Online.

Alliance.

Localization(most of the languages)

Rankings.

Messages.

Global Market.

Tournaments(gladiator type of games).

Two new environments(island and sky) will be added.

Island/Water environment will have aquatic characters like mermaids and aquatic creatures and monsters.

Island environment will be similar to this movie( how to train your dragon) island image.

Source

 

 

Sky environment means top of the mountain environment,touching the clouds.

Characters,creatures,monsters,animals and castle models are designed based on the environment.

 

My name is Nagarik Bitla. I'm an independent game developer, worked on android game development before.this is my first PC game.i'm a workaholic.i put a lot of effort into this.i hope you support me. 

Apart from working on making this campaign successful,my goal is to get people to travel with me on this journey.

If you have any more questions,you can contact me at castlewebgame@gmail.com.

At the moment, game is being developed on Windows Intel i3, 4 GB RAM.using unity game engine.

My target is to ensure that the game runs on the widest range of PC's as possible.

Game will be available on Windows,Mac,Linux and Steam.

If you can't pledge any amount,you can still support me by sharing this campaign with your friends.

Thank you for reading.....Have a nice day.

story:
SLOVENSKÝ PREKLAD

      There are many people behind the creation of the Drinking Viking party game. Let us present you the main team composed of four people, who are bringing the game to life. Game creators Tibor Kiss, Peter Suchár, Martin Šenkár and illustrator Juraj Kopačka a.k.a. Crioarts. We are young, ambitious guys from Slovakia, who love all kinds of games. Friends who like to bring new ideas, fun and excitement and bring together people just to have fun. We have been playing Drinking Viking for years and every time we play it we make it better. The idea of making it a game for everyone came to us this year. Peter enters the room and says: “This game is so much fun, let’s make it for everyone!” “Oh yes!” we said. Since then we’ve been working on the game every day.

          Each of us is playing a role in the making of the game. Now is time for YOU to become a founder of Drinking Viking.

          The Drinking Viking is a party card game consisting of more than 15 mini games. 'Mini game' is a short, funny and interactive game with special rules. Each mini game is represented by a unique and fully illustrated card. Drinking Viking is a game for more than 3 players. There is no limitation on number of players, but optimum is 6-10 players. 

      The gameplay is composed of several mini games, that change every time a player draws a new card. Players draw cards one by one to know what kind of game they are going to play and what challenge lies ahead. Some mini games are based on words, memory or creativity, others on luck, quick reactions and some could be even trickier because they are in action all the time.

          Players try to win in mini games to escape punishment. Each mini game has unique rules that determine winners and losers. Winners stay cool and losers pay for their weakness! Drinking Viking suggests these ways of punishment: 

As Drinking Viking is a party game, losers can consume a beverage. Or you can play the game for black points. Every looser gets one point and at the end of the game, the player with minimum black points wins. There is an option to make the game a little bit nasty. You can play Stripping Viking, where a loser takes off one piece of clothing. Or you can also put yourself in motion and play Drinking Viking as a sport game. Every looser has to perform either pushups or squats. Use your imagination and create your own way of punishment. Play your original version of  Drinking Viking with your friends.

          Every mini game is 101% tested. They are made to bring the right atmosphere to your party. Let us take a moment to introduce a few of them?

The Hunt: Three dice are distributed between the players to make even gaps between players with die. NOW!! Roll the die over and over till you roll 6 and then pass the die to the next player. Quickly! Do not let other dice chase you down.

Crazy King: “From now, till the end of the game no one should use a real name of another person. My castle, my rules!!!”  You, as the king, determine a unique rule for every other player to follow. Anyone caught breaking the rule, or even attempts to break it is punished.

Odin: This is a game for bluffing. A good one! Long story short… First player throws the dice, so that no other player can see it. He tells the value to the next player, however he can lie. The next player believes or disputes the value and tries to throw a bigger value than the previous player. Bad liar or suspicious fool is punished. How tricky!

Liar, liar!: Mmmm. There is something about you. You are hiding something. So tell us three things about yourself of which one will not be true. Those who will know the lie will stay cool.

The Viking: This is the general and central character of the game. Be the one Viking leading the warship and dictating the tempo of the game, remaining steady like the beating of a war drum. Use trickery and give signs to other crew members to start paddling during the game without being noticed and let’s see who will be the last paddler to join the others. Seems, someone has ran afoul…

      There are other great games like Loki, 257, The Coin, Thor's hammer, Uroboros, Egg-chicken-dragon-viking and more. Some of them are already illustrated so check out our Gallery. 

          Become one of  the creators and write to us your idea of a mini game you would like to see in Drinking Viking party game. The best of your ideas may be used in the game.

 Write to us: vikingthegame@gmail.com

    The game contains:

•  64 fully illustrated cards

•  Rules written on scroll-like paper

•  3 wooden dice

•  Illustrated Game box

          The cards will be printed with high quality offset printer.

          Rules are originally designed to resemble a scroll with wooden sticks and leather straps. You have a real feeling of an old scroll, when you are holding it in your hands. 

          Dice are made of real wood! One of them is painted black. Why you ask? We like it this way and we bet that you will like the dice too :)

          There is nothing else you will need to play Drinking Viking, only you and your friends, a Viking heart and gaming spirit. It is that simple. The game can be played virtually anywhere. There are no boards, no figures and no long setup. YOU are the figures and YOU are the board!

          You can add more content to the game included in our hot perks. It  makes your gameplay even more interesting. Viking Krige or Viking armor (T-shirts) are very good candidates.

          All levels of perks with the exception of VIKING HEART perk and PARTY WITH US! perk require shipping. Thanks to 'Viking Post', we can ship your rewards to your home for special prizes. Please add required amount of money for shipping to your contribution according to this table:

          We will ship all games and additional content to the given address after the campaign is successful. Printing and making of additional content will take some time, so expect the delivery by August 2014.

          We have a great game, which we love to play so we figured why not share it with other people? We have a lot of fun every time we play Drinking Viking, so it is a pleasure to make the game available worldwide. But we need your help. We need money for start-up costs, also to cover initial printing costs and to pay for the illustrations. Indiegogo is a great way to get the needed support and spread the word to the right people. 

          These are our hot perks. Choose the one which suits you the most and support the creation of the game. If you want more than one game please add 15€ to your contribution for each additional game.


      If we exceed our funding goal, we will make the game even better. There are always things to be improved, it is all about your support. Check out our stretch goals:

          One of additional games could be your own! Become one of  the creators and write to us your idea of a mini game you would like to see in Drinking Viking party game.

Write to us: vikingthegame@gmail.com
