      The gameplay is composed of several mini games, that change every time a player draws a new card. Players draw cards one by one to know what kind of game they are going to play and what challenge lies ahead. Some mini games are based on words, memory or creativity, others on luck, quick reactions and some could be even trickier because they are in action all the time.          Players try to win in mini games to escape punishment. Each mini game has unique rules that determine winners and losers. Winners stay cool and losers pay for their weakness! Drinking Viking suggests these ways of punishment: As Drinking Viking is a party game, losers can consume a beverage. Or you can play the game for black points. Every looser gets one point and at the end of the game, the player with minimum black points wins. There is an option to make the game a little bit nasty. You can play Stripping Viking, where a loser takes off one piece of clothing. Or you can also put yourself in motion and play Drinking Viking as a sport game. Every looser has to perform either pushups or squats. Use your imagination and create your own way of punishment. Play your original version of  Drinking Viking with your friends.          Every mini game is 101% tested. They are made to bring the right atmosphere to your party. Let us take a moment to introduce a few of them?The Hunt: Three dice are distributed between the players to make even gaps between players with die. NOW!! Roll the die over and over till you roll 6 and then pass the die to the next player. Quickly! Do not let other dice chase you down.Crazy King: “From now, till the end of the game no one should use a real name of another person. My castle, my rules!!!”  You, as the king, determine a unique rule for every other player to follow. Anyone caught breaking the rule, or even attempts to break it is punished.Odin: This is a game for bluffing. A good one! Long story short… First player throws the dice, so that no other player can see it. He tells the value to the next player, however he can lie. The next player believes or disputes the value and tries to throw a bigger value than the previous player. Bad liar or suspicious fool is punished. How tricky!Liar, liar!: Mmmm. There is something about you. You are hiding something. So tell us three things about yourself of which one will not be true. Those who will know the lie will stay cool.The Viking: This is the general and central character of the game. Be the one Viking leading the warship and dictating the tempo of the game, remaining steady like the beating of a war drum. Use trickery and give signs to other crew members to start paddling during the game without being noticed and let’s see who will be the last paddler to join the others. Seems, someone has ran afoul…
      There are other great games like Loki, 257, The Coin, Thor's hammer, Uroboros,
Egg-chicken-dragon-viking and more. Some of them are already illustrated so check out our Gallery. 
          Become one of  the
creators and write to us your idea of a mini game you would like to see in
Drinking Viking party game. The best of your ideas may be used in the game. Write to us: vikingthegame@gmail.com

    The game contains:
• 
64 fully illustrated cards
• 
Rules written on scroll-like paper
• 
3 wooden dice•  Illustrated Game box
          The cards will be printed with high quality offset
printer.          Rules are originally designed to resemble a scroll with wooden sticks and leather straps. You have a real feeling of an old scroll, when you are holding it in your hands.           Dice are made of real wood! One of them is painted black. Why you ask? We like it this way and we bet that you will like the dice too :)

          There is nothing else you will need to play Drinking Viking, only you and your friends, a Viking heart and gaming spirit. It is that simple. The game can be played virtually anywhere. There are no boards, no figures and no long setup. YOU are the figures and YOU are the board!          You can add more content to the game included in our hot perks. It  makes your gameplay even more interesting. Viking Krige or Viking armor (T-shirts) are very good candidates.






          All levels of perks with the exception of VIKING
HEART perk and PARTY WITH US! perk require shipping. Thanks to 'Viking Post', we can ship your rewards to your home for special prizes. Please
add required amount of money for shipping to your contribution according to
this table:


          We will ship all games and additional
content to the given address after the campaign is successful. Printing and
making of additional content will take some time, so expect the delivery by August
2014.

          We
have a great game, which we love to play so we figured why not share it with
other people? We have a lot of fun every time we play Drinking Viking, so it is
a pleasure to make the game available worldwide. But we need your help. We need
money for start-up costs, also to cover initial printing costs and to pay for
the illustrations. Indiegogo is a great way to get the needed support and
spread the word to the right people. 

          These are our hot perks. Choose the
one which suits you the most and support the creation of the game. If you want
more than one game please add 15€ to your contribution for each
additional game.

      If we exceed
our funding goal, we will make the game even better. There are always things
to be improved, it is all about your support. Check out our stretch goals:          One of additional games could be your own! Become one of  the creators and write to us your idea of a mini game you would like to see in Drinking Viking party game.Write to us: vikingthegame@gmail.com

story:
Boowie & Louie is a co-op 3D platformer game being developed by LudiSoft Studio. Inspired by games such as Toejam & Earl and Mario. The game features single player, multiplayer, 6 different worlds, magic boxes, 50+ leves to explore, and a lot more.


Bowie & Louie are two clumsy brothers living with their grandpa in a peaceful village. Once in a calm day, a cute mysterious creature mysteriously appears turning their lives upside down, making some rare items magically disappear from their grandpa's antiques store and suddenly "swallowing" the brothers. At this point the adventure begins, unexpected and akward enemies, amazing levels and a lot of tomatoes on the way. How they got there? Where the mysterious creature came from? To find these answers, they need to go deep in this adventure. In their favor (or not!) they have these mysterious magic boxes that may contain useful power ups, items or even some unlucky surprises.


Inspired on the classic Toejam & Earl and Mario games, Boowie & Louie is a funny 3D co-op platformer game with a comical context making it perfect to enjoy playing with someone else, no matter if with family or friends, and no matter how old you are.


  • 6 Different worlds (Subject to increase): The game will feature 6 (or more) different worlds with its own main "theme".


  • More than 50 levels to explore (Subject to increase): There will be at least 8 levels per world.


  • Secret levels, paths and items: Be aware or you will certainly miss something secret on the way. Some of them easy to find, but some of them very hard.


  • Double the fun: Is there something better than a couch co-op?


  • Mutiplayer freedom: Co-op is cool, but sometimes it gets very frustrating if you want to go to one place and your partner to another but you need to stick together because of the camera. Go wherever you want!


  • Jump: Well, it's a platformer right?


  • Power-ups: Our heroes will need something to help them on their adventure. Nothing better than power-ups, they are very useful and you may need them to reach secret areas.



  • Challenges and Puzzles: Expect to face challenges or puzzles which may allow you to access secret places, hidden items or just to continue your adventure.



  • Magic Boxes: Oh yeah! Big surprises are waiting for you inside these boxes, better you be lucky.


  • Tomatoes: Tomatoes everywhere, for good or for bad!


  • Golden Eggs: You will need to find them in order to continue you progress in the game.
  • Money: You can buy magic boxes, tomatoes and other stuffs with these little golden pieces.
  • Bosses: These guys are tough, better prepare yourself before facing them and try to find out their weaknesses quickly.
  • And a lot more!


We need to raise around $40,000 to speed up the process of development of the game, but now we are asking for at least $30,000 to continue and changed the campaign to fixed funding. This is the first game of our studio, however, as you can see in the video (the game prototype), we are working really hard in order to deliver a great and enjoyable game. If we achieve our initial goal, you can rest and wait us to deliver a impressive game experience, but stretching these goals a bit more will make the game even better.The additional money we raise will be used to enhance the game in every aspect, from graphics to aditional gameplay hours. The following image shows our stretch goals for Boowie & Louie:


As a new studio, Ludisoft have to invest in basic structure. Also, our team is composed by only two members for now. We are working hard to deliver the game as soon as possible and we are aiming to release it in 2015, however, some delays may occur due to the fact that we want to release the game polished and bug-free. Therefore, if necessary the deliver will be postponed in order to hand you a high quality game.

We're running a flexible Indiegogo campaign which means that even if we don't reach our initial goal we will keep the development of our game. In case that we don't reach our goal, we will try our best to release the game still in 2015, but you can probably expect a certain delay because we have no income to keep us dedicated just to the game itself.

The game may cost us more than expected, our initial goal was calculated to cover the basic costs of the game devolopment keeping in mind a high quality standard to the final version to the game, we asked what we think that is fair, but costs may be higher than expected.

For any information about the progress of the game, we will keep you updated in our social media and site.



We started to develop Boowie & Louie a few months ago and until now we have invested time, money, knowledge, creativity and passion, which are essential to develop a great game. To sculpt the game the way we want we need more of everything we said before plus some more heads to help us even more, but the problem is that we do note have sufficient budget. LudiSoft, as a fresh studio, needs investments on computational tools and new members to ensure a quicker and better development for the greatness of Boowie & Louie. We are proud of our work and with your help we can make an amazing 3D platformer game that will be the first of many.

And do not worry, If you cannot pledge or contribute, you can still help us just by sharing with everyone about our game and our Indiegogo campaign in any social network that you can.

Thank you!



Please, help us and share about Boowie & Louie!

story:
“Infernis” is a board game without dice, based in risk control and strategy.

The basic box of INFERNIS, which is available as reward for only 20€! (see Infernal Items section below), includes:

- 1 laminated board.

- 48 tokens on laminated cardboard, double sided.

- 12 peasants, cardboard, with their plastic bases.

- 12 cards.

- Rulebook, with 20 pages.

- Game box.

All components are printed in full color.

“Infernis” is a project developed by:

Fernando Lafuente. Game designer and author of different board games, like Essentia, Racing Dwarfs and Alerya.

Vedra Games. A game publisher and organizer of gaming events. Creators of the wargame Colonial Space Wars.

Saco de Huesos ediciones. Publisher with over 4 years of experience in book edition, as well as publisher of games linked to the world of literature (The  Labyrinth Collection).

These partners are united to develop the present campaign, which has the objective of editing “Infernis”, a board game without dice that combines risk control, anticipation and strategy. With a duration of 30-60 min, in “Infernis” 2 to 4 players take the role of as many witches challenging each other in a cruel game of magic and cunning. Only the witch that manages to keep her unlucky peasants alive will win, preventing them from falling in the eternal flames that surround the cursed island of Infernis.

To learn more about “Infernis”, visit this blog:

http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/2014/03/infernis-introduccion-las-reglas-para.html


“Infernis” has been presented previously as a prototype in national and international conventions, and enjoyed by gamers in different countries (Spain, France and Germany). Because of the interest generated and by popular demand, it has been decided to start a crowdfunding campaign with the objective of bringing this game to the community. Thanks to the contribution of potential backers during this campaign, we want to achieve the funding to publish a first edition of 1000 copies, which would give many game lovers worldwide access to this interesting and fun board game.

This project is not only important because it will bring “Infernis to the community of players and provide them with hours of fun, but also because it offers new and unique rewards that will only be available during the campaign.

The three parts involved in this project have edited products in their respective fields with success in the past. For this reason, their capacity to professionally and efficiently manage a project like this is guaranteed. This campaign will as well expand their reach to potential clients and reinforce the trust of their current customers.

The funding received will pay the board game production costs: brute (printing, components and handling), intangibles (author rights, payments to illustrator and editor) and shipping. We will require 4500€ for the production of 1000 copies of “Infernis”, the board game, and an additional 500€ budget in terms of commissions for the companies that manage the bank account transactions.

The backers will have a list of exclusive rewards to choose during the campaign, which will be presented in the form of Infernal Items.

In addition to these rewards, there are bonuses available to improve the quality of the edition and the number of components, which could be applied if the total funding reached over the minimum required for starting the production of the project. For example, if the funding reached values between 6000€-10000€, it would unlock a bonus for the production of alternative boards, additional cards, components to use in new scenery… The first stretch goal will be announced during the campaign.

The whole funding of the project must be provided by the backers, and no charges would be applied in case the minimum required was not reached.

The Infernal Items are exclusive rewards you can select, up to a limit stablished by the Infernal Level you choose (See Infernal Levels).

1.Infernal Donation (5€). Includes the name of the backer in the list of “Acknowledgments” given in the rulebook.

2. “Infernal circles” anthology in digital format (5€). Commemorative Anthology of different authors from Saco de Huesos, in which the infernal underworlds are explored. (available formats: PDF, ePub and mobi without DRM)

3. Commemorative infernal dice (5€). Includes 2 black dice, with the one-side printed with the symbol of “Infernis” in red.

4. Pack of commemorative infernal dice (10€). Includes 5 black dice, with the one-side printed with the symbol of “Infernis” in red.

5. Essentia digital (5€). Downloadable digital version of the board game Essentia, by Fernando Lafuente, with option to online gaming.

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_ES.pdf

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_EN.pdf


6. “Infernis” pendant (10€). Pendant with the “Infernis” symbol in silver.


7. “Infernal circles” anthology, book (15€). Commemorative Anthology of different authors from Saco de Huesos, in which the infernal underworlds are explored. (Book, A5 format, 200 pages)

8. INFERNIS, the game (20€). Includes a copy of the game “Infernis”.

9. Witches sheets. (20€). Four color laminated sheets with the illustrations of the 4 witches, signed by Africa Mir. Limited edition. 

10. INFERNIS deluxe, the game (40€). Includes an exclusive copy of the game “Infernis” with serial number, the 4 witches sheets and signatures from the Authors. Only available for backers of the Ninth Circle (Treachery).

11. Pack Vedra Games (35€). Includes one copy of the games “Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons” and INFERNIS, with a reduced price.

12. Shipping to Europe (15€). This allows the shipping of your Infernal Items to any country in the European Union.

13. Shipping Worldwide (30€). This allows the shipping your Infernal Items to any country outside the European Union.

The “Infernis” campaign will last 40 days. During this period, backers are invited to join by  pledging with different Infernal Levels (see section below). Each level will require the compromise of investing a certain amount of money; the higher is this level, the greater amount of additional Infernal Items (rewards) to choose from.

The Infernal Levels available are the following:

· Vestibule of Hell - 5€. (Includes an Infernal Donation).

· First Circle (Limbo) - 20€. (Access to 20€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Second Circle (Lust) - 30€. (Access to 35€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Third Circle (Gluttony) - 40€. (Access to 50€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Fourth Circle (Greed) - 50€. (Access to 65€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Fifth Circle (Wrath) - 60€. (Access to 80€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Sixth Circle (Heresy) - 70€. (Access to 95€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Seventh Circle (Violence) - 80€. (Access to 110€ of Infernal Items , with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Eight Circle (Corruption) - 90€. (Access to 125€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Ninth Circle (Treachery) - 100€. (Access to 140€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Acheron (Only stores). 120€. (Includes 10 copies of “Infernis”, the game, with shipping costs included to Spain).

· Styx (Only for distribution companies). 500€. (Includes 50 copies of “Infernis”, the game, with shipping costs included to Spain).

We would be grateful if those who cannot support us with funds could help by spreading the word to the community of players. If you want to know more about “Infernis” or you need to contact us, the following links are available at your disposal:

https://www.facebook.com/fernando.lafuenteclavero

http://fernandolafuente.blogspot.com.es/

Website: http://www.vedragames.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Vedra-Games/287049964711127

Twitter: https://twitter.com/VedraGames

Blog: http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/

http://sacodehuesos.com/

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Saco-de-Huesos/260990633978064

https://www.facebook.com/sacodehuesos1?fref=ts

Website:http://africamir.wordpress.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/africamirart?ref=hl



“Infernis”es un juego de tablero sin dados basado en el control de riesgo, anticipación y estrategia.

La caja de INFERNIS, la cual está disponible como recompensa por solamente 20€
(ver sección de Material Infernal), incluye:

-1 tablero contracolado laminado mate a una cara.

-48 fichas impresas a dos caras, contracoladas en cartón laminadas en mate.

-12 peones de cartón sobre base de plástico.

-12 cartas.

-Manual de juego de 20 páginas .

-Caja impresa a color.

Todos los componentes están impresos a color.

“Infernis”es un proyecto ideado por:

Fernando Lafuente. Diseñador del juego y autor de varios juegos de mesa ya publicados, como Essentia, Racing Dwarfs y Alerya.

Vedra Games. Una editorial de juegos y organizadora de eventos lúdicos, creadores del wargame Colonial Space Wars.

Saco de huesos ediciones. Editorial con experiencia en proyectos literarios (lleva más de cuatro años funcionando como empresa) y maquetación, así como en juegos relacionados con el mundo de la literatura (Línea Laberinto).

Estas tres partes se unieron para desarrollar esta campaña, la cual tiene como objetivo la edición de “Infernis”, un juego de tablero sin dados que aúna control de riesgo, anticipación y estrategia. Con una duración aproximada de entre 30-60 minutos, en “Infernis” de 2 a 4 jugadores encarnan a varias brujas enzarzadas con sus rivales en un juego cruel de habilidad, magia y astucia. Vencerá quien sea capaz de mantener a sus infelices campesinos más tiempo sobre la isla maldita, evitando que éstos perezcan en las llamas eternas que la rodean.

Para saber más sobre cómo se juega a “Infernis” puedes visitar el siguiente blog:

http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/2014/03/infernis-introduccion-las-reglas-para.html

“Infernis” ya ha sido previamente presentado como prototipo en convenciones nacionales e internacionales, por lo que ha sido disfrutado por jugadores de distintos países (España, Francia y Alemania). Debido al interés que ha despertado y por demanda popular, se ha decidido acudir a esta plataforma de crowdfunding con el objetivo de llevar el juego al mercado. Gracias a la contribución de los potenciales colaboradores de esta campaña se pretende lograr la financiación de una primera edición de 1000 unidades,  con la que se espera poner al alcance de los amantes de los juegos de mesa de todo el mundo este interesante y divertido juego.

Este proyecto no sólo será importante por hacer llegar “Infernis” a la comunidad de jugadores y garantizarles muchas horas de diversión, sino porque ofrecerá recompensas originales e irrepetibles que sólo podrán adquirirse durante la campaña.

Las tres partes involucradas en este proyecto han editado productos para el mercado en sus respectivas áreas con éxito. Por este motivo su capacidad para gestionar profesionalmente un proyecto de este tipo está garantizada, y la campaña será importante para reforzar todavía más la confianza del público hacia ellos. 


El dinero recaudado servirá para sufragar los gastos de producción del juego: físicos (imprenta, compra de componentes, empaquetado), intangibles (derechos de autor del diseñador, derechos de autor de la ilustradora, remuneración de los editores) y logísticos (envíos). Calculamos que para 1000 unidades producidas de “Infernis”  necesitaremos 4500€, a lo que se suma 500€ en concepto de comisiones para la plataforma y las empresas que gestionan las transacciones económicas.

Los colaboradores tendrán a su disposición una serie de recompensas exclusivas durante la campaña, las cuales se plantean en forma de Material Infernal:

Además de las recompensas está programado ofertar bonos para mejorar calidad de la edición y el número de componentes, los cuales podrían aplicarse a los mecenas si la financiación supera la cantidad mínima para realizar el proyecto. Por ejemplo, alcanzar cifras entre 6000€-10000€ permitiría “desbloquear” la producción de nuevos tableros, tarjetas adicionales, cartas para representar nuevos modos de juego, etc… El primer objetivo desbloqueable será anunciado durante la campaña.

La financiación del proyecto deberá ser aportada íntegramente por la contribución de los patrones. En caso de no alcanzar el mínimo necesario no se hará ningún cargo a los colaboradores.

El Material Infernal son recompensas exclusivas que pueden seleccionarse hasta alcanzar el máximo establecido por el Nivel Infernal que hayamos escogido (Ver Niveles Infernales).

1.  Donación Infernal (5€). Se incluirá el nombre del colaborador en la lista de agradecimientos del juego.

2.  Antología “Círculos infernales” en formato digital (5€). Antología conmemorativa de varios autores del catálogo Saco de Huesos en la que se explora el submundo infernal. Formatos pdf, ePub y mobi sin DRM.

3.  Dados infernales conmemorativos (5€). Incluye 2 dados negros, con la cara del uno personalizada con el logo de Infernis en rojo.

4.  Pack de dados infernales conmemorativos (10€). Incluye 5 dados negros, con la cara del uno personalizada con el logo de Infernis en rojo.

5.  Essentia digital (5€). Versión digital del juego de mesa Essentia con opción para partidas online, de Fernando Lafuente, para descarga directa.

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_ES.pdf

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_EN.pdf

6.  Colgante infernal conmemorativo (10€). Colgantes con el motivo del logotipo de Infernis en plata de ley.

7.  Antología “Círculos infernales” en rústica (15€). Antología conmemorativa de varios autores del catálogo Saco de huesos en la que se explora el submundo infernal. Formato A5, rústica, 200 páginas.

8.  INFERNIS, el juego de mesa (20€). Ejemplar de Infernis, el juego de mesa.

9.  Láminas de bruja (20€). Cuatro láminas a todo color de las cuatro brujas ilustradas y firmadas por África Mir. Edicion limitada.

10.  INFERNIS deluxe, el juego de mesa (40€). Copia numerada de Infernis, el juego de mesa, con un número de serie único, las 4 láminas de bruja y las firmas de los autores. Sólo disponible para colaboradores con el Noveno Círculo (Traición).

11.  Pack Juegos Vedra Games (35€). Pack que incluye INFERNIS y Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons, dos juegos de la compañía Vedra Games, a precio reducido.

12.  Envío a Europa (15€). Necesario para sufragar los gastos de envío a cualquier país de la Unión Europea.

13.  Envío al resto del mundo (30€). Necesario para sufragar los gastos de envío a cualquier país fuera de la Unión Europea.

La campaña de “Infernis” durará 40 días, período durante el cual los colaboradores podrán apuntarse a ella participando con diferentes Niveles Infernales (ver apartado inferior). Cada nivel requerirá el compromiso de invertir una cierta cantidad de €; cuanto mayor sea dicho nivel, a un mayor número de Material Infernal (recompensas) adicional podrá accederse.

Los Niveles Infernales son los siguientes:

· Vestíbulo del Infierno. 5€ (Incluye una Donación Infernal)

· Primer Círculo (Limbo).  20€ (Acceso a 20€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Segundo Círculo (Lujuria).  30€ (Acceso a 35€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Tercer Círculo (Gula).  40€ (Acceso a 50€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Cuarto Círculo (Avaricia).  50€ (Acceso a 65€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Quinto Círculo (Ira y Pereza).  60€ (Acceso a 80€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Sexto Círculo (Herejía).  70€ (Acceso a 95€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Séptimo Círculo (Violencia).  80€ (Acceso a 110€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Octavo Círculo (Corrupción).  90€ (Acceso a 125€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Noveno Círculo (Traición).  100€ (Acceso a 140€ de Material Infernal y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Aqueronte (Solo tiendas).  120€ (Incluye 10 copias de del juego de tablero “Infernis” y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

· Estigia (Solo distribuidoras).  500€ (Incluye 50 copias de del juego de tablero “Infernis” y gastos de envío incluidos a España)

Los prototipos del juego, las ilustraciones, los manuales, etc. están ya terminados. Solo tendríamos que pasar a fase de fabricación. En caso de finalizar con éxito la campaña, la fabricación y ensamblaje de los componentes de los juegos se estima en 6-8 semanas. 

Una vez iniciada esta etapa final (fase de fabricación) de la campaña se abrirá un plazo de 30 días para que los colaboradores puedan solicitar sus pedidos a contact@vedragames.com . En este correo deberán indicar qué Material Infernal de entre la lista de recompensas desean recibir de acuerdo a la contribución que hayan aportado (Ver Niveles Infernales). Para los envíos a los mecenas se estima que serán necesarias unas 2 semanas adicionales desde la fecha en que se finalice la fabricación, aunque por lo general los envíos tardan menos de una semana.

Finalmente, es importante recordar que esta campaña no cargará ninguna a cantidad a los colaboradores en caso de no llegar al mínimo necesario para llevarla a cabo.

Los coordinadores de esta campaña estaremos encantados de recibir cualquier sugerencia y/o aportación que pueda hacer todo aquel colaborador interesado por “Infernis”, y nos encantaría que incluso aquellos que no puedan sostener económicamente el proyecto puedan ayudarnos difundiendo esta iniciativa ante la comunidad. Para contactar con nosotros o saber más sobre “Infernis”, tenéis disponibles los siguientes links:


https://www.facebook.com/fernando.lafuenteclavero

http://fernandolafuente.blogspot.com.es/

story_txt:
“Infernis” is a board game without dice, based in risk control and strategy.The basic box of INFERNIS, which is available as
reward for only 20€! (see Infernal Items section below), includes:- 1 laminated board.- 48 tokens on laminated cardboard, double sided.- 12 peasants, cardboard, with their plastic bases.- 12 cards.- Rulebook, with 20 pages.- Game box.All components are printed in full color.“Infernis” is a project developed by:Fernando Lafuente. Game designer and author of different board games, like Essentia, Racing Dwarfs and Alerya.Vedra Games. A game publisher and organizer of gaming events. Creators of the wargame Colonial Space Wars.Saco de Huesos ediciones. Publisher with over 4 years of experience in book edition, as well as publisher of games linked to the world of literature (The  Labyrinth Collection).These partners are united to develop the present campaign, which has the objective of editing “Infernis”, a board game without dice that combines risk control, anticipation and strategy. With a duration of 30-60 min, in “Infernis” 2 to 4 players take the role of as many witches challenging each other in a cruel game of magic and cunning. Only the witch that manages to keep her unlucky peasants alive will win, preventing them from falling in the eternal flames that surround the cursed island of Infernis.To learn more about “Infernis”, visit this blog:http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/2014/03/infernis-introduccion-las-reglas-para.html“Infernis” has been presented previously as a prototype in national and international conventions, and enjoyed by gamers in different countries (Spain, France and Germany). Because of the interest generated and by popular demand, it has been decided to start a crowdfunding campaign with the objective of bringing this game to the community. Thanks to the contribution of potential backers during this campaign, we want to achieve the funding to publish a first edition of 1000 copies, which would give many game lovers worldwide access to this interesting and fun board game.This project is not only important because it will bring “Infernis to the community of players and provide them with hours of fun, but also because it offers new and unique rewards that will only be available during the campaign.The three parts involved in this project have edited products in their respective fields with success in the past. For this reason, their capacity to professionally and efficiently manage a project like this is guaranteed. This campaign will as well expand their reach to potential clients and reinforce the trust of their current customers.The funding received will pay the board game production costs: brute (printing, components and handling), intangibles (author rights, payments to illustrator and editor) and shipping. We will require 4500€ for the production of 1000 copies of “Infernis”, the board game, and an additional 500€ budget in terms of commissions for the companies that manage the bank account transactions.The backers will have a list of exclusive rewards to choose during the campaign, which will be presented in the form of Infernal Items.In addition to these rewards, there are bonuses available to improve the quality of the edition and the number of components, which could be applied if the total funding reached over the minimum required for starting the production of the project. For example, if the funding reached values between 6000€-10000€, it would unlock a bonus for the production of alternative boards, additional cards, components to use in new scenery… The first stretch goal will be announced during the campaign.The whole funding of the project must be provided by the backers, and no charges would be applied in case the minimum required was not reached.The Infernal Items are exclusive rewards you can select, up to a limit stablished by the Infernal Level you choose (See Infernal Levels).1.Infernal Donation (5€). Includes the name of the backer in the list of “Acknowledgments” given in the rulebook.2. “Infernal circles” anthology in digital format (5€). Commemorative Anthology of different authors from Saco de Huesos, in which the infernal underworlds are explored. (available formats: PDF, ePub and mobi without DRM)3. Commemorative infernal dice (5€). Includes 2 black dice, with the one-side printed with the symbol of “Infernis” in red.4. Pack of commemorative infernal dice (10€). Includes 5 black dice, with the one-side printed with the symbol of “Infernis” in red.5. Essentia digital (5€). Downloadable digital version of the board game Essentia, by Fernando Lafuente, with option to online gaming.http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_ES.pdfhttp://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/ESSENTIA_EN.pdf6. “Infernis” pendant (10€). Pendant with the “Infernis” symbol in silver.7. “Infernal circles” anthology, book (15€). Commemorative Anthology of different authors from Saco de Huesos, in which the infernal underworlds are explored. (Book, A5 format, 200 pages)8. INFERNIS, the game (20€). Includes a copy of the game “Infernis”.9. Witches sheets. (20€). Four color laminated sheets with the illustrations of the 4 witches, signed by Africa Mir. Limited edition. 10. INFERNIS deluxe, the game (40€). Includes an exclusive copy of the game “Infernis” with serial number, the 4 witches sheets and signatures from the Authors. Only available for backers of the Ninth Circle (Treachery).11. Pack Vedra Games (35€). Includes one copy of the games “Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons” and INFERNIS, with a reduced price.12. Shipping to Europe (15€). This allows the shipping of your Infernal Items to any country in the European Union.13. Shipping Worldwide (30€). This allows the shipping your Infernal Items to any country outside the European Union.The “Infernis” campaign will last 40 days. During this period, backers are invited to join by  pledging with different Infernal Levels (see section below). Each level will require the compromise of
investing a certain amount of money; the higher is this level, the greater
amount of additional Infernal Items (rewards) to choose from.The Infernal Levels available are the following:· Vestibule of Hell - 5€. (Includes an Infernal Donation).· First Circle (Limbo) - 20€. (Access to 20€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Second Circle (Lust) - 30€. (Access to 35€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Third Circle (Gluttony) - 40€. (Access to 50€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Fourth Circle (Greed) - 50€. (Access to 65€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Fifth Circle (Wrath) - 60€. (Access to 80€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Sixth Circle (Heresy) - 70€. (Access to 95€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Seventh Circle (Violence) - 80€. (Access to 110€ of Infernal Items , with shipping costs included to Spain).· Eight Circle (Corruption) - 90€. (Access to 125€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Ninth Circle (Treachery) - 100€. (Access to 140€ of Infernal Items, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Acheron (Only stores). 120€. (Includes 10 copies of “Infernis”, the game, with shipping costs included to Spain).· Styx (Only for distribution companies). 500€. (Includes 50 copies of “Infernis”, the game, with shipping costs included to Spain).We would be grateful if those who cannot support us with funds could help by spreading the word to the community of players. If you want to know more about “Infernis” or you need to contact us, the following links are available at your disposal:https://www.facebook.com/fernando.lafuenteclaverohttp://fernandolafuente.blogspot.com.es/Website: http://www.vedragames.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Vedra-Games/287049964711127Twitter: https://twitter.com/VedraGamesBlog: http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/http://sacodehuesos.com/https://www.facebook.com/pages/Saco-de-Huesos/260990633978064https://www.facebook.com/sacodehuesos1?fref=tsWebsite:http://africamir.wordpress.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/africamirart?ref=hl“Infernis”es un juego de tablero sin dados basado en el control de riesgo, anticipación y estrategia.La caja de INFERNIS, la cual está disponible como recompensa por solamente 20€ (ver sección de Material Infernal), incluye:-1 tablero contracolado laminado mate a una cara.-48 fichas impresas a dos caras, contracoladas en cartón laminadas en mate.-12 peones de cartón sobre base de plástico.-12 cartas.-Manual de juego de 20 páginas .-Caja impresa a color.Todos los componentes están impresos a color.“Infernis”es un proyecto ideado por:Fernando Lafuente. Diseñador del juego y autor de varios juegos de mesa ya publicados, como Essentia, Racing Dwarfs y Alerya.Vedra Games. Una editorial de juegos y organizadora de eventos lúdicos, creadores del wargame Colonial Space Wars.Saco de huesos ediciones. Editorial con experiencia en proyectos literarios (lleva más de cuatro años funcionando como empresa) y maquetación, así como en juegos relacionados con el mundo de la literatura (Línea Laberinto).Estas tres partes se unieron para desarrollar esta campaña, la cual tiene como objetivo la edición de “Infernis”, un juego de tablero sin dados que aúna control de riesgo, anticipación y estrategia. Con una duración aproximada de entre 30-60 minutos, en “Infernis” de 2 a 4 jugadores encarnan a varias brujas enzarzadas con sus rivales en un juego cruel de habilidad, magia y astucia. Vencerá quien sea capaz de mantener a sus infelices campesinos más tiempo sobre la isla maldita, evitando que éstos perezcan en las llamas eternas que la rodean.Para saber más sobre cómo se juega a “Infernis” puedes visitar el siguiente blog:http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/2014/03/infernis-introduccion-las-reglas-para.html“Infernis” ya ha sido previamente presentado como prototipo
en convenciones nacionales e internacionales, por lo que ha sido disfrutado por
jugadores de distintos países (España, Francia y Alemania). Debido al interés
que ha despertado y por demanda popular, se ha decidido acudir a esta
plataforma de crowdfunding con el objetivo de llevar el juego al mercado.
Gracias a la contribución de los potenciales colaboradores de esta campaña se
pretende lograr la financiación de una primera edición de 1000 unidades, 
con la que se espera poner al alcance de los amantes de los juegos de mesa de
todo el mundo este interesante y divertido juego.Este proyecto no sólo será
importante por hacer llegar “Infernis” a la comunidad de
jugadores y garantizarles muchas horas de diversión, sino porque ofrecerá
recompensas originales e irrepetibles que sólo podrán adquirirse durante la
campaña.
Las tres partes involucradas en este
proyecto han editado productos para el mercado en sus respectivas áreas con
éxito. Por este motivo su capacidad para gestionar profesionalmente un proyecto
de este tipo está garantizada, y la campaña será importante para reforzar
todavía más la confianza del público hacia ellos. 
El dinero recaudado servirá para
sufragar los gastos de producción del juego: físicos (imprenta, compra de
componentes, empaquetado), intangibles (derechos de autor del diseñador, derechos
de autor de la ilustradora, remuneración de los editores) y logísticos
(envíos). Calculamos que para 1000 unidades producidas de “Infernis”  necesitaremos 4500€, a lo que se suma 500€ en concepto
de comisiones para la plataforma y las empresas que gestionan las transacciones
económicas.
Los colaboradores tendrán a su
disposición una serie de recompensas exclusivas durante la campaña, las cuales
se plantean en forma de Material Infernal:Además de las recompensas está programado ofertar bonos para mejorar calidad de la edición y el número de componentes, los cuales podrían aplicarse a los mecenas si la financiación supera la cantidad mínima para realizar el proyecto. Por ejemplo, alcanzar cifras entre 6000€-10000€ permitiría “desbloquear” la producción de nuevos tableros, tarjetas adicionales, cartas para representar nuevos modos de juego, etc… El primer objetivo desbloqueable será anunciado durante la campaña.La financiación del proyecto deberá ser aportada íntegramente por la contribución de los patrones. En caso de no alcanzar el mínimo necesario no se hará ningún cargo a los colaboradores.
El Material Infernal son recompensas exclusivas que pueden seleccionarse hasta alcanzar el máximo establecido por el Nivel Infernal que hayamos escogido (Ver Niveles Infernales).1.  Donación Infernal (5€).
Se incluirá el nombre del colaborador en la lista de agradecimientos del juego.
2.  Antología “Círculos
infernales” en formato digital (5€). Antología conmemorativa de varios
autores del catálogo Saco de Huesos en la que se explora el submundo infernal.
Formatos pdf, ePub y mobi sin DRM.
3.  Dados infernales
conmemorativos (5€). Incluye 2 dados negros, con la cara del uno
personalizada con el logo de Infernis en rojo.
4.  Pack de dados infernales
conmemorativos (10€). Incluye 5 dados negros, con la cara del uno personalizada con el
logo de Infernis en rojo.
5.  Essentia digital (5€).
Versión digital del juego de mesa Essentia con opción para partidas
online, de Fernando Lafuente, para descarga directa.

Europea.
13.  Envío al resto del
mundo (30€). Necesario para sufragar los gastos de envío a cualquier país
fuera de la Unión Europea.

durará 40 días, período durante el cual los colaboradores podrán apuntarse a

story:
Please consider to check the demo out!

>>> LINK DEMO <<<

Also on Steam! Or Itch.io!

The demo is around 20 to 30 minutes.

About PRiCERPG

You're not a hero, nor somebody special... this is a story about a regular dude, in a world full of instant gratification and strange events.

To reveal the secrets "FarAF", you have to grow emotionally along with our main character.

Or you can do the exact opposite and drown in your own pride and guilt... it is your choice.

While you do that... you can also:

  • Recruit a rat for your party!
  • Enter in a bench press competition!
  • Sell party members on the Black Market!
  • Win a lot of data in the Casino!
  • Go to the Tula Disco Building! where you can found a vaporweave zone, a weeaboo zone and a hardbass zone!
  • Go into space!
  • Escape from Social network sites and avoid procrastination!
  • Perform miracles at the church!
  • Kill a giant black widow!
  • Get killed by a giant black widow!
  • Get a giant black widow head!
  • Go fishing (wow!... really?)
  • Fly on a plane!
  • And much more!

 

About me

My name is Alex Zepeda, im from Chile and i have always been a fan of RPG games.

I have played Paper mario, Paper Mario TTYD, Undertale, Darkest Dungeon and Lisa, which is the game that inspired me to create my own game.

Everything in this game was developed by me, except the music and some art, actually im focusing on this project on most of my free time, also, this is me eating a stuffed sandwich.

Story

A random person, a nobody, someone who is nothing special, just by accident, an idea crossed his mind...

After he watched the news, for a brief moment, our main character, had doubt ... but that was enough...

Thanks to this, a  strange man named "Tommy"  contacts with our MC and  after the message from Tommy, our weird adventure starts by trying to find this "Contundito" guy...

 

Characters

Our main character, a nobody. 

Sheddy, the new queen of the lands of FarAF. 

Contundito, the former king of the lands of FarAF. 

Van, son of Contundito.

Elmalo, a gay mercenary. 

Tommy, the strange guy from the computer.

 

 

 

Features

  • More than 40 playable party members, some good, some completely useless and some overpowered!

  • Dark, politically incorrect, impact, and adult humor.

  • Almost no random encounters.

  • Interesting and emotion driven story, literally!.

  • Concept of "NPC" and real players inside the gameplay.

  • A lot of items, weapons and armors to make a highly customisable combat experience!

  • More than 12 mini games.

  • More than 9 hours of funny, weird and amazing gameplay!.

  • Interesting and funny battles.

  • 3 Different endings, a good one, a neutral one and a bad one, each ending has its own story, final battle and conclusion.

 

Screenshots

Music

^^^ Click DJ Fank Duck to get the playlist on youtube! ^^^

**The completly sound track will be around ~ 80 songs**

The Fund

I will need around $7.500 US, where will the money go?

  • To my bloodstream! just the enough to survive while a focus myself on PRiCERPG
  • To the illustrator! my artistic skills aren't good enough to make detailed art for the game, so i will have to hire someone who can make it for me!
  • For the music! to make the music even better!
  • Translations and corrections!, my mother language is spanish, my english is really good, but im not a native english speaker, there will be a lot of grammatical errors that can be corrected.
  • Production costs, taxes and legal stuff!
  • Leftovers will be used to make the world of PRiCERPG even better! 

Goal Reach

What if the goal isn't reached?

The project will be finished regardless, but it will take much more time, but thats about it.

Perks

 

xD Pleb Tier $5

  • Copy of the game when it's out

xD Edge Lord Tier $15

  • Copy of the game when it's out
  • Soundtrack

xD Big Boss Tier $20

  • Copy of the game when it's out
  • Soundtrack
  • Thanks on the credit

 

 

FarAF Villager Tier $25

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own character with a dialogue of your choice

FarAF Civil Tier $50

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own animated character with its own interaction event with your ideas

Cool Gay Tier $100

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own animated character with its own interaction event with your ideas
  • Your own enemy character with a battle

Masochist Gay Tier $200

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own animated character with its own interaction event with your ideas
  • Your own enemy character with a battle with your ideas
  • Your own playable party member with your ideas

Sadistic Gay Tier $350

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own animated character with its own interaction event with your ideas
  • Your own playable party member with your ideas
  • Your own boss enemy battle, with 2 minions with your ideas

Annoying Plane Guy Tier $500

  • All the xD Tier perks
  • Your own mini-zone
  • A tiny village in your own zone
  • A plane map to get there
  • 2 Animated characters with interaction events with your ideas
  • 3 Villagers with your dialogue ideas
  • Your own COMBO BASED playable party member with your ideas
  • Your own boss enemy battle, with 2 minions with your ideas
  • All of this in your own mini-zone!

Stretch Goals

  • $10.000 Mac Port, the game is intended to be Windows exclusive, but this can change!

​

  • $12.500 Official art by Eddie H.Hinestroza, you can look at his work on  https://www.artstation.com/eddiehernandez9655

 

  • $15.000 Complete traduction of the game to Spanish!, the game is intended to be english only, but this can change too!

 

  • $20.000 Imposible mode, the game have 2 game modes, easy and but, but what if the hard mode not edgy enough? We can fix that!

  • $25.000 Prequel of the game! Who is Tommy? What is the world of FarAF? Who is Bandrenor?. Why is Tommy helping me? What happened before the events of PRiCERPG?, all this questions will be answered in the prequel of the game!, with Tommy as the protagonist!

 

 

  • $30.000 ????

 

Risks

The most significant risk is the game being too edgy with the humour and too edgy with the game in general.

Im really aware of this, so im usually taking advice and considering them a lot.

But i also try to give as much as posible of my own personality into the game, because i really don't want PRiCERPG to become just another dull game nor a copy.

Challenges

My biggest challenge will be marketing and making the pople to get to know about this game.

Im not a super-star from the internet nor anything like that... im just a regular dude with a lot pasion, work ethics and love for this project.

And, because of the nature of PRiCERPG, that could be double edge blade... but im positive about this project and at last, i promise you that this game has A LOT of work and love into it.

Social

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PRiCERPG/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/pricerpg

Im waayyy more active in Facebook, but will do updates on Twitter too.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate that's cool!, you can spread the word about this game, it will help me greatly and i will thank you for life!.

And last but not least...
story_txt:
Please consider to check the demo out!>>> LINK DEMO <<<Also on Steam! Or Itch.io!The demo is around 20 to 30 minutes.

About PRiCERPG
You're not a hero, nor somebody special... this is a story about a regular dude, in a world full of instant gratification and strange events.
To reveal the secrets "FarAF", you have to grow emotionally along with our main character.
Or you can do the exact opposite and drown in your own pride and guilt... it is your choice.
While you do that... you can also:

Recruit a rat for your party!
Enter in a bench press competition!
Sell party members on the Black Market!
Win a lot of data in the Casino!
Go to the Tula Disco Building! where you can found a vaporweave zone, a weeaboo zone and a hardbass zone!
Go into space!
Escape from Social network sites and avoid procrastination!
Perform miracles at the church!
Kill a giant black widow!
Get killed by a giant black widow!
Get a giant black widow head!
Go fishing (wow!... really?)
Fly on a plane!
And much more!

 
About me
My name is Alex Zepeda, im from Chile and i have always been a fan of RPG games.
I have played Paper mario, Paper Mario TTYD, Undertale, Darkest Dungeon and Lisa, which is the game that inspired me to create my own game.
Everything in this game was developed by me, except the music and some art, actually im focusing on this project on most of my free time, also, this is me eating a stuffed sandwich.


Story
A random person, a nobody, someone who is nothing special, just by accident, an idea crossed his mind...
After he watched the news, for a brief moment, our main character, had doubt ... but that was enough...
Thanks to this, a  strange man named "Tommy"  contacts with our MC and  after the message from Tommy, our weird adventure starts by trying to find this "Contundito" guy...
 
Characters
Our main character, a nobody. 
Sheddy, the new queen of the lands of FarAF. 
Contundito, the former king of the lands of FarAF. 
Van, son of Contundito.
Elmalo, a gay mercenary. 
Tommy, the strange guy from the computer.
 
 
 

Features

More than 40 playable party members, some good, some completely useless and some overpowered!
Dark, politically incorrect, impact, and adult humor.
Almost no random encounters.
Interesting and emotion driven story, literally!.
Concept of "NPC" and real players inside the gameplay.
A lot of items, weapons and armors to make a highly customisable combat experience!
More than 12 mini games.
More than 9 hours of funny, weird and amazing gameplay!.
Interesting and funny battles.
3 Different endings, a good one, a neutral one and a bad one, each ending has its own story, final battle and conclusion.

 

Screenshots

story:
Nostalgia Knight is a platformer reminiscent of the 1990s' Nintendo Gameboy's classics, such as Super Mario Land and Kirby's Dreamland. Help the Nostalgia Knight in his quest to defeat the Lord of Progress before the latter reshapes the world to his liking and chaos arises.

With your help in funding this campaign, we will be able to finish a proper demo (or even the full game, as a stretch goal.) The demo is planned to feature:

  • 10 Levels (showcasing the first out of many worlds.)
  • 2 different weapons: the Ancient Sword and the Freezer.
  • 1 Boss battle with its own settings.
  • 1 HUB room for weapon upgrading.
  • A World Map.
  • 1 Save slot.
  • Secrets...

While the entire game will include:

  • 100+ Levels (in at least ten different worlds.)
  • 6 different weapons for a polyvalent exploration system.
  • 10+ Boss battles with their own settings.
  • 3 HUB rooms for weapon upgrading and secrets purchase.
  • A World Map.
  • 3 Save slots.
  • More secrets...

 

This adventure features four main characters:

  • The Nostalgia Knight: Also known as the Knight of the Past, he is the main protagonist of the game, as well as the player's avatar. No word will get out of his mouth, but he will react in consequence to the events around him.
  • The Lord of Progress: Main antagonist of the game, he wishes for the World to advance to the next stage, after many years of standstill. His motivations are unclear, but one thing is sure: he is driven by the sight of a brand new world.
  • King Kilobyte: Wise king of the Kilobyte Kingdom and direct superior of the Nostalgia Knight, he wishes for the well-being of his subjects as well as the territory he has under control. He will directly help the Knight by upgrading his arsenal whenever he can.
  • Princess Kilobyte: Daughter of the King Kilobyte, she wished to engage a peace talk with the Lord of Progress before resorting to the Knight's help. However, no sign of life were shwon from her after her departure. Thus, the Nostalgia Knight's mission has been extended to saving her.

Aside from the main cast, the Nostalgia Knight will encounter diverse enemies throughout his adventure:

  • Crash: Inhabitant of the Kilobyte Kingdom who decided to serve under the Lord of Progress. As its name suggests, needlessly crashes onto walls or fall into void.
  • Crashe: Female variants of Crash, Crashe tend to avoid falling into pits. Besides, they also spit small junk balls when they see an intruder coming towards them.
  • Float: Usually inoffensive, they decided to rally themselves to the Lord of Progress... but for now, they just enjoy flying around.
  • Soft Lock: One of the Lord of Progress' most trusted minions. Anyone trying to harm it will have to follow a certain protocol dictated by the chest itself.
  • Laughing Gas: Acts as a defense system for Soft Lock. They ram into the intruders until they die.

 

Throughout his adventure, the Knight will acquire new weapons which will help you against powerful foes:

  • The Ancient Sword: base melee weapon, does average damage.
  • The Booters: allows you to dash across a short distance, dashing through vulnerable enemies.
  • The Freezer: freezes an enemy in space for a short period of time before killing it.
  • The Grabber: grabs a tile and allows you to close your distance with it; deals damage if used on enemies.
  • The Burner: throws a bomb, does great damage.
  • The Glass Cannon: destroys everything in sight, but be careful not to get hit while wielding it...

Not only that, an upgrade system will be available for making the game an easier experience to casual players.

Of course, you can also decide to stick with only the jumping ability and/or a V1 Ancient Sword, a challenge which would surely please hardcore gamers.

 

By exploring the levels thoroughly, you will surely find secrets. Be they Pixel Pieces, codes, messages, references or whatever; have fun looking for them all.

Oh, a Pixel Piece!

 

Of course, you will be given rewards for your contribution:

Thank you very much for supporting Nostalgia Knight! You will get your name in the credits as well as a high-resolution Box Art of the game (2048x2048 pixels.)

You shall receive a link to the playable demo three days before its official release. As for the full game, you will have the chance to download it one week before its official release.

Add to the previous tier a digital release of the OST so you can listen to it when you play Super Mario Bros.

Ever felt nostalgic of the old physical guidebooks? Rejoice! One will be made for Nostalgia Knight (albeit digitally, for this tier.)

If you can't choose between the music and the book, why not both?

Want to have total control over the game? We'll include an USB NES controller to the pack so you can play with yer olde Nintendo controls.

Sadly, we cannot use a real cartridge as all the data wouldn't fit on the GameBoy system. However, a replica would still allow the player to feel they own a GB game.

WARNING! THIS TIER IS ONLY SIGNIFICANT IF STRETCH GOALS ARE REACHED!

If stretch goals are reached, we will release physical copies of the guidebook with extra pages (developer words, extra tips/cheats, etc...)

What about leaving your own print on the game? For this tier, you may leave any secret/easter egg/unlockable (as long as it doesn't interfere with gameplay.)

You might want to play the game even earlier than one week before its release. If you do, you can always become a beta tester for Nostalgia Knight.

If leaving your print doesn't seem enough for you, fret not! With this tier, you will be able to create your own enemy (anything is welcome to be suggested, so don't be afraid.)

Still not enough? Then, how about you create your own boss? This is the least we can do for this much of a contribution.

 

As initially mentioned, this campaign has for first goal to fund the game's demo, which means you will see several stretch goals, such as the game being fully funded.

Every stretch goal will also unlock more slots for physical guidebooks and fake cartridges.

If we reach this €5000 stretch goal, we will officially have enough to fund the full game with a safe enough net. Fake cartridges and physical guidebooks will be created, 50 of each.

If we reach €10000, we will add more songs to the list (such as one per boss, and/or alternate themes.) As for the fake cartridges and physical guidebooks, their production will be increased to 100 of each.

 

Our musician will take care of everything regarding sound, from the OST to the SFX (sound effects.)

Eadgear works on realizing and bettering every graphical asset. He doesn't only do pixel art, but also has quite a bit to show on his DeviantArt page. We've worked together in the past, and been doing pretty well together.

Dorian Delord (hey, it's me!), working on everything else: game and level design, programming, as well as bringing all the theoritical elements to the other team members so they may have less trouble working on that mess. I started to make games for a couple years by passion, but rarely ever got to finish projects.

If you have any questions to ask the team, feel free to post them on the game's Twitter page.

 

We have been working for months on Nostalgia Knight, but there came the point where I couldn't pay for any more assets.

With the sum gotten from this campaign, we hope to cover all of the major upfront costs that would allow us to pay for the game's graphics and sound work.

We are also taking account of Indiegogo taking a share of the raised money, as well as applying the game to Steam and such, allowing for the game to reach a broader audience.

The remaining funds will serve as a safety extra to make sure we don't fall short on money for assets.

 

Unsurprisingly, backing this project also comes with risks.

The biggest one of them would be to get the physical rewards in time. However, I can guarantee the arrival of every digital backer reward in time, should the game be fully funded.

There's also the risk of one of our members getting sick or injured, slowing the project down a bit.

The August date sounds pretty close, but the game should be done by then (or at least would the beta tests stade begin.) If anything happens in that regard, you will be warned first thing.

 

If you want to contribute to this funding, whether you have money or not, please spread the word; it's free and only takes a few seconds!

Badge by Crowdfunding Community.

story:
InCube Chess, the Intellectual Game of the III Millennium. Is a new stage in evolution of the classic chess game, which is transferred into three-dimensional space!


  •  Overcoming limitations of two-dimensional classic chess, Chess InCube carefully saves their traditions and basics, but invests a lot of new possibilities.

  • The transfer of the game into three-dimensional space is resulted to explosive increase the number of moves and variants of game course that brings to new tactical and strategic variants. It helps to avoid “theoretisation” and “ forecasting” that we have during a usual chess match.

    This software project is also optimum for educational needs, for active growing of volumetric thinking, strategic and tactical skills.

  • It is possible to play game both with the partner-person, and with the built-in robot, which has number levels of complexity.
  • Support of OpenGL futures and rich control and customization possibilities  in ChessCube allows to be fluent in new game space for any gamer.
  • InCube Chess keeps usual rules for figures moving and rates of chess gamers, only extends them to a true three-dimensional space.  

 

 

!!! You can see "Presentation" & "IPPhone AppPreview"

video on our "Gallery" section for much more details !!!

!!! You don't need to wait when application programming will end! You will immediately receive a full-featured application for Maс OSx or iOS (iPad, iPhone). Your money is used to improve the program and to develop Chess InCube  for other hardware platforms (for Windows first of all) !!!

 

Anyone who contribute from $1 in this campaign will receive password for download InCube Chess for iOS or Mac OS X!

We are a small team of developers that make complex intellectual product. And we want to focus on this for our product will be really good. We have working versions for Mac OS X and IPad, but in this time we need funding for release this innovative game on most mass computer platform (Windows).

   Your money will be spent on the intensification of development for Windows platform, that will allow us to appeal for a wider audience of intellectuals. Your funds will go directly for a coders  are working on a Windows version, and for additional computer equipment. Your help will allow our small team to release a new version of Chess InCube for Windows in the short term, and to make this program a real mass.

You can see more detalied info & HowTo at http://www.metachess.kiev.ua/en

 

OUR CUSTOMERS REWIEWS

 

(for MAC OSX & iOS versions):

Nice app ★★★★★

by Mike.Collins - Version 0.3.1 - Jan 25, 2012

Great nonstandard experience

Cool app ★★★★★

by Cadet Pupkin - Version 0.3 - Jan 10, 2012

This is quite unusual and fun chess game. The way to go, waiting for game center and online multiplayer support... Glory board and networking game is what I miss in this app. Otherwise is very solid!

That's what I call 3D! ★★★★

by Shakazuuluu - Version 0.3.4 - Jan 2, 2013

Now that I can barely play regular chess I can try my hand in 2 level chess with 2 simultaneous rows! Marvelous!

Very smart robot! ★★★★★

by Filimon1980 - Version 0.3.8 - May 15, 2012

Really like it :) I wish one day chess application distributed with OS may be same way elegant and powerful!

I like it! ★★★★★

by pendejo1977 - Version 0.3.7 - Apr 29, 2012

Well I tried it anyways after all said in comments. And I have to say I really like it. It seems last version saw important fixes in graphics so perspective provided by the game (and understanding where each piece stands) is really ok for me. Note, this is 3d game in which you always draw some things before the others. Additionally you have to draw this cubic battlefield. I think it is difficult to make it better. As for other features. Computer opponent is great! Learning functionality is great! Good to have in standard games package. Recommend this for everybody.

I love this app!! ★★★★★

by umka123 - Version 0.3.5 - Feb 15, 2012

Most of all I like the way the computer opponent works. It is quick and quite smart. Still it is not always easy to estimate where to go to attack specific enemy piece. Otherwise is very good, will keep an eye on this game.

Cool app! ★★★★★

by Murat Kundura - Version 0.3.2 - Dec 18, 2011

I like it very much. Did not see something as elegant as this one for a while. The only one thing I would add is some kind of history window to select a "history moment" to rewind at. It is not quite handy to do 10 times undo and wait for all animations to finish if I want to get there.

Even on my hackintosh works like a hell! ★★★★★

by Brykakuzzia - Version 0.3.2 - Dec 15, 2011

Works great, my 8yo kid got whole idea in a minute and wants me to play with him every evening.

Interesting game ★★★★★

by shi.sha - Version 0.3.1 - Dec 7, 2011

It's very interesting concept to play. Still waiting for network mode - player vs player, tournaments and online ratings and charts.

Wow! I saw something like this in old StarTrek. ★★★★

by Duncan Perish - Version 0.3.1 - Dec 5, 2011

Really interesting idea and very good implementation - I like it. Gameplay of normal chess is preserved, rules seem to be correct, help is good (many don't bother with making any help at all), board look and feel is good and computer opponent is something remarkable. It is interesting to watch two computer opponents playing against each other. Very well done! Still here are some things that need more work imho: - blending sometimes is not correct, which results in halo that sometimes is not really transparent; - network game is needed; - sometimes it is quite difficult to evaluate future moves in order to approach some opponent's piece or attack/cover specific region, though grids help with this a little bit. Looking forward to see how this game is progressing.

Something new in the chess world at last! ★★★★★

by Robert Dallek - Version 0.3 - Nov 30, 2011

Really carefully done. I like it much, especially computer opponent, which is while smart enough to handle complex situations, makes moves very quickly. Waiting for network play.

very well crafted ★★★★★

by Mcsquaredjr - Version 0.3 - Nov 17, 2011

This is a very well crafted and thoroughly implemented chess game. I'm playing it for several hours and simply cannot stop. The help is very clear and useful Recommend to everyone who likes to play chess. Enjoy!

If you contribute to the campaign, please send us an email at chessincube@gmail.com, so we can send you the current LITE version for MAC OS X or iOS

If you contribute over $10, PLEASE SEE DETAILS ON "PERKS" COLUMN!

 (All background music by Stive Morgan, http://freemus.net/,  under Creative Commons license)
story_txt:
InCube Chess, the Intellectual Game of the III Millennium. Is a new stage in evolution of the classic chess game, which is transferred into three-dimensional space!


 Overcoming limitations of two-dimensional classic chess, Chess InCube carefully saves their traditions and basics, but invests a lot of new possibilities.


The transfer of the game into three-dimensional space is resulted to explosive increase the number of moves and variants of game course that brings to new tactical and strategic variants. It helps to avoid “theoretisation” and “ forecasting” that we have during a usual chess match.


    This software project is also optimum for educational needs, for active growing of volumetric thinking, strategic and tactical skills.

It is possible to play game both with the partner-person, and with the built-in robot, which has number levels of complexity.
Support of OpenGL futures and rich control and customization possibilities  in ChessCube allows to be fluent in new game space for any gamer.
InCube Chess keeps usual rules for figures moving and rates of chess gamers, only extends them to a true three-dimensional space.  

 
 
!!! You can see "Presentation" & "IPPhone AppPreview" 
video on our "Gallery" section for much more details !!!
!!! You don't need to wait when application programming will end! You will immediately receive a full-featured application for Maс OSx or iOS (iPad, iPhone). Your money is used to improve the program and to develop Chess InCube  for other hardware platforms (for Windows first of all) !!!
 
Anyone who contribute from $1 in this campaign will receive password for download InCube Chess for iOS or Mac OS X!
We are a small team of developers that make complex intellectual product. And we want to focus on this for our product will be really good. We have working versions for Mac OS X and IPad, but in this time we need funding for release this innovative game on most mass computer platform (Windows).
   Your money will be spent on the intensification of development for Windows platform, that will allow us to appeal for a wider audience of intellectuals. Your funds will go directly for a coders  are working on a Windows version, and for additional computer equipment. Your help will allow our small team to release a new version of Chess InCube for Windows in the short term, and to make this program a real mass. 

You can see more detalied info & HowTo at http://www.metachess.kiev.ua/en 
 
OUR CUSTOMERS REWIEWS
 
(for MAC OSX & iOS versions):

story:
What is WarpDrive3d?

WarpDrive3d is a first person shooter game that puts you in the midst of a space battle. It is also a fun way to learn about astronomy, especially our solar system.

 

The Story

Megaevil Corp. discovered a new Earth like planet with your help as a deep sapce scout. You quit working for them when you discovered their insidious designs of plundering and polluting the new planet.

But you can't just quit Megaevil Corp. They want to silence you for good. Now a renegade, you decide to stop their evil scheme.

You must sail your space ship and not only survive the relentless onslaught of photon bombs and torpedoes, but also destroy enemy ships and the mothership in orbit.

It only gets more challenging as you realize you have to replenish your ammunition, oxygen and fuel, and the refueling stations are guarded by surface to air missiles batteries.

Explore the planets and moons, fly around asteroids in this 3d space simulation game in your struggle to stop Megaevil Corp.

Educational Tool

Reading about the solar system, looking at pictures of Jupiter, or the Orion constellation, the M17 or the Eagle nebulae is one thing, but to actually sail through space in a simulation is a totally different experience.


The game uses texture maps from NASA.gov of real planets and moons in our solar system to create the objects in the game. 

You will be able to identify the planets in our solar system, their moons, and also some of the landmarks on these planets, like Olympus Mons volcano and Valles Marineris canyons on Mars, the Red Spot on Jupiter.

You will sail around Earth's moon, identify Aitken crater basin, Imbrium crater, and other landmarks.

We are very excited about adding new levels that will allow you to explore not just our solar system, but also other star systems and complete missions there.

You will be learning about pulsars, black holes, and comets in an exciting way.

Who are We?

WarpDrive3d was started by Oosman and LeLe. Between the two of us, we have many years of experience in computer programming and software designing.

Oosman has developed software for phones, embedded devices, and tractors/combine harvestors that aid driverless operations. He also developed children's PC games as language learning aids.

LeLe is a user experience specialist and has designed man-machine interfaces, websites and apps.

Why this game?

We thought it would be challenging to create an action game that is eductional, addictive and fun to play.

So we built the game engine, the physics engine, and now we are adding more levels and completing the story line of the game. 

We want to indulge the players into learning astronomy in a fun way. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to deliver the game with:

  • Multiple levels of increasing difficulty
  • An array of new weapons
  • More space ship designs
  • Improved graphics
  • Multi-player support, play against your friends

 

 

The funds we get will be used for the development cost of the game, creating advanced 3d models, improving graphics, and optimizing the game engine.

We have used our resources and time to come this far, your funds will help us launch the finished game.

Schedule

After we get the funding, we estimate 3 months time before we can release the beta version of the game with all the levels.

The full game is expected to be released after 6 months from date we get the funds.

All the funders will get regular updates on our Indiegogo pages about our progress.

Stretch goal

We want to bring WarpDrive3D to the tablet, so you can play it on your iOS or Android devices.

Spread the Word...

Tell your friends and family about WarpDrive3d game. Feel free to ask us any questions you have about this project.

Your support and feedback will give us a big boost. 

 

Thank you!

Our sincere apologies. We have grossly underestimated what is required to run a successful campaign. We have cancelled this attempt.

We will learn fast, make a solid plan and come back when ready!

For our few backers. You are not forgotten. When we come back there will be a special perk for you. When the campaign ends (and fails) IndieGoGo will refund your money.

Brgds IR Squad

story:
roseVeRte Official Website | Twitter | Facebook Page | Steam 

About the Game

"How to Fool a Liar King (HTFALK)" is a cute romance visual novel that will be fully voiced in Japanese, with Japanese, English and German text like its prequel, "How to Take Off Your Mask (HTTOYM)."  You don't have to play the previous game to understand the story, but it might be more enjoyable for you if you do. Like HTTOYM, it will be released on our official site, Steam (Win/Mac), iOS, and Android.
Official Site: http://eroolia.roseverte.net/king/en/
Story of Eroolia Portal Site: http://eroolia.roseverte.net
*Rewards on this campaign are only available for the digital Win/ Mac version.
*The German version may be released after the English/Japanese version has been released.
*Final price is expected to be 12.99~14.99 USD.

Story

The story starts after the ending of "How to Take Off Your Mask."
Regina, our heroine, magically appears in Eroolia.
She has no idea how she ended up in Eroolia where she meets Juli and his companions, whom she ends up joining on their journey to Laarz, a country of cat people.
Will she be able to get back home? Is there a special reason why she was transported to Eroolia?

Characters

Features

  • 2 vocal songs, a theme song and insert song. 
    Both songs will have a short (in-game) version and a full version.
  • Original OP Movie.
  • Fully voiced in Japanese.
  • 10 or more original CGs.
  • Original backgrounds.
  • Small animations within certain scenes.
  • 2 major routes.

About roseVeRte

roseVeRte started making visual novels in 2010, and we have always completed the projects we set out to do.
roseVeRte is run by one person, Chu-3 (me), with the help of outsourced staff.
I usually handle the story, translation, coding, graphic editing, sound editing, etc., while the outsourced staff handles art, text editing, voice acting, theme songs, and other assets. 

You can check out the games that I've worked on in the websites below:
Official Website: http://www.roseverte.net
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/roseverte/id539404364
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=5922835840816105067
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=roseVeRte

"How to Fool a Liar King" Staff Members

  • Original Planning/Director/Scenario/English Translator/Sound Editor/Costume Design: Chu-3
  • Character Design/Japanese ver. Editor: Bakufu Narayama
  • English ver. Editor: Angela
  • German Translator: Marcel Weyers
  • Vocal Songs Composer: no.real
  • Main Background Artist: Ferry Susanto

Stretch Goals

$3000 Our goal. The game will have 10 or more CGs! But Regina's brother will remain an invisible character... 

$5000 The game will have 15 or more CGs! Regina's brother will also have a sprite!

Rewards

*The reward is the Steam version of the game (if it gets Greenlit), but you can also choose to have the non-Steam version. Note of caution, the non-Steam version has DRM, so you will need to choose what language you'd like to play the game in. Read here for the details: http://www.roseverte.net/drm.html

Risks & Challenges

Until now, roseVeRte has never used crowdfunding to fund any of our games. But this time around, a higher budget is essential for speeding up the production of the game and to have better quality assets. In our experience, it's been getting more and more difficult to use funds raised from a previous game to create the next game in the series.
To keep up our work, we really need your help!

story:
Is a game by Windows with option of VR (Oculus & Htc Vive) with first person or Third person. 

The players will have a option to build scenes and fight there and save it. the options will be INFINITES!

Death Battle of Destiny  will have many modes to play.

1. Player vs AI

2. Player Vs Player

3. 2 vs 2

4. 3 vs 3

5. 5 vs 5

6. Death Match.

Will get experience and buy weapons to get best fight, depends of weapon will be the animation of character.


 

What We Need & What You Get

What is done?
Characters, but you will get your own character.
Scene Assets, but you will build your own scene.
Vfx, Animations, Attacks.

 

What we need?
We need funds for can end the project, the part of programmation.

We need around $40.000 USD, for can follow with the project (part of programation, part of servers by version multiplayer).
the goal is make the best game of fight on Standalone/VR possible, if we can end the project, we will increase more the game with best assets of scene, weapons, items, etc.

 

What you will get?
your own character on 3D, your own weapons.

 

 

This is my first game, I will put more characters in this game once the game gets popular. I don't know what much to write more in here. But i assure you it will be a great fighting game.

Please give some funds to me so that i can continue doing this project and more projects.

ENJOY IT!


Credits

1. Andres Castaño
2. Cody Lambert
3. Sudharsan Suresh
4. Roland Lucaciu
